original: de yang zhes bya ba ni dngos su zla ba gcig gi shes pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni dngos su zla ba gcig gi shes pa'o //
translated: “That” refers to the cognition of one moon.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni dang po na yang ngo //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni dang po na yang ngo //
translated: “That” refers to the first one.

original: 'di bzhin no zhes bya ba ni zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: 'di bzhin no zhes bya ba ni zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa bzhin du'o //
translated: “Just like that” refers to the cognition of two moons.

original: thug pa med par zhes bya ba ni thal ches pa'o //🔽ldog 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyod pas so //
analyzed: thug pa med par zhes bya ba ni thal ches pa'o // ldog 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyod pas so //
translated: “There would be an infinite regress” means that there would be an overextension.🔽“Would not occur” means that it would not be possible.

original: ldog par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rtag pa nyid kyi 'khrul pa bzhin te /
analyzed: ldog par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rtag pa nyid kyi 'khrul pa bzhin te /
translated: “Would not occur” means that it would be a mistake to think that it is permanent.

original: yid kyi 'ga' rnam pa gnyis su mthong ba yin gyi rnam pa gsum ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'ga' rnam pa gnyis su mthong ba yin gyi rnam pa gsum ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the mind is seen to have two aspects, not three.

original: dbang po 'gyur ba ni yod kyang zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dbang po 'gyur ba ni yod kyang zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: “Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”

original: gang gi tshe zhe na rnam par dpyod na ni yongs su dpyod na'o //🔽sbrul du 'khrul pa ni rnam par 'gyur ba yod kyang /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na rnam par dpyod na ni yongs su dpyod na'o // sbrul du 'khrul pa ni rnam par 'gyur ba yod kyang /
translated: When? “When there is analysis,” that is, when there is thorough analysis.🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”

original: rnam par dpyad na ma gyur pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par dpyad na ma gyur pa ma yin nam /
translated: “Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”🔽“Even though there is a change in the sense faculty” is to be connected with “there would be an infinite regress.”

original: nag po nyid la sogs pa ni rnam par 'gyur ba yang na rnam par dpyad pa la sogs pas mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nag po nyid la sogs pa ni rnam par 'gyur ba yang na rnam par dpyad pa la sogs pas mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because black, etc. are not averted by the analysis, etc.

original: 'on te dpyod pa dang bcas pas ldog pa yin pa de lta na yang ma nges pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te dpyod pa dang bcas pas ldog pa yin pa de lta na yang ma nges pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: But if you think that they are averted by the analysis, even so, it is not ascertained.

original: ji ste nag po la sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ste nag po la sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you say, “because of black, etc.”

original: dbang rten gang yin gal te gang //
analyzed: dbang rten gang yin gal te gang //
translated: If the basis of the power is that which🔽If it exists, it exists.

original: zhes bya ba gsal bar byed pa ni de yod na yod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsal bar byed pa ni de yod na yod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This clarifies it.

original: dpyad du rung ba la sogs pa'i 'khrul pa ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dpyad du rung ba la sogs pa'i 'khrul pa ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The error of being suitable for analysis, etc. is averted. This is the teaching.

original: rnam par 'gyur ba las skyes pa'i nag po la sogs pa'i ngo bo ni zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa bzhin du yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba las skyes pa'i nag po la sogs pa'i ngo bo ni zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa bzhin du yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The nature of black, etc. which is produced from the transformation is like the cognition of two moons. This is taught:

original: nag po la sogs pa snang ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nag po la sogs pa snang ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The appearance of black, etc.”

original: de yang yid kyi zhes bya ba 'di la yid kyis zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa can yin la /
analyzed: de yang yid kyi zhes bya ba 'di la yid kyis zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa can yin la /
translated: And this is mental. Here, “mental” is conceptual.

original: rtog pa dang bral ba smos pa nyid kyi ldog pa khas len pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rtog pa dang bral ba smos pa nyid kyi ldog pa khas len pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement “free from conceptualization” itself teaches the acceptance of the opposite.

original: rtog pa dang bcas par zhes bya ba'o //🔽gnong bar byed pa nyid du mngon sum bar zhen pa ni sbrul du 'khrul pa yin la /
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas par zhes bya ba'o // gnong bar byed pa nyid du mngon sum bar zhen pa ni sbrul du 'khrul pa yin la /
translated: The phrase “with conceptualization” is the opposite of that.🔽The adherence to the appearance of a snake is the error of a rope being a snake.

original: phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid du zhen pa ni chur 'khrul pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid du zhen pa ni chur 'khrul pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The adherence to the appearance of water is the error of a shell being silver.

original: phan 'dogs pa dang gnod pa byed par snang ba zhes bya ba'o //🔽gnyid log pa'am zhes bya bas yid kyi gsal bar snang ba bstan pa yin no //🔽sad pa na zhes bya bas ni dbang po las byung ba'o //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa dang gnod pa byed par snang ba zhes bya ba'o // gnyid log pa'am zhes bya bas yid kyi gsal bar snang ba bstan pa yin no // sad pa na zhes bya bas ni dbang po las byung ba'o //
translated: The phrase “the appearance of benefit and harm” teaches this.🔽The phrase “while asleep” teaches the appearance of the mind.🔽The phrase “while awake” teaches the appearance of the sense faculties.

original: gnyi gar yang zhes bya bas @115b ni gnyid log pa dang sad pa dag go //
analyzed: gnyi gar yang zhes bya bas @115b ni gnyid log pa dang sad pa dag go //
translated: The phrase “in both cases” teaches the appearance of the mind and the sense faculties.

original: de lta mi gsal bar snang ba stan pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta mi gsal bar snang ba stan pa yin no //
translated: The phrase “not clear” teaches the appearance of the mind.🔽The phrase “the activity of that” teaches the activity of the appearance of the mind.

original: de'i bya ba ni zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa'i'o //
analyzed: de'i bya ba ni zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa'i'o //
translated: The phrase “the cognition of two moons” teaches the appearance of the sense faculties.

original: rtog med na yang zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid la rtog pa dang bral ba nyid kyi khyab pa la bkag pa ste zhes bya ba ni rab rib bcas pa zhes bya ba des so//
analyzed: rtog med na yang zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid la rtog pa dang bral ba nyid kyi khyab pa la bkag pa ste zhes bya ba ni rab rib bcas pa zhes bya ba des so//
translated: “Even when there is no conceptualization” is a negation of the pervasion that perception itself is free from conceptualization. “By that” refers to “together with the eye disease.”

original: slu ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni spyi'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: slu ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni spyi'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because of deception” means because of the absence of a universal characteristic.

original: tshad ma'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas skabs su rang gi ngo bo tshad ma ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas skabs su rang gi ngo bo tshad ma ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa yin te /
translated: In the context of the definition of valid cognition, the essence of valid cognition is distinguished from non-valid cognition.

original: 'khrul pa can ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rigs kyi tha snyad gdags par bya ba nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'khrul pa can ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rigs kyi tha snyad gdags par bya ba nyid ma yin te /
translated: “It is not mistaken” and so on are not to be designated as the conventional term “type.”

original: tha snyad gdags pa'i yul tshad ma nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: tha snyad gdags pa'i yul tshad ma nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because the object of designation is valid cognition itself.

original: mngon sum nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mngon sum nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni /
translated: The meaning of “because it is perception” is explained as follows:

original: gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Elsewhere” means

original: tha snyad gdags par bya ba nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: tha snyad gdags par bya ba nyid kyang ngo //
translated: that it is also to be designated as the conventional term “type.”

original: gzhan gyis gzhan la gang du tha snyad gdags par bya ba ni nya phyis la dngul bzhin du de ldog pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis gzhan la gang du tha snyad gdags par bya ba ni nya phyis la dngul bzhin du de ldog pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The object designated by another in regard to another is not the opposite of that, like silver in regard to a shell.

original: ma 'khrul pa can nyid du 'dzin pas tha snyad 'dogs pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu grub pas gnyi ga la skyes pa ste /
analyzed: ma 'khrul pa can nyid du 'dzin pas tha snyad 'dogs pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu grub pas gnyi ga la skyes pa ste /
translated: Since it is not apprehended as nonerroneous, it is not designated as the result of nonerroneous apprehension.

original: sgra dang dbang po las skyes pa yang tha snyad gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'i tshig gis sgra las byung ba yin pas ldog par byed do zhes bya bar mi rigs te /
analyzed: sgra dang dbang po las skyes pa yang tha snyad gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'i tshig gis sgra las byung ba yin pas ldog par byed do zhes bya bar mi rigs te /
translated: It is not tenable to say that what arises from both sound and the sense faculty is the opposite of what arises from sound, since it is designated by the term “that which arises from both.”

original: gnyi ga las skyes pa nyid ni gang yang rung ba nyid du rnam par gzhag pa mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyi ga las skyes pa nyid ni gang yang rung ba nyid du rnam par gzhag pa mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not tenable to posit what arises from both as either of those two.🔽It is not the case that it is not shared, but rather it is shared because it is the opposite of what is not shared.

original: thun mong ma yin pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang thun mong ba ldog par byed pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis yod pa dang nye ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni yod pa dang phrad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par tshad
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang thun mong ba ldog par byed pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis yod pa dang nye ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni yod pa dang phrad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par tshad
translated: The word “etc.” in “existence, proximity, etc.” refers to the distinctions “existence,” “contact,” and so on.

original: ma nyid la dgos pa med pa'i phyir bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: ma nyid la dgos pa med pa'i phyir bsal ba yin no //
translated: because it is not necessary to remove the negation from the word itself.

original: rnam pa gzhan du bsgrub pa'i phyir ni chos la rgyu mtshan ma yin pa nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du bsgrub pa'i phyir ni chos la rgyu mtshan ma yin pa nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word “only” is used to prove the other aspect, in order to prove that the reason is not a property of the object of inference.

original: brjod par bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni skyes bu dang po rnams la sogs pa rnams la do med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni skyes bu dang po rnams la sogs pa rnams la do med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “The object of expression” means that it is not necessary for the first person, etc.

original: rnam pa gzhan bstan pa la zer ba ni /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan bstan pa la zer ba ni /
translated: The word “only” is used to teach another aspect.

original: ji ste chos la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ste chos la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that the reason is a property of the object of inference,

original: mtshan nyid bsgrub pa ni chos la skul byed gcig pu tshad ma yin par dam bcas pas 'brel pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: mtshan nyid bsgrub pa ni chos la skul byed gcig pu tshad ma yin par dam bcas pas 'brel pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: isn’t the definition established because the thesis is that the reason is the only valid means of knowledge?

original: rjes su brjod pa ni rgyu mtshan nyid bkag pas 'brel pa can yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: rjes su brjod pa ni rgyu mtshan nyid bkag pas 'brel pa can yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If it is thought that the definition is related because the reason is negated,

original: mtshan nyid kyang phyi rol gyi don dang rig byed dang / de'i don rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir 'brel pa can nyid du 'gyur @116a * //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyang phyi rol gyi don dang rig byed dang / de'i don rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir 'brel pa can nyid du 'gyur @116a * //
translated: the definition is also related because it establishes external objects, the Vedas, and their meaning.

original: bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bar bstan pa ni /
translated: To teach this, he says:

original: phyi rol don gyi sgrub pa la zhes bya ba'o //🔽tshad mas grub pa nyid ces bya ba ni chos bzhin du mngon sum la yang yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol don gyi sgrub pa la zhes bya ba'o // tshad mas grub pa nyid ces bya ba ni chos bzhin du mngon sum la yang yin te /
translated: The phrase in the proof of external objects is added.

original: 'jig rten la grub pa nyid du bslad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten la grub pa nyid du bslad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase established by valid cognition is added to direct perception, just as it is added to the other forms of valid cognition, because it is contaminated by what is established in the world.

original: des na don las shes pa mngon sum mo zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa bsgrub pa'i tshig ces bya ba yin no //🔽shes pa'i snang ba las skyes pa nyid mi srid par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: des na don las shes pa mngon sum mo zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa bsgrub pa'i tshig ces bya ba yin no // shes pa'i snang ba las skyes pa nyid mi srid par bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the phrase the cognition of an object is direct perception is the statement that proves the thesis.

original: ma grub dang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ma grub dang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The phrase not established shows that it is impossible for cognition to arise from the appearance of an object.

original: snang bzhin pa ni brkyang pa nyid kyis gcig ma yin pa'i phyir dang / phyi rol na de lta bu med pas skyed byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang bzhin pa ni brkyang pa nyid kyis gcig ma yin pa'i phyir dang / phyi rol na de lta bu med pas skyed byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because what appears is not a single thing, by the very fact that it is extended, and because there is nothing external that is like it, it cannot be a producer.

original: 'on te skyed par byed pa gang yin pa'i don de la dmigs pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te skyed par byed pa gang yin pa'i don de la dmigs pa yin na /
translated: If the object that is a producer is the object that is perceived,

original: skyed byed kyi dmigs pa can nyid dbang po rnams la khyab ches par bstan pa ni /🔽ma nges nyid du gsal ba yin //
analyzed: skyed byed kyi dmigs pa can nyid dbang po rnams la khyab ches par bstan pa ni / ma nges nyid du gsal ba yin //
translated: the phrase it is not established shows that it is too broad to be a defining characteristic of the sense faculties.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The phrase it is not established is clear.

original: ma nges pa nyid ni khyab ches pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma nges pa nyid ni khyab ches pa nyid do //
translated: The fault of overextension is the very uncertainty.

original: shes pa med par mtshon ma yin //
analyzed: shes pa med par mtshon ma yin //
translated: The instrument is not without cognition.

original: zhes bya ba ni shes pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shes pa nyid kyis so //
translated: This is because of cognition itself.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang bral ba nyid la sogs pa las gzhan pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang bral ba nyid la sogs pa las gzhan pa nyid do //
translated: The other is the very difference from freedom from conceptualization, etc.

original: yon tan mchog ldan chus gang zhing /
analyzed: yon tan mchog ldan chus gang zhing /
translated: Filled with water endowed with the best qualities,

original: ngogs na grags 'phel ljon shing ldan //🔽rgyal ba can mtshor phrag dog gis //
analyzed: ngogs na grags 'phel ljon shing ldan // rgyal ba can mtshor phrag dog gis //
translated: with trees on the bank that increase fame,🔽Go to the lake Manasa to pacify

original: gdungs pa zhi phyir 'gro bar mdzod //
analyzed: gdungs pa zhi phyir 'gro bar mdzod //
translated: the torment of jealousy.

original: gang las rtogs pa de nyid sgrub byed ces bya ba yang spyi'i tshig yin gyi /
analyzed: gang las rtogs pa de nyid sgrub byed ces bya ba yang spyi'i tshig yin gyi /
translated: That from which there is understanding is the means of knowing, this is a general statement.

original: dbang po la sogs pa khon brjod pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa khon brjod pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is not taught that only the sense faculties, etc. are the means of knowing.

original: re zhig shes pa skye ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: re zhig shes pa skye ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement, “First, the arising of cognition,” is made.

original: de nyid yin te zhes bya ba ni dbang po la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid yin te zhes bya ba ni dbang po la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The very same is the sense faculty, etc.

original: shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung bas tshogs pa gcig par 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung bas tshogs pa gcig par 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the connection of being in the same collection with the arising of cognition.

original: gal te yang dbang po la sogs pa las skyes pa'i shes pa yin yang de las rtogs pa nges pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te yang dbang po la sogs pa las skyes pa'i shes pa yin yang de las rtogs pa nges pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Even if consciousness arises from the sense faculty, etc., it is not ascertained from that.

original: gang gi phyir skyes pa la sgrub byed yin zhes bya ba nyid kyis nges pa la yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir skyes pa la sgrub byed yin zhes bya ba nyid kyis nges pa la yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: And it is not ascertained by the fact that it is the establishment of what has arisen.

original: thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is because it is too broad.

original: bya ba sgrub par byed ces te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba sgrub par byed ces te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is indicated by “it is not the establishment of the object.”

original: ci zhig su'i yin zhes zer ba la /🔽gang yin de ni de sgrub byed //
analyzed: ci zhig su'i yin zhes zer ba la / gang yin de ni de sgrub byed //
translated: What is what of whom?

original: ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ste /
translated: That which is that is its establishment.

original: dbang po'am nye ba yang rung rnam shes kyi rtog pa'am nges pa la rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'am nye ba yang rung rnam shes kyi rtog pa'am nges pa la rgyu ma yin te /
translated: The sense faculty or the object is not the cause of the conception or ascertainment of consciousness.

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is because they are not specific.

original: gcig bskyed pa na gzhan la yang nges pa la /
analyzed: gcig bskyed pa na gzhan la yang nges pa la /
translated: When one is produced, there is ascertainment of the other.

original: gal te skyed byed kyis nges par byed na /
analyzed: gal te skyed byed kyis nges par byed na /
translated: If the producer causes ascertainment,

original: skyed byed @116b ma yin pas cher byed do snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: skyed byed @116b ma yin pas cher byed do snyam du sems pa la /
translated: one thinks that the nonproducer causes ascertainment.

original: de las te dbang po la sogs pa la nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid yod na /
analyzed: de las te dbang po la sogs pa la nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid yod na /
translated: If the nature of the sense faculties, etc.

original: don thams cad la thun mong pa'i shes pa la nges te /
analyzed: don thams cad la thun mong pa'i shes pa la nges te /
translated: were to be experienced, then it would definitely be a cognition that is common to all objects.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'gyur ba yin pa gang gi yul so so la rnam par 'byed pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'gyur ba yin pa gang gi yul so so la rnam par 'byed pa ste /
translated: It would be naturally inclined to engage its own object,

original: nges par 'byed pa'i shes pa ni /
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i shes pa ni /
translated: and the cognition that discerns it

original: dbang po la sogs pa las de lta bu'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes khas blangs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa las de lta bu'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes khas blangs pa yin gyi /
translated: would be the cognition that discerns the nature of the sense faculties, etc.

original: gzhan las ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan las ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it would not be from another.

original: grangs can pa'i zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste grangs can la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: grangs can pa'i zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste grangs can la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word “Sāṃkhya” is a synecdoche, meaning “Sāṃkhya and so on.”

original: rnam par gzhag par 'os pa yang zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzhag par 'dod pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag par 'os pa yang zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzhag par 'dod pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: “Suitable to be posited” is connected to “desired to be posited.”

original: de la zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba la'o //
translated: “In that” refers to experience.

original: rtogs byed dang rtogs byed ma yin pa ma yin pa ni yul gyi dbye ba yin yang /
analyzed: rtogs byed dang rtogs byed ma yin pa ma yin pa ni yul gyi dbye ba yin yang /
translated: Although the distinction of objects is not the distinguisher and the distinguished,

original: rang gi 'dod pa'i dbye ba ma yin pas mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pa'i dbye ba ma yin pas mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that it is unreasonable because it is not the division of one’s own desire is:

original: ji ste de ni rtogs byed dngos //
analyzed: ji ste de ni rtogs byed dngos //
translated: If it is the realizer of that,

original: zhes bya ba'o //🔽de'i phyir / gcig la rtogs byed yin pa ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o // de'i phyir / gcig la rtogs byed yin pa ni //
translated: it is said.🔽Therefore,

original: gzhan la yang zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan la yang zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: the teaching that the realizer of one is also of another is:

original: des na 'jal byed ma yin pa ma yin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: des na 'jal byed ma yin pa ma yin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that it is not the comprehender.

original: rtogs byed ma yin pa ni gzhan la yang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtogs byed ma yin pa ni gzhan la yang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not the realizer of another.

original: blo ni rnam pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir 'di rnam par gzhag pa yin gyi /
analyzed: blo ni rnam pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir 'di rnam par gzhag pa yin gyi /
translated: Because the mind is with aspects, this is the presentation.🔽It is not the experience.🔽The statement that it is not the experience is:

original: nyams su myong ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni blo dang bde ba la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni blo dang bde ba la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The mind and pleasure, etc.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: The self is one’s own nature.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo mngon du byed pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo mngon du byed pa ste /
translated: Thus is the manifestation of its nature.

original: skyes bu'i don la 'gyur gyi blo ci zhig bya /
analyzed: skyes bu'i don la 'gyur gyi blo ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the use of the mind for the purpose of the person?🔽The teaching of that is:

original: de bstan pa ni don nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni don nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The object itself, etc.

original: shin tu stabs yin na thag ring ba rtogs par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni yun ring po can ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu stabs yin na thag ring ba rtogs par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni yun ring po can ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it were very close, it would not be perceived as distant.🔽From what?

original: gang las she na zhes bya ba ni 'di rtogs pa la ltos pa'o //🔽gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni rig byed kyi mtha'i dgongs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: gang las she na zhes bya ba ni 'di rtogs pa la ltos pa'o // gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni rig byed kyi mtha'i dgongs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba ni /
translated: The other is the intended meaning of the Vedānta.🔽Otherwise, how could a single entity

original: de lta min na sna tshogs kyi //🔽ngo bor snang can dngos gcig la //
analyzed: de lta min na sna tshogs kyi // ngo bor snang can dngos gcig la //
translated: with a variegated nature

original: rnam par ji ltar bden 'gyur te //
analyzed: rnam par ji ltar bden 'gyur te //
translated: be real?

original: gcig pa nyid de nyams phyir ro //🔽zhes bya bar 'dor ro //
analyzed: gcig pa nyid de nyams phyir ro // zhes bya bar 'dor ro //
translated: Because its oneness would be lost.🔽Isn’t the ascertainment of objects from the eye and so on just from the consciousness that they produce?🔽If the ear and so on🔽are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.

original: mig la sogs pa las yul nges pa ni de'i bskyed bya'i shes pa nyid las ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa las yul nges pa ni de'i bskyed bya'i shes pa nyid las ma yin nam zhes zer ba ni /
translated: If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.

original: gal te rna ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rna ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.🔽If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.

original: gal te yang mig la sogs pa ni yul gyi nges pa skyes pa yin yang /
analyzed: gal te yang mig la sogs pa ni yul gyi nges pa skyes pa yin yang /
translated: If the eye and so on are produced from the object,

original: de'i bskyed bya ni de med @117a * //
analyzed: de'i bskyed bya ni de med @117a * //
translated: then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.

original: na mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: na mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.🔽If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.🔽If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.🔽If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.🔽If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.🔽If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.🔽If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.🔽If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.🔽If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness that they produce.🔽If the eye and so on are produced from the object,🔽then the ascertainment of the object is from the consciousness

original: nges 'dzin pa'i dbye ba la khyad par las ni ma yin te s'a lu dang nas la sogs pa'i sa bon tha dad pa la des skyed pa nyid tsam gyi myu gu la tha dad pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'bras bu'i tha dad pa mthong ba las
analyzed: nges 'dzin pa'i dbye ba la khyad par las ni ma yin te s'a lu dang nas la sogs pa'i sa bon tha dad pa la des skyed pa nyid tsam gyi myu gu la tha dad pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'bras bu'i tha dad pa mthong ba las
translated: The division of the apprehender is not due to a difference in seeds, such as rice and barley, because a sprout that is merely produced by that is not different.

original: rang bzhin tha dad pa yod par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad pa yod par bstan pa ni /
translated: However, the existence of a difference in nature is shown by the observation of a difference in effect.

original: bdag nyid gyur min zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid gyur min zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The statement “it is not a transformation of itself” means

original: rang la yod pa'i khyad par med pas mig gi bskyed bya ni gzugs bzhin du reg pa la sogs pa la yang 'dzin du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang la yod pa'i khyad par med pas mig gi bskyed bya ni gzugs bzhin du reg pa la sogs pa la yang 'dzin du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that because there is no difference in the eye that exists in itself, the object of the eye, such as form, would also be apprehended by touch and so on.

original: de'i yul can yin pa'i phyir de'i 'dzin byed nyid yin zhes bya ba 'di la yang dbye ba med de /
analyzed: de'i yul can yin pa'i phyir de'i 'dzin byed nyid yin zhes bya ba 'di la yang dbye ba med de /
translated: This also has no division in that it is the apprehender of that because it is the object of that.

original: shes pa la byed pa po yin pa'i phyir nges par byed pa nyid ni rnam par 'byed pa nyid kyis yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa la byed pa po yin pa'i phyir nges par byed pa nyid ni rnam par 'byed pa nyid kyis yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement “the definite activity is shown by the division” means that because consciousness is the agent, the definite activity is shown by the division.

original: rnam pa dang bcas par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “because it follows that it has aspects” means🔽that because it is the apprehender of that, it is the object of that.

original: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam shes gzugs dang reg pa la sogs pa las kyang ngo //🔽don ma shes na zhes bya ba ni nges pas so //
analyzed: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam shes gzugs dang reg pa la sogs pa las kyang ngo // don ma shes na zhes bya ba ni nges pas so //
translated: “In that very way” means that the eye consciousness is also from form, contact, etc.🔽“If the object is not known” means by means of ascertainment.

original: nges par shes par byed pa nyid yin par zer ba ni /
analyzed: nges par shes par byed pa nyid yin par zer ba ni /
translated: As for the claim that it is the illuminator,

original: snang ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “like a lamp” is the example.

original: shes par byed pa zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: shes par byed pa zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: “Illuminator” refers to the eye, etc.🔽Since the illumination is not of the nature of awareness, how can it be known by a cognition that is devoid of aspects?

original: snang ba gsal ba yang rig pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i rnam pa med pa'i shes pas ji ltar rig par byed ces bya ba'i phyogs nyid la 'di bstan pa ni //
analyzed: snang ba gsal ba yang rig pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i rnam pa med pa'i shes pas ji ltar rig par byed ces bya ba'i phyogs nyid la 'di bstan pa ni //
translated: The response to this objection is as follows:

original: ma yin te de dag la yang zhes bya bya'o //
analyzed: ma yin te de dag la yang zhes bya bya'o //
translated: “No, because they also” refers to the eye, etc.

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni sgra dang ro la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni sgra dang ro la sogs pa'o //
translated: “In every case” refers to sound, taste, etc.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: “This” refers to the experience.

original: mig gi shes pa'i bya ba'i ngo bo de las kyang don la shes pa nyid 'bras bu yin pa de'i phyir nges pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: mig gi shes pa'i bya ba'i ngo bo de las kyang don la shes pa nyid 'bras bu yin pa de'i phyir nges pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The eye consciousness is the nature of the activity of the eye. From that, the object is known. That is the effect. Therefore, it is ascertained.

original: de'i phyir 'dir bdag ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir bdag ces bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, here, the so-called self,

original: rtog pa nyid kho na yin pa'i shes pa dbang po las skyes pa yin du zin kyang bya ba'i ngo bo gzhan gyis ci zhig bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtog pa nyid kho na yin pa'i shes pa dbang po las skyes pa yin du zin kyang bya ba'i ngo bo gzhan gyis ci zhig bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: even though it is a cognition arisen from a sense faculty, is just a conceptualization. What is the use of another entity called an action?

original: 'di'i rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa 'di'i'o //
analyzed: 'di'i rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa 'di'i'o //
translated: The so-called realization of this is of this cognition.

original: byed pa ni bya ba'i'o //🔽de zhes bya ba ni byed pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa ni bya ba'i'o // de zhes bya ba ni byed pa'o //
translated: The action is of the action.🔽The so-called that is the agent.

original: de'i sgrub byed can du zhes bya ba ni des sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sgrub byed can du zhes bya ba ni des sgrub pa'o //
translated: The so-called having that as its object is established by that.

original: rtog pa nyid kho na shes pa yin pa ni don gyi rnam pa dang bral ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: rtog pa nyid kho na shes pa yin pa ni don gyi rnam pa dang bral ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The thought is that cognition itself, devoid of the aspect of the object, is just a conceptualization.

original: 'di ni don dang 'brel byed pa //
analyzed: 'di ni don dang 'brel byed pa //
translated: It is connected with the object.

original: zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: This is what is said.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni shes pa nyid de shes pa yod na nges par yod pas 'di'i rang bzhin du brjod de /
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni shes pa nyid de shes pa yod na nges par yod pas 'di'i rang bzhin du brjod de /
translated: The so-called other is just cognition. When cognition exists, it definitely exists, so it is called its nature.

original: dper na mi dmigs pa la brjod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mi dmigs pa la brjod pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like what is said about non-apprehension.

original: @117b rnam 'gas zhes bya ba ni 'di rtogs so zhes bya ba'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: @117b rnam 'gas zhes bya ba ni 'di rtogs so zhes bya ba'i rnam pas so //
translated: The so-called by what means is by the means of this realization.

original: shes pa'i rang gi dbye ba las //
analyzed: shes pa'i rang gi dbye ba las //
translated: from the division of consciousness itself.

original: zhes 'dod pa ni don bzhin du rnam pa yang /
analyzed: zhes 'dod pa ni don bzhin du rnam pa yang /
translated: The form of the object is like the object,

original: rnam pa gzhan la ltos pas thug pa med pa yongs su spang ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan la ltos pas thug pa med pa yongs su spang ba'i don du'o //
translated: in order to avoid the infinite regress of the dependence of one form on another.

original: rgyu rnams la nye ba gang gis don gyi rnam pa'i shes pa yin pa de nyid kyis de nyid 'dzin par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: rgyu rnams la nye ba gang gis don gyi rnam pa'i shes pa yin pa de nyid kyis de nyid 'dzin par byed pa yin na /
translated: If the consciousness is the form of the object because of the proximity of the cause, then it is that very consciousness which apprehends the object.

original: rnam pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: rnam pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ba la /
translated: What is the use of the form?

original: de phyir gzhal bya rtogs bya'i zhes bya ba smos te //
analyzed: de phyir gzhal bya rtogs bya'i zhes bya ba smos te //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “The object is that which is to be cognized.”

original: rang gi rig pa kho na don rig pa yin gyi bdag nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rang gi rig pa kho na don rig pa yin gyi bdag nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin la /
translated: It is the self-awareness itself which is the awareness of the object, not something related to the self.

original: shes pa'i bdag nyid yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa'i bdag nyid yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is of the nature of consciousness.

original: gzhan yin na zhes bya ba ni don gyi bdag nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: gzhan yin na zhes bya ba ni don gyi bdag nyid yin na'o //
translated: If it were different,

original: shes pa'i bdag nyid la yang shes pa de'i las dang 'brel pa ni de las dang 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: shes pa'i bdag nyid la yang shes pa de'i las dang 'brel pa ni de las dang 'brel pa yin no //
translated: if it were of the nature of the object, then the consciousness would not be related to the object.🔽The meaning is that it would not be related to the object.

original: mngon du byed pa nyid ces bya ba ni nye bar brjod pa'o //
analyzed: mngon du byed pa nyid ces bya ba ni nye bar brjod pa'o //
translated: The word “only” is for the purpose of exclusion.

original: gzhan 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ni mngon du byed pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ni mngon du byed pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa'o //
translated: “Some others” means those that are not of the nature of manifestation.🔽If you think that the activity of consciousness is not a distinct nature of activity, how is it determined in the object?

original: gal te rnam par shes pa de'i bya ba rtogs pa ni byed pa'i ngo bo khyad par can ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar las la nges pa yin no snyam du sems pa la rnam pa dang ldan pa'i shes pa las bya ba tha mi dad pa'i bya
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa de'i bya ba rtogs pa ni byed pa'i ngo bo khyad par can ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar las la nges pa yin no snyam du sems pa la rnam pa dang ldan pa'i shes pa las bya ba tha mi dad pa'i bya
translated: The activity that is not distinct from the consciousness that possesses an aspect

original: ba rnam pa dang ldan pa yin na /
analyzed: ba rnam pa dang ldan pa yin na /
translated: has the aspect.

original: rang nyid nges pa can yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang nyid nges pa can yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: To show that it is itself determined,

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid yin la /
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid yin la /
translated: he says, “That also,” which is the nature of the object of knowledge.

original: de'i ste shes pa'i bya ba'i'o //
analyzed: de'i ste shes pa'i bya ba'i'o //
translated: “That” refers to the activity of consciousness.

original: bdag nyid du gyur pa nyid byed pa dang ldan pa dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid du gyur pa nyid byed pa dang ldan pa dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because the activity that is not distinct from those that possess the nature of activity is itself determined.

original: don gzhan min pa zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: don gzhan min pa zhes bya ba ni //
translated: “Not a different object” means

original: rnam pa las tha mi dad pa'i rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa las tha mi dad pa'i rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that the activity is not distinct from the aspect.

original: rnam shes ni sngon po rig par byed pa yin par khas blangs nas rnam pa nges par byed par 'dod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam shes ni sngon po rig par byed pa yin par khas blangs nas rnam pa nges par byed par 'dod pa ma yin nam /
translated: Don’t you accept that consciousness is what cognizes blue, and that the aspect is what determines it?

original: de yang tshogs pa gcig dang 'brel pa can nyid yin na rnam pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de yang tshogs pa gcig dang 'brel pa can nyid yin na rnam pas ci zhig bya /
translated: And if it is related to a single collection, what is the use of the aspect?

original: 'di ltar bde ba ni dbyibs can ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar bde ba ni dbyibs can ma yin la /
translated: In this way, pleasure is not a shape,

original: shes pas ni sngon po'i dbyibs can du rig pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /🔽bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pas ni sngon po'i dbyibs can du rig pa yin no snyam du sems pa la / bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: but consciousness is what cognizes the shape of blue.

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi don rig par byed pa ni bden te /
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi don rig par byed pa ni bden te /
translated: The meaning of “having an aspect” is that it is what cognizes the object.

original: de'i tshe yang nges pa kho na yin te thal ches pa yang gzhan gyis rnam pa med pa nyid kho na rig par byed pa khas blangs pas //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang nges pa kho na yin te thal ches pa yang gzhan gyis rnam pa med pa nyid kho na rig par byed pa khas blangs pas //
translated: That is true, but even then, it is only ascertained, and the absurd consequence is that the opponent accepts that only the absence of aspect is what cognizes.

original: de'i gcig pa nyid kho na khas blangs pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de'i gcig pa nyid kho na khas blangs pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: The point of the explanation is that he accepts that it is only one.

original: bde ba'i rnam pa rig pa ni sngon po la ma yin te 'gal ba'i phyir dang / de tsam gyi mthar @118a * //
analyzed: bde ba'i rnam pa rig pa ni sngon po la ma yin te 'gal ba'i phyir dang / de tsam gyi mthar @118a * //
translated: The aspect of pleasure is not cognized in blue because they are contradictory, and it is not cognized in the mere object of knowledge because it is not its nature.🔽

original: thug pa'i phyir bde ba dang cig shos dag gi gcig ma yin no //
analyzed: thug pa'i phyir bde ba dang cig shos dag gi gcig ma yin no //
translated: The aspect of pleasure is not in blue, because they are contradictory, and because pleasure and its opposite are not the same, since they are limited to just that much.

original: khyad par bzhin du khyad par du byas pa'i ngo bo khas blangs pas bdag ma yin pa rig pa ni bdag ma yin pa kho nas rig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khyad par bzhin du khyad par du byas pa'i ngo bo khas blangs pas bdag ma yin pa rig pa ni bdag ma yin pa kho nas rig pa'i phyir /
translated: Since you accept the nature qualified by the distinction, the cognition of what is not the self is only the cognition of what is not the self.

original: ji ltar bdag ni bde ba'i rgyu nyid du don la 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: ji ltar bdag ni bde ba'i rgyu nyid du don la 'dzin pa yin /
translated: How can the self be apprehended as the cause of pleasure?

original: don gyi rnam pa nyid yin na ni rigs pa yin la /
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa nyid yin na ni rigs pa yin la /
translated: If it were the aspect of the object, that would be reasonable.🔽Otherwise, it would be just that.

original: gzhan du na de nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni gal te don gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na de nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni gal te don gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not the aspect of the object, why is it apprehended as the object?

original: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i rnam pa ma yin pa nyid gnyi ga yang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i rnam pa ma yin pa nyid gnyi ga yang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not the aspect of that, and because there is no difference between the two.

original: gal te bde ba'i rnam pa sngon po la ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te bde ba'i rnam pa sngon po la ma yin na /
translated: If the aspect of pleasure is not in blue,

original: de yang rang la med pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang rang la med pa yin te /
translated: then it does not exist in itself.

original: byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradictory to be an agent.

original: de nas 'bras bu med cing de dang ldan pa yang med par zer ba ni /🔽de ni de yi rang gi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: de nas 'bras bu med cing de dang ldan pa yang med par zer ba ni / de ni de yi rang gi ngo bo nyid //
translated: Then, when it is said that there is no effect and that there is no one who possesses it,

original: ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ste /
translated: it is said:🔽That is its own nature.

original: de'i shes pa'i rig pa yin gyi byed pa ni ma yin te tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i shes pa'i rig pa yin gyi byed pa ni ma yin te tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the awareness of that, not the activity, because there is no difference.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: That is the nature of the object of cognition.

original: 'dzin pa de zhes bya ba ni shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa de zhes bya ba ni shes pa'o //
translated: That apprehension is the cognition.

original: don rtogs pa'i bdag nyid de ngo bo med pa gang gi yin pa des byed pa dang bcas pa lta bur zhes bya ba ni ldan pa lta bur snang ba de dang bral ba nyid yin na yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don rtogs pa'i bdag nyid de ngo bo med pa gang gi yin pa des byed pa dang bcas pa lta bur zhes bya ba ni ldan pa lta bur snang ba de dang bral ba nyid yin na yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That which is the nature of the realization of the object, if it were to be as if it possessed activity, that is, if it were to appear as if it were endowed with that, then even though it is devoid of that,

original: rang gi las la zhes bya ba ni sngon po la sogs pa'i phyi rol la'o //
analyzed: rang gi las la zhes bya ba ni sngon po la sogs pa'i phyi rol la'o //
translated: with regard to its own object, that is, external objects such as blue,

original: kha cig ni 'dzin pa de ni ste de dang 'dra ba'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni 'dzin pa de ni ste de dang 'dra ba'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: some say that apprehension is the teaching of the reason that is similar to that.

original: don rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni byed pa dang bcas pa lta bur snang bas ni rang gi las la ste /
analyzed: don rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni byed pa dang bcas pa lta bur snang bas ni rang gi las la ste /
translated: “By the nature of the realization of the object” means that it appears as if it has an agent, and it is with regard to its own object,

original: rang gi rnam pa la'o //
analyzed: rang gi rnam pa la'o //
translated: with regard to its own form.

original: byed pas ni rang gi rig pas so //
analyzed: byed pas ni rang gi rig pas so //
translated: “By the agent” means by its own awareness.

original: 'di nyid phyi rol yin no zhes tha mi dad par mngon par zhen pas rnam par rig pa nyid phyi rol rig pa zhes bya ba ni rigs par mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid phyi rol yin no zhes tha mi dad par mngon par zhen pas rnam par rig pa nyid phyi rol rig pa zhes bya ba ni rigs par mthong ba yin no //
translated: “It is seen to be reasonable that consciousness itself is external cognition,” because of the non-differentiation of “this itself is external.”

original: de'i dbang gis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: de'i dbang gis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa'i dbang gis so //
translated: “By the power of that” means by the power of the form.

original: der gzhag phyir zhes bya ba ni rtogs par rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: der gzhag phyir zhes bya ba ni rtogs par rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i tshad ma yin no //
translated: “In order to posit it as that” means that it is a valid cognition that posits it in order to establish it.

original: bdag nyid ni rang nyid du gyur pa'i rtogs pa'i byed pa po ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: bdag nyid ni rang nyid du gyur pa'i rtogs pa'i byed pa po ma yin pa'am /
translated: “The agent of the realization that is itself” means that it is not itself the agent,

original: bdag nyid kyi byed pa po ni 'bras bu gzhan nyid du 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi byed pa po ni 'bras bu gzhan nyid du 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: or the agent of itself is the reason for positing the effect as different. This is the meaning.

original: de lta de ltar zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pas ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i tha snyad la dgongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta de ltar zhes bya ba ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pas ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i tha snyad la dgongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, thus is because there is no intention in the convention What is it? with respect to blue, yellow, etc.

original: 'bras bu yang don rig pa ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu yang don rig pa ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: And how is the effect also the cognition of the object?

original: don gyi @118b rnam pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: don gyi @118b rnam pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The aspect of the object.

original: bar gyi tshig phyi bas ba lang gi shing rta lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bar gyi tshig phyi bas ba lang gi shing rta lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The middle word is elided, like in the expression ox-cart.

original: gal te 'dor ba la sogs pa'i byed pa ni rigs pas rnam par gzhag pa yang ci'i phyir dngos su ba ma yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: gal te 'dor ba la sogs pa'i byed pa ni rigs pas rnam par gzhag pa yang ci'i phyir dngos su ba ma yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If the function of abandoning, etc. is established by reasoning, why is it not directly perceived?

original: dngos su ba'i mngon sum la rigs pa chen po ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dngos su ba'i mngon sum la rigs pa chen po ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that direct perception is not a great reasoning:

original: gang gi tshe sngon po myong ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sngon po myong ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When the experience of blue, etc.

original: de dang de ma yin pa'i rnam pa ni sngon po dang cig shos kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de dang de ma yin pa'i rnam pa ni sngon po dang cig shos kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: The aspect of that and not that is the aspect of blue and the other.

original: de dang 'dra ba nyid kyis bskyed pa nyid la brda'i dbang gis nger 'dzin pa'i tha snyad 'dogs pa yin gyi gzhan la ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba nyid kyis bskyed pa nyid la brda'i dbang gis nger 'dzin pa'i tha snyad 'dogs pa yin gyi gzhan la ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that the convention of grasping a definite object is applied by the power of a sign to that which is produced by the same kind, but not to anything else.

original: dper na 'bras bu zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dper na 'bras bu zhes bya ba ste /
translated: For example, it is called a result.

original: 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni tha snyad 'dogs pa la rgyu mtshan te /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni tha snyad 'dogs pa la rgyu mtshan te /
translated: The reason for the designation is because it arises.

original: rgyu bag chags kyi nus pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rgyu bag chags kyi nus pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is connected with the cause called the power of habitual tendencies.

original: ma mthong ba la ni don gyi nus pa nyid yin te bag chags med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ma mthong ba la ni don gyi nus pa nyid yin te bag chags med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that in the case of not seeing, it is the power of the object itself, because there are no habitual tendencies.

original: 'o na sngon ma mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na sngon ma mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, “If it is not seen before.”

original: ma mthong ba dang ma thos pa bzhin du /
analyzed: ma mthong ba dang ma thos pa bzhin du /
translated: Like not seeing and not hearing,

original: mthong ba la yang dngos su'am /
analyzed: mthong ba la yang dngos su'am /
translated: in seeing, too, there is understanding as something uncommon, either directly or

original: gzhan du yang thun mong ma yin pa nyid du go ba yin par bstan pa ni 'di ltar bag chags las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du yang thun mong ma yin pa nyid du go ba yin par bstan pa ni 'di ltar bag chags las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: indirectly. It is taught that it is like this: “From habitual tendencies.”

original: mthong ba dang dbang po dang 'brel ba'i khyad par gyi shes pa dam pa'i don gyi rgyu rnams la yang rnam par 'jog par byed pa nyid las rtog pa tshad ma nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mthong ba dang dbang po dang 'brel ba'i khyad par gyi shes pa dam pa'i don gyi rgyu rnams la yang rnam par 'jog par byed pa nyid las rtog pa tshad ma nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that conceptual cognition is not a valid cognition is made in terms of its being a cause in the ultimate sense of a cognition that is related to a sense faculty and a sense object.

original: de'i phyir mthong ba dang zhes bya ba ni rtog pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba dang zhes bya ba ni rtog pa can ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not a conceptual cognition,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa yin yang rnam par 'jog par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa yin yang rnam par 'jog par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: because even though it produces the effect of conceptual cognition, it is not a determiner.

original: gal te mthong ba la sogs pa yang rnam pa bzhin du rtogs pa dang rnam par gzhag pa dag snga ma dang phyi ma dag med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la snga ma dang phyi ma med kyang byed pa dang / cig shos la sogs pa 'jig rten pa ma yin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /🔽thams cad nye bar sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: gal te mthong ba la sogs pa yang rnam pa bzhin du rtogs pa dang rnam par gzhag pa dag snga ma dang phyi ma dag med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la snga ma dang phyi ma med kyang byed pa dang / cig shos la sogs pa 'jig rten pa ma yin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni / thams cad nye bar sbyor ba ni /
translated: If one thinks that seeing, etc., like the aspects, would not have a prior and subsequent end if they were to be cognized and determined in the same way, the statement that the prior and subsequent end do not exist even though they are not worldly is made in order to show that the prior and subsequent end do not exist even though they are not worldly.🔽The application of all🔽means simultaneously.

original: cig car zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cig car zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of “at once.”

original: mtha'i tha dad par byed pa 'jig rten la grags pas grub pa yin par bstan pa ni dbang po la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mtha'i tha dad par byed pa 'jig rten la grags pas grub pa yin par bstan pa ni dbang po la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching that the difference of the final is established by what is accepted in the world is “the sense faculties, etc.”

original: nyams pa med pa yang shes pa tsam las go ba ma yin par bstan pa ni dbang po zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: nyams pa med pa yang shes pa tsam las go ba ma yin par bstan pa ni dbang po zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The teaching that the non-deficiency is also not understood from mere cognition is “the sense faculties, etc.”

original: rnam pa yang nges pas tshad mar rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //🔽gzhan gyi sun dbyung ba bstan pa ni ma yin te /🔽mngon sum @119a * //
analyzed: rnam pa yang nges pas tshad mar rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o // gzhan gyi sun dbyung ba bstan pa ni ma yin te / mngon sum @119a * //
translated: The assertion is that the aspect is also determined by the valid cognition that establishes it.

original: gyi tshad ma'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gyi tshad ma'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The teaching of the refutation of others is “direct perception, etc.”

original: rang nyid kyis de'i rnam par 'jog par mi byed na /
analyzed: rang nyid kyis de'i rnam par 'jog par mi byed na /
translated: The meaning is that if one does not establish the aspect by oneself,

original: yul de la nges par mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yul de la nges par mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it is not reasonable to be certain about that object.

original: rnam par gzhag pa las phyir 'byung ba'i nges pa ni ma goms pa na ltos pa yin gyi /🔽rnam par gzhag pa nyid la ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa las phyir 'byung ba'i nges pa ni ma goms pa na ltos pa yin gyi / rnam par gzhag pa nyid la ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The certainty that arises from the presentation is dependent on lack of familiarity,

original: gzhan gyi byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: but not on the presentation itself. The teaching is “not the activity of another.”

original: rnam pa'i dus su dbang po yod pa ji ltar gzhan ma yin pa ma yin zer ba la /
analyzed: rnam pa'i dus su dbang po yod pa ji ltar gzhan ma yin pa ma yin zer ba la /
translated: How can the sense faculty that exists at the time of the aspect not be different from the sense faculty that exists at the time of the object?

original: kun gyi mtshungs rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: kun gyi mtshungs rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reason is “because it is the common cause of all.”

original: de de'i tshe yod kyang tshad ma gzhan la yang yod pa'i phyir rnam par gzhag par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de de'i tshe yod kyang tshad ma gzhan la yang yod pa'i phyir rnam par gzhag par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: Even though it exists at that time, it is not the cause of the establishment of the aspect because it also exists in other valid cognitions.

original: rnam pa ni de lta bu ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa ni de lta bu ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the aspect is not like that.

original: de tha dad kyang zhes bya ba ni tshad ma tha dad kyang ngo //
analyzed: de tha dad kyang zhes bya ba ni tshad ma tha dad kyang ngo //
translated: Even though they are different means even though the valid cognitions are different.

original: tha dad med ni dbang po de'i'o //
analyzed: tha dad med ni dbang po de'i'o //
translated: The sense faculty is not different from that.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: This means the result of the nature of valid cognition.🔽Even though the sense faculty is different from the valid cognition, it is not different from the aspect.

original: 'bras bu re re la dbang po yang rnam pa bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan kho na yin no zhes zer ba ni /🔽gal te sngon po dang ser po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu re re la dbang po yang rnam pa bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan kho na yin no zhes zer ba ni / gal te sngon po dang ser po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The sense faculty is not different from the aspect.🔽If you say that the sense faculty is different from the valid cognition, then you must also say that the sense faculty is different from the aspect.🔽If you say that the sense faculty is not different from the aspect, then you must also say that the valid cognition is not different from the aspect.

original: dbang po'i mngon du phyogs pa'i khyad par byed par 'dod pas kyang rnam pa'i khyad par btsal bar bya dgos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dbang po'i mngon du phyogs pa'i khyad par byed par 'dod pas kyang rnam pa'i khyad par btsal bar bya dgos pa'i phyir /
translated: If you say that the sense faculty is not different from the aspect, then you must also say that the valid cognition is not different from the aspect.🔽If you say that the sense faculty is not different from the aspect, then you must also say that the valid cognition is not different from the aspect.🔽If you say that the sense faculty is not different from the aspect, then you must also say that the valid cognition is not different from the aspect.🔽If you say that the sense faculty is not different from the aspect, then you must also say that the valid cognition is not different from the aspect.🔽If you say that the sense faculty is not different from the aspect, then you must also say that the valid cognition is not different from the aspect.🔽If you say that the sense faculty is not different from the aspect, then you must also say that the valid cognition is not different from the aspect.🔽If you say that the sense faculty is not different from the aspect, then you must also say that the valid cognition is not different from the aspect.🔽If you say that the sense faculty is not different from the aspect, then you must also say that the valid cognition is not different from the aspect.🔽If you say that the sense faculty is not different from the aspect, then you must also say that the valid cognition is not different from the aspect.🔽If you say that the sense faculty is not different from the aspect, then you

original: de nyid nang gi yan lag yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid nang gi yan lag yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not taught that this is an internal part.

original: mngon du phyogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon du phyogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called “approaching.”

original: de yang de'i rnam par gzhag par byed pa la de'i rnam pa nyid kho na mdun du byed pa yin gyi khas blangs pa 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang de'i rnam par gzhag par byed pa la de'i rnam pa nyid kho na mdun du byed pa yin gyi khas blangs pa 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, in order to establish that, only the aspect of that is made present, not just the assertion,

original: nang gi yan lag dang cig shos su 'byed pa'i gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nang gi yan lag dang cig shos su 'byed pa'i gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is the occasion of distinguishing the internal part and the other.

original: tha ma'i tha dad byed gang ste /
analyzed: tha ma'i tha dad byed gang ste /
translated: What is the final distinction?

original: de yi sgrub byed dam par 'dod //
analyzed: de yi sgrub byed dam par 'dod //
translated: It is asserted to be the best means of establishing that.

original: ces bya ba'o //🔽de la nyams myong tsam du ni //🔽'dra ba'i bdag can shes pa ni //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o // de la nyams myong tsam du ni // 'dra ba'i bdag can shes pa ni //
translated: This is what is said.🔽There, is it not inference,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su dpag pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su dpag pa ma yin nam /
translated: such as “The cognition having the nature of similarity is merely an experience”?

original: mngon sum yang rnam pa la don nyid du lhag par mos pa yin gyi rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum la 'gal ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: mngon sum yang rnam pa la don nyid du lhag par mos pa yin gyi rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum la 'gal ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: Is it not direct perception, because it is the superior belief in the object itself in the aspect? Inference is not contradictory to direct perception.

original: gal te don gyi rnam pa'i don nyid yin gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te don gyi rnam pa'i don nyid yin gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the aspect of the object is the object itself, then it is not the object itself.

original: rnam pa'i shes pa nyid mngon sum kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam pa'i shes pa nyid mngon sum kho na yin gyi /
translated: The consciousness that has the aspect is direct perception alone,

original: lkog tu ma gyur ba'i phyir lhag par mos pa nyid ni rjes su dpag pa yin te /
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur ba'i phyir lhag par mos pa nyid ni rjes su dpag pa yin te /
translated: because it is not hidden. The conviction that it is so is inference,

original: de'i bdag nyid 'dzin pa de don rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid 'dzin pa de don rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni /
translated: because it is said that the apprehension of that nature is the nature of the realization of the object.

original: de las bzlog pa rtogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa rtogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The opposite of that is called “realization.”

original: bems po'i @119b ngo bo nyid du zhes zer ba bsal ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bems po'i @119b ngo bo nyid du zhes zer ba bsal ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the nature of the object is refuted,

original: rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: because it is said to be the nature of realization.🔽It is not that the nature of the object is refuted,🔽because it is said to be the nature of realization.

original: bems po'i ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bems po'i ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not the nature of the object that is refuted.

original: ci las she na rtogs pa'i ngo bo kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ci las she na rtogs pa'i ngo bo kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: From what? From the nature of realization, which is the nature of color and shape.

original: rnam pa ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is indicated by “except for the aspect.”

original: med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa la ltos nas phyogs gzhan no //
analyzed: med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa la ltos nas phyogs gzhan no //
translated: It would become nonexistent. This is another position based on the hidden.

original: 'o na ni zhes pa lkog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba bsal ba na don ni lkog tu ma gyur nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'o na ni zhes pa lkog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba bsal ba na don ni lkog tu ma gyur nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: “Well then,” the opponent says, “if the object is not hidden, the meaning of ‘not hidden’ is that it is not different from the object.

original: tha dad pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha dad pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not different.”

original: don las kyang lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kyi ngo bo'i shes pa'i khyad par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: don las kyang lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kyi ngo bo'i shes pa'i khyad par bstan pa ni /
translated: The distinctive feature of the cognition of the nature of the object that is not hidden is taught:

original: don gnas na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gnas na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If the object is present.”

original: dbang po'i byed pa las snga rol du don de dang bral ba nyid ni phyis kyang ngo zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po'i byed pa las snga rol du don de dang bral ba nyid ni phyis kyang ngo zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The fact that the object is not separated from it before the activity of the sense faculty is taught:

original: mi gnas pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi gnas pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: “If it is not present.”

original: 'di nyid kyi don gyi 'bras bu nyid kyang brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi don gyi 'bras bu nyid kyang brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The fact that the result of the object is also expressed is taught:

original: des na don yod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na don yod ces bya ba'o //
translated: “Therefore, the object exists.”🔽The fact that this also eliminates nonexistence is taught:

original: de nyid kyi phyir med pa nyid du zhes bya ba yang 'dis ni med pa yang spangs pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir med pa nyid du zhes bya ba yang 'dis ni med pa yang spangs pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Therefore, nonexistence is also eliminated.”

original: gal te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas sngon po la sogs pa las lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa tha dad yin na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas sngon po la sogs pa las lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa tha dad yin na /
translated: If the object is not hidden from blue, etc., by the process of positive and negative concomitance, it is different.

original: shes pa rnam pa med par smra ba 'grub po snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: shes pa rnam pa med par smra ba 'grub po snyam du sems pa la /
translated: One might think, The assertion that consciousness is without aspects is established.

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: To this, the text says not imperceptible.

original: nyams su myong bzhin pa'i sngon po la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: nyams su myong bzhin pa'i sngon po la sogs pa ni /
translated: The blue, etc., that is being experienced

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma yin gyi /
translated: is not without concomitance and reversal.

original: 'on kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽phyi rol gyi bems po nyid de las ldog pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to // phyi rol gyi bems po nyid de las ldog pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: But rather, it is to be inferred. This is the meaning.

original: bems po'i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bems po'i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The external, which is matter, is shown to be the opposite of that, and to be contradictory to it, in the words the nature of matter.

original: khyad par dag ces bya ba ni bstan pa'i'o //
analyzed: khyad par dag ces bya ba ni bstan pa'i'o //
translated: The words distinctions refer to the teaching.

original: don nyid do zhes bya ba ni lhag par mos pa'o //
analyzed: don nyid do zhes bya ba ni lhag par mos pa'o //
translated: The words the very object refer to the conviction.

original: rang nyid med pa'i med pa nyams su myong bas gnod par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang nyid med pa'i med pa nyams su myong bas gnod par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not being taught that the experience of nonexistence, which is the absence of itself, is invalidated,

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because of error.

original: mchog go zhes bya ba ni shes bzhin pa ni shes pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag pa yang bag chags kyi yul can yin pa'i phyir dang rtogs pa gzhan mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mchog go zhes bya ba ni shes bzhin pa ni shes pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag pa yang bag chags kyi yul can yin pa'i phyir dang rtogs pa gzhan mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The best means that the object of direct perception is the best, because it is the nature of knowledge, because inference has a habitual object, and because another realization is not tenable.

original: rnam pa dang lkog tu gyur pa nyid dag gis 'dres pa yin pa'i phyir dbye ba med pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa dang lkog tu gyur pa nyid dag gis 'dres pa yin pa'i phyir dbye ba med pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: It is not differentiated because it is mixed with the aspect and the hidden.

original: 'on te don gyi rnam pa ni zhes bya ba'o //🔽gzugs @120a * //
analyzed: 'on te don gyi rnam pa ni zhes bya ba'o // gzugs @120a * //
translated: But the aspect of the object is not seen.

original: brnyan mthong ba bzhin du tha dad pa mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: brnyan mthong ba bzhin du tha dad pa mthong ba yin no //
translated: The form is seen as different, like seeing a reflection.

original: 'dres pa yin gyi gzhan du ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'dres pa yin gyi gzhan du ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is mixed, not otherwise.

original: bzhin la sogs pa med par yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bzhin la sogs pa med par yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even without a face, etc.

original: thams cad kyi tshe zhes bya bas lhan cig dmigs pa'i nges pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshe zhes bya bas lhan cig dmigs pa'i nges pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: At all times means that simultaneous observation is ascertained.

original: rnam pa med pa'i shes pa ni 'dzin byed yin la /
analyzed: rnam pa med pa'i shes pa ni 'dzin byed yin la /
translated: A cognition without an aspect is the apprehender.

original: rnam pa dang ldan pa'i don ni gzung bya yin no zhes bya ba bsal ba ni /
analyzed: rnam pa dang ldan pa'i don ni gzung bya yin no zhes bya ba bsal ba ni /
translated: The meaning of “endowed with aspects” is that it is the object of perception.

original: gal te de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te de lta bur gyur pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase “if it were such” refutes that.

original: yang na dbang po dang don du phrad pa ste ldan pa'i 'du ba la dbye ba med na /
analyzed: yang na dbang po dang don du phrad pa ste ldan pa'i 'du ba la dbye ba med na /
translated: Or else, if there were no distinction in the contact or union with the sense faculty and object,

original: ba lang dang dkar po dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rtogs pa tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ba lang dang dkar po dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rtogs pa tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
translated: then there would be no different cognitions in regard to such things as “cow,” “white,” and “goes.”

original: rgyu tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught by the line:

original: kun gyi mtshungs rgyu yin pa'i phyir //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: kun gyi mtshungs rgyu yin pa'i phyir // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because they are the same cause for all.🔽If you think that, like the gradual production of a sprout, etc.,

original: byed pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir rim gyis skyed pa bzhin du rtogs pa tha dad par byed pa'i nyid du yang 'gyur snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: byed pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir rim gyis skyed pa bzhin du rtogs pa tha dad par byed pa'i nyid du yang 'gyur snyam du sems pa la /
translated: different cognitions would be produced because of the nature of the activity,

original: de tha dad kyang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de tha dad kyang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: the root text states, “Even if they are different.”

original: byed pa'i chos nyid kyis skye ba tha dad kyang bskyed bya'i shes pa ni gsal ba tha dad pa yin yang rtogs pa tsam du khyad par med pa yin la /
analyzed: byed pa'i chos nyid kyis skye ba tha dad kyang bskyed bya'i shes pa ni gsal ba tha dad pa yin yang rtogs pa tsam du khyad par med pa yin la /
translated: Although the different cognitions to be produced are different, the mere realization is not different.

original: gang gi ci zhig yin zhes bya bar ni shes par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi ci zhig yin zhes bya bar ni shes par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of one does not cognize what is of that is that one does not cognize what is of that.
