original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni bskyed bya dang skyed byed la gnas pa'i khyad par med pas dbang po dang phrad pa de'i bskyed byar brjod pa'i mthong ba dang / de'i bskyed bya la sogs pa'i khyad par med pa bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni bskyed bya dang skyed byed la gnas pa'i khyad par med pas dbang po dang phrad pa de'i bskyed byar brjod pa'i mthong ba dang / de'i bskyed bya la sogs pa'i khyad par med pa bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that because there is no difference in the produced and the producer, the seeing that is called the produced of the contact with the sense faculty, and the difference of the produced of that, etc., are explained as not different.

original: shes pa ni nges pa can du zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa ni nges pa can du zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The cognition is ascertained is the intention.

original: ba lang dkar po dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par ni tha dad pas de'i shes pa khyad par du mi byed na ;
analyzed: ba lang dkar po dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par ni tha dad pas de'i shes pa khyad par du mi byed na ;
translated: If the difference of cowhood, etc., such as white cow and going cow, is not made in the cognition,

original: rnam par 'jog par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par 'jog par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: the explanation of not being a distinguisher is:

original: khyad par blo yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par blo yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and the cognition of the particular.

original: de'i dngos po med pa ni ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyid med na phan tshun dbye ba med do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po med pa ni ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyid med na phan tshun dbye ba med do //
translated: The non-existence of that is the non-existence of the form of a cow, etc. If there is no difference between them,

original: khyad par du bya ba'i shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyad par du bya ba'i shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: the cognitions of the particular are also like that. This is shown by

original: de bzhin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “the same way.”

original: de ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i khyad par can gyi blo nyid mi 'grub bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang 'di'i 'di zhes de gang las zhes bya ba bstan zin to //🔽gal te re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i khyad par can gyi blo nyid mi 'grub bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang 'di'i 'di zhes de gang las zhes bya ba bstan zin to // gal te re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The cognition of the particular that is not that is not established. The rest is as explained above.

original: khyad par sngar kho na yin la khyad par du bya ba nyid ni phyis 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs la'o //
analyzed: khyad par sngar kho na yin la khyad par du bya ba nyid ni phyis 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs la'o //
translated: If, on the other hand, the particular is first, and the object of the particular is apprehended later,🔽in that case, the particular would not be the basis.

original: de la brten pa nyid ces bya ba ni khyad @120b par du bya ba la brten pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la brten pa nyid ces bya ba ni khyad @120b par du bya ba la brten pa nyid do //
translated: “The basis” means the basis of the particular.

original: khyad par ni khyad par du bya ba la ltos pa yin la /
analyzed: khyad par ni khyad par du bya ba la ltos pa yin la /
translated: The particular depends on the object of the particular.

original: khyad par du bya ba nyid kyi de la ltos pa yin pas de 'dzin pa na gzung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs la bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par du bya ba nyid kyi de la ltos pa yin pas de 'dzin pa na gzung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs la bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the position.

original: de'i rnam pa 'dzin pa na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa 'dzin pa na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When it apprehends its aspect,🔽at that time,

original: de'i dus su yang zhes bya ba ni khyad par du bya ba rtogs pa'i dus su yang ngo ;
analyzed: de'i dus su yang zhes bya ba ni khyad par du bya ba rtogs pa'i dus su yang ngo ;
translated: when the object to be distinguished is understood,

original: ; gal te khyad par gyi shes pa khyad par du bya ba la byed pa las tshad ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: ; gal te khyad par gyi shes pa khyad par du bya ba la byed pa las tshad ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: if you think that the cognition of the distinction is valid because it functions with respect to the object to be distinguished,

original: bskyed pa ma gtogs pa'i bya ba med pa'i phyir khyad par du bya ba'i shes pa nyid bzhin du de yang yin pa'i phyir gcig don med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bskyed pa ma gtogs pa'i bya ba med pa'i phyir khyad par du bya ba'i shes pa nyid bzhin du de yang yin pa'i phyir gcig don med par bstan pa ni /
translated: then, because there is no function apart from generation, like the cognition of the object to be distinguished, that also is so. Therefore, the uselessness of one is shown:

original: dong gcig yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dong gcig yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If they are the same,

original: rang gi shes pa'i dus kho na la de'i shes pa yang skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang gi shes pa'i dus kho na la de'i shes pa yang skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: at the time of its cognition, the cognition of that also would arise,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no distinction.

original: skyed byed ma yin na de'i byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: skyed byed ma yin na de'i byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: If it is not a generator, it is not its function. This is shown:

original: rim gyis 'byung ba'ang med par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rim gyis 'byung ba'ang med par 'gyur // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The gradual arising would also not exist.

original: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi dus nyid na khyad par 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi dus nyid na khyad par 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: As before means that at the time of the distinction, the distinction is apprehended.

original: shes pa gcig nyid rim gyis 'jug pa yin gyi du ma yin no zhes bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni gcig la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa gcig nyid rim gyis 'jug pa yin gyi du ma yin no zhes bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni gcig la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that it is unreasonable that a single cognition gradually engages and is not multiple is stated in “in one.”

original: gcig dus tha dad par skyed pa 'gal ba yin gyi bzlas pas ni ma yin no zhes zer ba ni bzlas pa'i bye brag gis zhes bya ba'o //🔽shes pa snga ma las phyi ma'i tha dad pa'i ngo bo'am /
analyzed: gcig dus tha dad par skyed pa 'gal ba yin gyi bzlas pas ni ma yin no zhes zer ba ni bzlas pa'i bye brag gis zhes bya ba'o // shes pa snga ma las phyi ma'i tha dad pa'i ngo bo'am /
translated: The statement that it is contradictory to generate a difference in time in one, but not by repetition, is stated in “by the difference of repetition.”🔽If the later cognition apprehends the later entity that is different from the earlier cognition,

original: tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo 'dzin na 'bras bu med pa yin te /🔽thal ches pa'i phyir dang / rjes su brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo 'dzin na 'bras bu med pa yin te / thal ches pa'i phyir dang / rjes su brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: or if it apprehends the later entity that is not different from the earlier cognition, it would be without result.

original: rim gyis byung yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rim gyis byung yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that this is because it is absurd and because it is repetition is stated in “even if it gradually arises.”

original: de dag gi tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa yang yin la /
analyzed: de dag gi tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa yang yin la /
translated: The statement that it is contradictory for them to be both different and not different is stated in “in one.”

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo yang yin pa de dag gi 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can rnams so //
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo yang yin pa de dag gi 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can rnams so //
translated: They are the modes of apprehension of those that are of that nature.

original: rtog pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid phyi ma zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: rtog pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid phyi ma zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: Not conceptual means that it is connected with the latter, which is the nature of realization.

original: ci las she na snga ma dang khyad par med do zhes smos so //
analyzed: ci las she na snga ma dang khyad par med do zhes smos so //
translated: What is the reason? It is said that there is no difference from the former.

original: don gcig nyid yin na rim gyis 'byung ba ma yin du zin kyang cig car 'byung ba yin no zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: don gcig nyid yin na rim gyis 'byung ba ma yin du zin kyang cig car 'byung ba yin no zhes zer ba la /
translated: If they are the same object, even though they do not occur sequentially, they occur simultaneously.

original: blo ni cig car 'byung gyur na //
analyzed: blo ni cig car 'byung gyur na //
translated: If the mind occurs simultaneously,

original: bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par 'gyur //
translated: then there would be no object to be established and an establishment.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is because

original: gnyi ga yang zhes gnas skabs las so //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang zhes gnas skabs las so //
translated: both are in the same situation.

original: lo bo cag gi 'dod pa la ni shes pa'i cha dag ste rnam pa dang rtogs pa dag cig car 'byung yang /
analyzed: lo bo cag gi 'dod pa la ni shes pa'i cha dag ste rnam pa dang rtogs pa dag cig car 'byung yang /
translated: In the assertion of the Vaibhasikas, the aspects and realizations of the parts of consciousness occur simultaneously.

original: de zhes bya ba lung gi rnam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba lung gi rnam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: That is the presentation of scripture.

original: nges pa de'i rten ni rgyu mtshan yin la /
analyzed: nges pa de'i rten ni rgyu mtshan yin la /
translated: The basis of that ascertainment is the reason.

original: de'i yod pa'i phyir nges par bya ba dang nges par @121a * //🔽byed pa'i ngo bos bsgrub bya sgrub byed du gzhag pa ste tha snyad do //
analyzed: de'i yod pa'i phyir nges par bya ba dang nges par @121a * // byed pa'i ngo bos bsgrub bya sgrub byed du gzhag pa ste tha snyad do //
translated: Because of the existence of that, there is the establishment of the object to be established and the means of establishment by way of the nature of the ascertainment and the ascerisher, that is, the conventional.

original: sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i yul nyid la chos dang chos nyid kyi rgyu mtshan bzhin du yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i yul nyid la chos dang chos nyid kyi rgyu mtshan bzhin du yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The object of establishment and the object of refutation are like the reason of the property of the subject and the property of the subject itself.

original: cha dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: cha dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is taught by the words “some part.”

original: dbang po dang don du phrad pa ni dus las dang ngo bo las khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po dang don du phrad pa ni dus las dang ngo bo las khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: The contact of the sense faculty and the object is not distinguished by time and by nature.

original: dbang po dang rdzas la phrad pa dang 'du ba dag dang ldan pa'i 'du ba dang / de'i 'du ba dang de'i khyad par nyid kyang yin la /
analyzed: dbang po dang rdzas la phrad pa dang 'du ba dag dang ldan pa'i 'du ba dang / de'i 'du ba dang de'i khyad par nyid kyang yin la /
translated: The contact and the conjunction of the sense faculty and the substance are the conjunction of the possessor and the possession, and the conjunction of that and the distinction of that.

original: de'i bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'dzin pa'i rgyur khyad par med pa'i phyir 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'dzin pa'i rgyur khyad par med pa'i phyir 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because there is no distinction in the cause of the apprehension of all of that, it follows that there would be apprehension.

original: gang zhig gang las mi 'byung ba de dang phrad pa las gzhan rtogs par sgrub par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gang zhig gang las mi 'byung ba de dang phrad pa las gzhan rtogs par sgrub par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: That which does not arise from something is established as the realization of something else through contact with that. This is what is taught by the words “that which does not arise.”

original: bdag nyid kun gyis 'brel na yang //
analyzed: bdag nyid kun gyis 'brel na yang //
translated: Even if there is a connection with all of itself.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is said.

original: yang na phrad pa ni mthong ba yod na don la nges pa can yin gyi /
analyzed: yang na phrad pa ni mthong ba yod na don la nges pa can yin gyi /
translated: Or, if there is contact, when there is seeing, there is certainty regarding the object,🔽but it is not the cause of seeing.

original: mthong ba'i rgyu ni ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba sel ba ni de lta bu'i gnas skabs las der byung ba yin yang /
analyzed: mthong ba'i rgyu ni ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba sel ba ni de lta bu'i gnas skabs las der byung ba yin yang /
translated: The refutation is that even though it arises from that in such a state,

original: gzhan gyi tshe de las byung ba yin par rtogs par mi nus so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe de las byung ba yin par rtogs par mi nus so //
translated: at another time it cannot be understood to arise from that.

original: de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni /
translated: That is taught:

original: 'brel pa bye brag med phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa bye brag med phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no distinction in the connection.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is said.

original: dbang po dang phrad pa dang 'brel pas phrad pa dang 'du ba'i ngo bo las 'dzin pa yin na thal ches par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po dang phrad pa dang 'brel pas phrad pa dang 'du ba'i ngo bo las 'dzin pa yin na thal ches par bstan pa ni /
translated: If there is apprehension from the nature of contact and connection with the sense faculty, the overextension is taught:

original: gal te sbyor bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te sbyor bas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is by connection.

original: 'dis ni ste don gcig la 'du bas so //
analyzed: 'dis ni ste don gcig la 'du bas so //
translated: This is to say, by the connection of one object.

original: de nyid 'di zhes bya ba ni mig gis bzung ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid 'di zhes bya ba ni mig gis bzung ba nyid do //
translated: That very thing is this, that is apprehended by the eye.

original: 'brel pa la khyad par med pas 'dzin pa la khyad par ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa la khyad par med pas 'dzin pa la khyad par ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because there is no distinction in the connection, there is no distinction in the apprehension. This is taught: Therefore.

original: mig las byung ba'i sngo bsangs nyid 'dzin pa ma yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: mig las byung ba'i sngo bsangs nyid 'dzin pa ma yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The statement, “It is not the apprehension of the blueness that arises from the eye,”

original: snang ba yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is the word “appearance.”

original: dbyibs de dbyibs tsam ni mun par 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbyibs de dbyibs tsam ni mun par 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement, “The shape is the apprehension of the shape as such in the dark,”

original: des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is the word “therefore.”

original: de bden pa yang yin la dbyibs kyang yin pas de'i'o //
analyzed: de bden pa yang yin la dbyibs kyang yin pas de'i'o //
translated: Since that is true and is also a shape, it is “of that.”

original: sgrib par byed pa rdul lam cig shos sel bar byed par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgrib par byed pa rdul lam cig shos sel bar byed par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement, “The obstruction by dust or the removal of the other,”

original: don de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is the word “object.”

original: grub pa'i rnam pa ni des pa can yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: grub pa'i rnam pa ni des pa can yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement, “The aspect of the establishment is the possessor of the aspect,”

original: de'i phyir rnam pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: is the word “therefore.”

original: chos dang chos ma yin par bshad pa'i 'du byed pa 'dod pa dang cig shos kyi yul nyid kyis rnam shes nges par byed par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: chos dang chos ma yin par bshad pa'i 'du byed pa 'dod pa dang cig shos kyi yul nyid kyis rnam shes nges par byed par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement, “The consciousness is ascertained by the object of the virtue and non-virtue that is explained as the composition and the other,”

original: 'du byed las na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'du byed las na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is the word “from the composition.”

original: min zhes bya @121b pa ni nges pa can nyid dgag pa yin no //
analyzed: min zhes bya @121b pa ni nges pa can nyid dgag pa yin no //
translated: The word “not” is the negation of the ascertainment.

original: ci las she na /
analyzed: ci las she na /
translated: What is the action?

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni 'du byed pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni 'du byed pa'o //
translated: “That” refers to the formative forces.

original: de'i dngos med na zhes bya ba ni don gyi rnam pa dang bral ba yin na'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos med na zhes bya ba ni don gyi rnam pa dang bral ba yin na'o //
translated: “If it is not a real entity” means if it is devoid of the aspect of an object.

original: gzhag med phyir zhes bya ba ni nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhag med phyir zhes bya ba ni nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because it is not established” means because it is not ascertained.

original: shes pa las skyes pa shes pa'i rgyu nges par byed pa 'du byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa ni don so sor nges pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa las skyes pa shes pa'i rgyu nges par byed pa 'du byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa ni don so sor nges pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary “The formative forces are the cause of consciousness, which is produced from consciousness” is the “ascertainment of the object.”

original: blo'i cha dag ces bya ba la gnyis kyi tshig ma yin te /
analyzed: blo'i cha dag ces bya ba la gnyis kyi tshig ma yin te /
translated: “The two parts of the mind” is not a dualistic statement.

original: gnyis med pas rang la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gnyis med pas rang la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Since there is no duality, it is contradictory to say that it acts upon itself.

original: gal te bya byed gcig yin par //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te bya byed gcig yin par // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the action and the agent are the same,🔽The commentary “The action and the agent are not the same” is the “ascertainment of the action.”

original: byas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid bzhin du ldog pa'i dbye bas brtags pa'i chos kyi dbye ba las bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa'i tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: byas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid bzhin du ldog pa'i dbye bas brtags pa'i chos kyi dbye ba las bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa'i tha dad pa yin te /
translated: Just as the produced and impermanence are established as different by the division of the negatee, the probandum and the proof are different by the division of the phenomena imagined by the division of the negatee.

original: dngos po la dbye ba med kyang ngo zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po la dbye ba med kyang ngo zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Even though there is no division in the entity, it is said that🔽“The entity is not different.”

original: chos tha dad pa khas len phyir //
analyzed: chos tha dad pa khas len phyir //
translated: Because they accept phenomena as different.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because of the acceptance of the difference of the entities.

original: lus la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni rnam par gzhag par bya ba la sogs par brtags pas yul tha dad pa yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni rnam par gzhag par bya ba la sogs par brtags pas yul tha dad pa yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The conventional expressions of body, etc. are different objects because they are imagined as the basis of the establishment, etc. , and not the other way around.

original: du ba ni me las so zhes bya ba'i dngos po'i dbye ba yin yang /
analyzed: du ba ni me las so zhes bya ba'i dngos po'i dbye ba yin yang /
translated: Even though the distinction of entities is like the statement, “Smoke is from fire,”

original: 'bras bu la sogs pa nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas sprul pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu la sogs pa nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas sprul pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: the author demonstrates that the effect, etc. are imagined by the presence and absence of the pervader.

original: de lta'i rnam par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta'i rnam par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ In that way” means “in that manner.”

original: rnam par gnas zhes bya ba ni byed pa ste de dang ldan pa'i bye brag tu brtags pa zhes bya ba'i don to zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par gnas zhes bya ba ni byed pa ste de dang ldan pa'i bye brag tu brtags pa zhes bya ba'i don to zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: “ Abides” means “acts.” The meaning of the phrase “imagined as a particular that possesses that” is demonstrated by the words

original: byed pa po'i bdag nyid can gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: byed pa po'i bdag nyid can gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “by the one that has the nature of an agent.”🔽It is one and it is not one.

original: gcig nyid kyang yin la gcig ma yin pa nyid kyang yin pa ste /🔽gcig nyid du ma nyid dag tu brtags pa'i yin na'o //
analyzed: gcig nyid kyang yin la gcig ma yin pa nyid kyang yin pa ste /🔽gcig nyid du ma nyid dag tu brtags pa'i yin na'o //
translated: It is imagined as one and as many.

original: re zhig lha sbyin zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid du brtags pa'o //🔽de'i zhes bya ba ni du ma'i'o //
analyzed: re zhig lha sbyin zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid du brtags pa'o // de'i zhes bya ba ni du ma'i'o //
translated: The phrase for the time being refers to the fact that the self is imagined to be a unity, and the phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.

original: rang la byed par 'gal ba spangs pa'i ni don dam pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang la byed par 'gal ba spangs pa'i ni don dam pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.

original: gnyis su snang ba'i zhes bya ba ni yul dang shes pa'i snang ba'i'o //🔽rnam par rig pa nyid don rig pa yin par mi rigs pa ma yin nam /🔽sngon po rig pa ni ser po'i ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gnyis su snang ba'i zhes bya ba ni yul dang shes pa'i snang ba'i'o // rnam par rig pa nyid don rig pa yin par mi rigs pa ma yin nam / sngon po rig pa ni ser po'i ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.

original: don rig gang yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don rig gang yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.

original: phyi rol smra ba pos gzhan cung zad kho na de rig pas khas blangs pa ni ma yin te /🔽'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: phyi rol smra ba pos gzhan cung zad kho na de rig pas khas blangs pa ni ma yin te / 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.

original: mngon sum gang yin pa 'di 'di nyid de lkog tu ma gyur pa'i ngo bo yin la de yang res 'ga' bas 'gro ba na rtsas reg pa bzhin @122a * //🔽du brjed par 'gyur la /
analyzed: mngon sum gang yin pa 'di 'di nyid de lkog tu ma gyur pa'i ngo bo yin la de yang res 'ga' bas 'gro ba na rtsas reg pa bzhin @122a * // du brjed par 'gyur la /
translated: The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.

original: rab tu spyod pa nyid mang du bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rab tu spyod pa nyid mang du bstan pa ni /
translated: The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to be a multiplicity.🔽The phrase in the case of Devadatta refers to the fact that it is imagined to

original: so so so sor rig pa ni rgyun gyi rig pa yin te rang gi ngo bo dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: so so so sor rig pa ni rgyun gyi rig pa yin te rang gi ngo bo dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The term individually refers to the awareness of a continuum, i.e., it means along with its own nature.

original: yang na gang yin 'di nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: yang na gang yin 'di nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: Or else, it means this very thing which is....

original: rig pa yin pas brjed pa'i yul nyid sel bar byed pa'o //🔽so so so sor zhes bya ba ni rgyun dang mngon sum yang yin te /
analyzed: rig pa yin pas brjed pa'i yul nyid sel bar byed pa'o // so so so sor zhes bya ba ni rgyun dang mngon sum yang yin te /
translated: Since it is an awareness, it eliminates the object of forgetfulness.

original: rgyun ma yin pa dang lkog tu gyur pa ni brjed par 'gyur ba'am the tshom za bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyun ma yin pa dang lkog tu gyur pa ni brjed par 'gyur ba'am the tshom za bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The term individually refers to both a continuum and a direct perception, i.e., it means that which is not a continuum and is obscure is forgetfulness or doubt.

original: kha cig na re so sor rig pa ni mtshams sbyor ba yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re so sor rig pa ni mtshams sbyor ba yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that individually refers to the connection.

original: so sor nges pa'am rig pa de yin pa'i phyir bar gyi tshig phyi ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa'i dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: so sor nges pa'am rig pa de yin pa'i phyir bar gyi tshig phyi ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa'i dgongs pa'o //
translated: The commentary intends to say that it is a subsequent word because it is a specific awareness.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i don te /
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i don te /
translated: The term that refers to the meaning of the nature of blue, etc., which is not obscure.

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i bems po'i rig pa ni rig pa gang gis te /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i bems po'i rig pa ni rig pa gang gis te /
translated: The awareness of an obscure, inanimate object is the awareness by which...

original: 'gas kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gas kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it from any other.

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because of contradiction.

original: dngos su ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos su ni ma yin te /
translated: In reality, it is not.

original: 'on kyang don dang 'dra ba nyid kyis so snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang don dang 'dra ba nyid kyis so snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: But it is thought that it is similar to the object.

original: de 'dra ba las yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dra ba las yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it were from something similar,🔽it would be seen that there is doubt because it is similar to seeing the object.

original: don mthong ba las de dang 'dra ba nyid yin pa'i phyir the tshom za ba yin par bstan pa ni 'khrul par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don mthong ba las de dang 'dra ba nyid yin pa'i phyir the tshom za ba yin par bstan pa ni 'khrul par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “it would be mistaken” teaches this.

original: de 'dra las zhes bya ba de tsam ni 'dir sgrub byed du 'dod pa yin la bskyed pa dang khyad par can ni de 'dra ba dang de las byung zhes bya bas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de 'dra las zhes bya ba de tsam ni 'dir sgrub byed du 'dod pa yin la bskyed pa dang khyad par can ni de 'dra ba dang de las byung zhes bya bas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, just “from something similar” is asserted as the proof. “ Produced” and “distinctive” will be explained by “from something similar” and “arisen from that.”

original: 'grel pa thun mong gi ma nges pa yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'grel pa thun mong gi ma nges pa yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The statement “it is not taught to be a common non-ascertainment”🔽teaches that it is not the case that the non-ascertainment of the object is the cause of doubt.

original: skra dang sbrang bu la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skra dang sbrang bu la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ Hair, bees, and so on” are examples.

original: nyams su myong ba ni byung ba po la ltos pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba ni byung ba po la ltos pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t experience dependent on the experiencer?

original: de lta bu des khyad par du byas pa'i 'dra ba nyid ni don la med pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: de lta bu des khyad par du byas pa'i 'dra ba nyid ni don la med pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: But such a similarity, qualified by that, does not exist in fact.

original: 'on te 'dir rig pa ste rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te 'dir rig pa ste rtogs pa'o //
translated: But here, it is cognition, i.e., understanding.

original: gang la zhes bya ba ni byung ba po gang la'o //
analyzed: gang la zhes bya ba ni byung ba po gang la'o //
translated: With regard to what? With regard to the agent.

original: sngon po'i rnam pa can gyis shes pa'i lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid nyams su myong ba yin gyi tha dad pa nyid ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sngon po'i rnam pa can gyis shes pa'i lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid nyams su myong ba yin gyi tha dad pa nyid ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The experience of the non-obtuse nature of the cognition having the aspect of blue is not a difference.

original: 'di ni de nyid yin zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: 'di ni de nyid yin zhes bya ba'o//
translated: This is what is said: “This is that.”

original: phyi rol dang 'dra ba nyid du rtogs kyang rdul phra rab kyi ngo bo ni rags pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol dang 'dra ba nyid du rtogs kyang rdul phra rab kyi ngo bo ni rags pa ma yin te /
translated: Even though it is understood to be similar to the external, the nature of the subtle atom is not gross,

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni rdul phran de dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni rdul phran de dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: because of the contradiction. This is what is said: “Those atoms.”

original: bar mtshams med pa'i rdul phra rab rnams nyid gcig tu snang bzhin pa mang po rags pa yin no zhe na de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: bar mtshams med pa'i rdul phra rab rnams nyid gcig tu snang bzhin pa mang po rags pa yin no zhe na de lta ma yin te /
translated: If the subtle atoms without interstice themselves are many, appearing as one, they are gross. That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir thag ring ba dang @122b cig shos ni shing snang ba dag la tha dad pa med pa'i tshig ni mkhas pa rnams mgu bar byed pa ma yin te /🔽gang gi phyir de la bar mtshams mi snang ba tsam ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir thag ring ba dang @122b cig shos ni shing snang ba dag la tha dad pa med pa'i tshig ni mkhas pa rnams mgu bar byed pa ma yin te / gang gi phyir de la bar mtshams mi snang ba tsam ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the words “distant” and “separate” are not pleasing to the wise, since it is not merely the non-appearance of an interval between them.

original: bar mtshams mang ba'i snang ba dang snang ba ma yin pa nyid ni rags pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: bar mtshams mang ba'i snang ba dang snang ba ma yin pa nyid ni rags pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: The appearance of many intervals and the non-appearance of an interval are not coarseness,

original: gnas skabs de'i snang ba dag nyid la khyad par yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas skabs de'i snang ba dag nyid la khyad par yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is a difference in the appearance of those very intervals.

original: phyi rol gyi rags pa yang sna tshogs de gcig yin zhe na zhes bya bas bkag pa'i phyir the tsho ma za ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rags pa yang sna tshogs de gcig yin zhe na zhes bya bas bkag pa'i phyir the tsho ma za ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: And because external coarseness is refuted by the statement “that variety is one,” it is shown that there is doubt.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ste yin yang zhes bya ba ni don gyi dngos po nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ste yin yang zhes bya ba ni don gyi dngos po nyid yin na'o //
translated: Therefore means because of that. Also means even if it is the nature of the object.

original: rang gi rig pa'i shes pa don dang 'dra ba yin yang sngon po bzhin du sngon po gzhan la go byed ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa'i shes pa don dang 'dra ba yin yang sngon po bzhin du sngon po gzhan la go byed ma yin no //
translated: Even though the cognition of self-awareness is similar to the object, like blue, it does not convey another blue.

original: 'on te 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir shes pa don gyi go byed yin gyi sngon po ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /🔽de 'dra ba dang de las byung //
analyzed: 'on te 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir shes pa don gyi go byed yin gyi sngon po ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la / de 'dra ba dang de las byung //
translated: Or, if you think that the object is the cause of the cognition, and that the cognition is the cause of the understanding of the object, and that the blue is not the cause of the understanding of the blue,🔽then it is said:

original: zhes bya ba smos so //🔽de las byung ba'i khyad par can gyi de dang 'dra ba nyid ni de'i go byed du mi rigs te de dang 'dra ba nyid bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so // de las byung ba'i khyad par can gyi de dang 'dra ba nyid ni de'i go byed du mi rigs te de dang 'dra ba nyid bzhin du /
translated: “It is similar to that, and it arises from that.”🔽It is not reasonable that the similarity to that, which is qualified by arising from that, is the cause of the understanding of that, because the similarity to that is not established, just like the similarity to that.

original: de dang 'dra ba nyid ma grub pa'i phyir te de ma thag pa'i rkyen la de las byung ba dang de dang 'dra ba grub pa'i phyir de nyid kyi go byed du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba nyid ma grub pa'i phyir te de ma thag pa'i rkyen la de las byung ba dang de dang 'dra ba grub pa'i phyir de nyid kyi go byed du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is reasonable that the immediately preceding condition is the cause of the understanding of that, because the arising from that and the similarity to that are established in relation to that.

original: ser po'i rnam pa'i de ma thag pa las sngon po'i rnam pa mi 'byung ba sngon po'i rnam pa gang las byung bar shes pa de kho na las 'byung ba yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: ser po'i rnam pa'i de ma thag pa las sngon po'i rnam pa mi 'byung ba sngon po'i rnam pa gang las byung bar shes pa de kho na las 'byung ba yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If you think that the cognition of the blue does not arise immediately after the cognition of the yellow, and that the cognition of the blue arises from the cognition of the blue,🔽then it is said:

original: 'on te gang las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te gang las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Or from what?”

original: de lta na de ma thag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad la ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta na de ma thag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad la ma yin gyi /
translated: If that were so, then it would not be so in all cases, such as “immediately antecedent condition.”

original: 'o na ci zhe na nges pa'i yul la'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na nges pa'i yul la'o //
translated: What is it? It is the object of ascertainment.

original: de las byung ba dang 'dra ba dag gis de'i yul nyid yin na nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i dran pa nyams su myong ba'i yul nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las byung ba dang 'dra ba dag gis de'i yul nyid yin na nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i dran pa nyams su myong ba'i yul nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If it is the object of that which arises from it and is similar to it, then it follows that memory, which is the object of experience, would be the object of experience.🔽This is the definition of overpervasion.

original: khyab ches pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni lha dang dbang blo'i yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyab ches pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni lha dang dbang blo'i yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that it is the object of the mental consciousness alone is as follows:

original: gzhan dag smra ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag smra ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Others say that it is the object of the mental consciousness alone.

original: phyi rol gyi don du smra ba po yang dran pa nyams su myong ba'i yul can du 'dod pa'i phyir khyab ches pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don du smra ba po yang dran pa nyams su myong ba'i yul can du 'dod pa'i phyir khyab ches pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that it is not overpervasive because the proponents of external objects also assert that memory has the object of experience as its object is as follows:

original: dran ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dran ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Memory is the object of the mental consciousness alone.

original: don myong ba ni nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brangs pa yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: don myong ba ni nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brangs pa yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The object of experience is the object of memory.

original: rtsod pa'i gzhi khyad par gyi dran pa 'di las khyab ches pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gzhi khyad par gyi dran pa 'di las khyab ches pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The basis of the dispute is the special memory. The demonstration that this is not too broad is:

original: 'di ni yul med par yin pas zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: 'di ni yul med par yin pas zhes bya ba'o//
translated: “This is because there is no object.”

original: @123a * // rang nyid kyi bshad pa ni 'dir brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: @123a * // rang nyid kyi bshad pa ni 'dir brjod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “This is said” refers to my own explanation.

original: sngon po la sogs pa gsal bar snang ba ni rmi lam bzhin du sad pa na yang goms pa'i bskyed bya khyad par gyi shes pa ni snga ma snga ma rang gi rigs kyi nus pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir de'i yul 'thob pa yin no zhes
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa gsal bar snang ba ni rmi lam bzhin du sad pa na yang goms pa'i bskyed bya khyad par gyi shes pa ni snga ma snga ma rang gi rigs kyi nus pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir de'i yul 'thob pa yin no zhes
translated: The appearance of the manifest blue, etc., is like a dream. Even when awake, the special consciousness produced by the power of habit is arisen from the potential of the former consciousness of the same type. Therefore, the object of that is obtained.

original: bya ba'i don bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bya ba'i don bstan pa ni /
translated: The meaning of this is demonstrated:

original: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis zhes bya ba'o //🔽bar te bar du chod pa med pa gang gi yin pa de mtshungs pa yang yin la /
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis zhes bya ba'o // bar te bar du chod pa med pa gang gi yin pa de mtshungs pa yang yin la /
translated: “By the power of meditation.”

original: de ma thag pa yang yin pas sngon po'i shes pa las byung ba ser po'i shes pa 'das pa ni ser po shes pa la ma yin te /
analyzed: de ma thag pa yang yin pas sngon po'i shes pa las byung ba ser po'i shes pa 'das pa ni ser po shes pa la ma yin te /
translated: That which is uninterrupted is similar and also immediate. Therefore, the consciousness of yellow that arises from the consciousness of blue is not the object of the consciousness of yellow.

original: bar du chod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: bar du chod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni /
translated: because it is obstructed.

original: ji ltar de de ma thag ba zhes bya ba'o //🔽ser po'i shes pa nyid de las gzhan pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar de de ma thag ba zhes bya ba'o // ser po'i shes pa nyid de las gzhan pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yin te /
translated: How is it that it is called immediately antecedent?🔽The cognition of yellow is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue, because it is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue.🔽The cognition of blue is not the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of yellow, because it is obstructed by the cognition of yellow.🔽The cognition of yellow is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue, because it is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue.

original: de'i rigs kyi bar du gcod pa gzhan gyi nus pa bsgribs pa ma thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /🔽de 'dra ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rigs kyi bar du gcod pa gzhan gyi nus pa bsgribs pa ma thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni / de 'dra ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition of blue is not the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of yellow, because it is obstructed by the cognition of yellow.

original: rnam par rtog pa las gsal ba nyid bzhin du gsal ba bsgoms pa las byung ba nyid yin te /🔽de dang 'dra ba nyid dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa las gsal ba nyid bzhin du gsal ba bsgoms pa las byung ba nyid yin te / de dang 'dra ba nyid dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The cognition of yellow is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue, because it is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue.🔽The cognition of blue is not the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of yellow, because it is obstructed by the cognition of yellow.

original: des na rnam pa de la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na rnam pa de la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition of yellow is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue, because it is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue.🔽The cognition of blue is not the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of yellow, because it is obstructed by the cognition of yellow.🔽The cognition of yellow is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue, because it is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue.🔽The cognition of blue is not the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of yellow, because it is obstructed by the cognition of yellow.🔽The cognition of yellow is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue, because it is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue.

original: ngas 'di mthong ngo zhes bya ba byed pa po dang las la sogs pa ni tha dad par snang ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: ngas 'di mthong ngo zhes bya ba byed pa po dang las la sogs pa ni tha dad par snang ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: The cognition of blue is not the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of yellow, because it is obstructed by the cognition of yellow.

original: 'di mthong 'di thos zhes bya ba'i nges pas dmigs par brjod pa'o //🔽de zhes bya ba ni byed pa po'o //
analyzed: 'di mthong 'di thos zhes bya ba'i nges pas dmigs par brjod pa'o //🔽de zhes bya ba ni byed pa po'o //
translated: The cognition of yellow is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue, because it is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue.🔽The cognition of blue is not the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of yellow, because it is obstructed by the cognition of yellow.🔽The cognition of yellow is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue, because it is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue.🔽The cognition of blue is not the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of yellow, because it is obstructed by the cognition of yellow.🔽The cognition of yellow is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue, because it is the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of blue.🔽The cognition of blue is not the immediately antecedent condition of the cognition of yellow, because it

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni las kyi'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni las kyi'o //
translated: “That” refers to the object.

original: myong ba ni myong bar byed pa'o //🔽snang ba ni las nyid do //
analyzed: myong ba ni myong bar byed pa'o // snang ba ni las nyid do //
translated: “Experience” is the experiencing.🔽“Appearance” is the object itself.

original: mthong ba ni byed pa po nyid do //
analyzed: mthong ba ni byed pa po nyid do //
translated: “Seeing” is the agent.

original: nye ba de nyid dpyad bya yin te /
analyzed: nye ba de nyid dpyad bya yin te /
translated: “Proximity” is to be analyzed.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the characteristic of identity, not something else.

original: dpyad pa gang gis shes byed nyid nye ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: dpyad pa gang gis shes byed nyid nye ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: With regard to the analysis of what is thought to be the proximity of the object of knowledge,

original: de dag 'brel pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de dag 'brel pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: he says, “Their connection.”

original: 'brel pa ni kun du 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni kun du 'brel pa'o //
translated: “Connection” is complete connection.

original: des de yin zhes bya ba ni 'di'i 'di'o zhes de med pas yod pa tsam shes byed nyid yin na thal ches par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des de yin zhes bya ba ni 'di'i 'di'o zhes de med pas yod pa tsam shes byed nyid yin na thal ches par 'gyur te /
translated: “By that” is “this is of that,” and if the mere existence of that is the object of knowledge because of the absence of that, there is an overextension.

original: nyams su myong ba med na nges pa mi rigs par bstan pa ni nges pa ni myong ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba med na nges pa mi rigs par bstan pa ni nges pa ni myong ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration that if there is no experience, ascertainment is not reasonable is “Ascertainment is experience.”

original: de kho na bzhin du rang gi ngo bo tsam gyi nges pa ji ltar goms pa bzhin 'byung ba nyams su myong ba la rag las pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du rang gi ngo bo tsam gyi nges pa ji ltar goms pa bzhin 'byung ba nyams su myong ba la rag las pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Just as it is, the ascertainment of mere intrinsic reality arises in accordance with the familiarization, and it is not dependent on experience.

original: nyams su myong ba nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by “experience itself.”

original: ldog pa'i dbye ba la brten nas brda yod na de ltar goms pa las yin gyi /🔽nyams su myong ba la brten nas ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ldog pa'i dbye ba la brten nas brda yod na de ltar goms pa las yin gyi / nyams su myong ba la brten nas ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: If there is a convention based on a division of the opposite, it is from familiarization with that.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by “because of that.”

original: zla ba gnyis su mthong ba la ni de'i nges pa de kho na nyid du 'byed par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zla ba gnyis su mthong ba la ni de'i nges pa de kho na nyid du 'byed par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: If it were like that, the ascertainment of the moon as two would not be a division of reality, and so it is taught to be uncertain.

original: gal te de lta na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gal te de lta na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is stated by “If that is so.”

original: @123b gcig tu nges par byed pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang du mar nges par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: @123b gcig tu nges par byed pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang du mar nges par byed pa yin no //
translated: It is not a single ascertainment, but rather it is a multiple ascertainment.

original: dbang po las byung ba ni 'byed par byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po las byung ba ni 'byed par byed pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If you think that what arises from the sense faculty is the divider,

original: ji ste goms pa las zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ji ste goms pa las zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If you say that it is due to habituation,

original: yid kyi nges pa 'di tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi nges pa 'di tshad ma yin te /
translated: then this ascertainment of the mind is valid cognition.

original: brgyud nas dbang po'i bskyed bya yin //
analyzed: brgyud nas dbang po'i bskyed bya yin //
translated: It is the product of the sense faculty, indirectly.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the above passage.

original: dbang bo las ni mthong ba yin la de las kyang nges pa ni dbang po bzhin du byed pa po nyid yin pas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang bo las ni mthong ba yin la de las kyang nges pa ni dbang po bzhin du byed pa po nyid yin pas ni ma yin te /
translated: Seeing is from the sense faculty, and ascertainment from that is not like the sense faculty, since it is the agent.

original: 'on kyang 'dzin pas so //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'dzin pas so //
translated: But it is due to grasping.

original: bzung ba la nges par byed pa mthong ba yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te goms pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bzung ba la nges par byed pa mthong ba yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te goms pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not taught that seeing is the ascertainment of the object, but rather that it is due to habituation.

original: don no zhes bya ba yang phyi rol ma yin gyi 'on kyang don byed pa'i tshig ste shes pa nyid la yang skyon can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: don no zhes bya ba yang phyi rol ma yin gyi 'on kyang don byed pa'i tshig ste shes pa nyid la yang skyon can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The object is not external, but rather the word for the object is the agent. In order to show that consciousness itself is not faulty, it says:

original: don zhes nges pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don zhes nges pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Ascertainment of the object.

original: 'brel pa yang tha dad pa dag nyid la the gu dang bum pa dag la bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la rang rig pa yin na /
analyzed: 'brel pa yang tha dad pa dag nyid la the gu dang bum pa dag la bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la rang rig pa yin na /
translated: Even if the relation is between different things, like a rope and a pot, it is still reflexive awareness.

original: rang ma yin par rig pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang ma yin par rig pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that the cognition of what is not itself is not itself is as follows:

original: de yi myong de dag nyid de //
analyzed: de yi myong de dag nyid de //
translated: That experience of it is just those.

original: zhes bya ba ste /🔽de'i sngon po la sogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste / de'i sngon po la sogs pa'i'o //
translated: That is,🔽the experience of blue, etc.

original: sngon po la sogs pa nyid gzhan gyi nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa nyid gzhan gyi nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la /
translated: It is said that just blue, etc. are experienced by another.

original: de gzhan zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de gzhan zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In response to that, it is said:

original: de zhes bya ba ni sngon po la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni sngon po la sogs pa ste /
translated: That is, blue, etc.

original: bdag nyid nyams su myong ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid nyams su myong ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is to be connected with “experienced by itself.”

original: nges par gzung ba gnyi ga'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nges par gzung ba gnyi ga'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration of the ascertainment of the result of both is as follows:

original: gzhan gyi nyams su myong ba mang zhing nyams su myong bar bya ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi nyams su myong ba mang zhing nyams su myong bar bya ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is said that the experience of another is not the experience of many.

original: yang na ldog pa ste bdag nyid de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na ldog pa ste bdag nyid de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or, it is the negation, that is, “it is not itself.”

original: de gzhan zhes bya ba ni dngos po 'byung ba la ltos pa nyid do //
analyzed: de gzhan zhes bya ba ni dngos po 'byung ba la ltos pa nyid do //
translated: That is another, that is, the occurrence of an entity is dependent.

original: mngon sum so sor rig bya yang //
analyzed: mngon sum so sor rig bya yang //
translated: Direct perception is to be known by each one.

original: zhes bya bas kyang nyams su myong ba la de las gzhan pa rig par bya ba bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya bas kyang nyams su myong ba la de las gzhan pa rig par bya ba bsal ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the experience is distinguished from other objects of knowledge.

original: 'grel pa ni gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'grel pa ni gsal ba yin no //
translated: The commentary is clear.

original: gyur mod ces bya ba'i khas len pa ni nyams su myong ba don gyi bdag nyid ces bya ba 'di'i'o //
analyzed: gyur mod ces bya ba'i khas len pa ni nyams su myong ba don gyi bdag nyid ces bya ba 'di'i'o //
translated: The concession “Granted” is that of the opponent, who maintains that experience has the nature of an object.

original: bdag nyid kyi phyogs la skyon bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi phyogs la skyon bstan pa ni /
translated: The fault in the opponent’s position is stated:

original: gal te don gyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te don gyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: “If it has the nature of an object,

original: 'di nyid la dgag pa sbyor bar byed pa ni gzhan la ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid la dgag pa sbyor bar byed pa ni gzhan la ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The opponent’s position is refuted by the words “But it is not so in the case of the other.”

original: 'di thams cad ni bdag kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni bdag gi'o //
analyzed: 'di thams cad ni bdag kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni bdag gi'o //
translated: The words “All this is the self alone” are the opponent’s.

original: gnya' shing la nyi ma bzhin du bstod pa yin gyi de kho na nyid ni ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gnya' shing la nyi ma bzhin du bstod pa yin gyi de kho na nyid ni ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The words “It is like praising the post as the sun” mean that the opponent is praising the self as the object of experience, but this is not the truth.

original: de ni don brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni don brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The words “This is the statement of the opponent’s position” mean that this is the opponent’s position.

original: bdag ni sems tsam yin la rig pa ni sna tshogs pa yin pas /🔽de dang 'gal @124a * //
analyzed: bdag ni sems tsam yin la rig pa ni sna tshogs pa yin pas / de dang 'gal @124a * //
translated: The self is mind only, and the object is manifold.

original: ba yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ba yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The words “It is not contradictory” mean that it is not contradictory to say that the self is the object of experience.🔽The words “It is not taught” mean that it is not taught that the self is the object of experience.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it experiences various aspects.

original: sngon po ni nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon po ni nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: Blue is not a direct perception because it is the nature of an experience.

original: 'on kyang tshogs pa gcig la 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang tshogs pa gcig la 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: However, it is a direct perception because it is related to a single collection.

original: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dag la khyad par med do snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba dag la khyad par med do snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If you think that there is no difference between the nature of that and what arises from that, then Nāgārjuna explains:

original: des na nyams myong bya gzhan med //🔽ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: des na nyams myong bya gzhan med // ces bya ba ste /
translated: There is no other object of experience.

original: de ltar 'brel pa yin kyang bdag nyid ma yin pa la zhugs pa'i phyir la rjes su zhugs pa ni nyams su myong bar bya ba yin gyi bdag nyid rig ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar 'brel pa yin kyang bdag nyid ma yin pa la zhugs pa'i phyir la rjes su zhugs pa ni nyams su myong bar bya ba yin gyi bdag nyid rig ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, even though there is a relationship, because it is not engaged in the nature of that, the engaged consciousness is the object of experience, but it is not self-awareness.

original: skyed byed nyid las gzhan pa'i 'gal ba can de ni bdag nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: skyed byed nyid las gzhan pa'i 'gal ba can de ni bdag nyid ma yin te /
translated: Because it is not the nature of that, it is not a producer.

original: rig pa ma yin pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rig pa ma yin pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not a producer because it is not self-awareness.

original: de ma thag pa de lta na zhes bya ba'i shes pa gzhan gyis gzung ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de ma thag pa de lta na zhes bya ba'i shes pa gzhan gyis gzung ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If you think that it is apprehended by another consciousness that is similar to that, then Nāgārjuna explains:

original: de la'ang myong ba gzhan yod min //
analyzed: de la'ang myong ba gzhan yod min //
translated: And there is no other experience of that.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is what is meant.

original: gzung ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa la 'di thal ches pa yin gyi sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: gzung ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa la 'di thal ches pa yin gyi sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: This is an overextension of the thesis that consciousness is the nature of the object, etc.

original: ; med pa ci las she na der yang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ; med pa ci las she na der yang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: How can something nonexistent arise from something?

original: shes pa gzhan la bdag nyid rig pa ma yin pa ni de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa gzhan la bdag nyid rig pa ma yin pa ni de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “that” is that the other consciousness is not self-awareness, and it is contradictory to say that it is of the nature of that.

original: de rtogs pa ci las she na /
analyzed: de rtogs pa ci las she na /
translated: How is that understood?

original: de'i phyir rang nyid ces bya ba ni gzhan mi ltos pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i rig ba gsal ba yin pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang nyid ces bya ba ni gzhan mi ltos pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i rig ba gsal ba yin pa ni /
translated: Therefore, “itself” means that the clarity of the cognition of blue, etc., does not depend on another.

original: mngon sum ste lkog tu ma gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon sum ste lkog tu ma gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that it is not hidden.

original: mi rtag pa dang byas pa nyid bzhin du sngon po nyams su myong ba de'i bdag nyid kho na yin no zhes bya ba yang tha snyad 'dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang byas pa nyid bzhin du sngon po nyams su myong ba de'i bdag nyid kho na yin no zhes bya ba yang tha snyad 'dogs pa yin no //
translated: It is also a convention to say that the experience of blue is of the nature of that.

original: 'brel pa nyams su myong ba'i rjes 'brang ba yin gyi gzhan du ma yin pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'brel pa nyams su myong ba'i rjes 'brang ba yin gyi gzhan du ma yin pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that the experience of the relation is the only proof of the existence of the object, and not anything else.

original: de yi dngos de sngo sogs kyi //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de yi dngos de sngo sogs kyi // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The object of that is blue, etc.

original: nyams su myong ba'i byed pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i byed pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows that the experience is the only proof of the existence of the object.

original: tha dad pa ni ldog pas brtags pa yin te mchi gu'i lus so zhes bya ba bzhin du /
analyzed: tha dad pa ni ldog pas brtags pa yin te mchi gu'i lus so zhes bya ba bzhin du /
translated: The difference is imagined by the exclusion. Just as one says, “The body of the lump of clay.”

original: tha mi dad pa 'gal ba can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa 'gal ba can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that the non-difference is not contradictory.

original: ldog pa'i rang gi ngo bo la'ang //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i rang gi ngo bo la'ang // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The nature of the exclusion is also

original: gsal bar bya ba nyid ni gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi khongs su gtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba nyid ni gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi khongs su gtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The manifestation is not included in the manifestor, because of contradiction.

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni ji ltar sngon po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni ji ltar sngon po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is like the statement, “The blue.”

original: gsal bar byed pa nyid ni gzhan khongs su gtogs par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa nyid ni gzhan khongs su gtogs par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that the manifestor is not included in the other.

original: bdag nyid la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The self

original: gsal bar bya @124b ba'am cig shos kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal bar bya @124b ba'am cig shos kyang ma yin te /
translated: The manifestation is not the other,🔽because of the contradiction of the manifestor and the manifested.

original: 'on kyang lkog tu ma gyur pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang lkog tu ma gyur pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: But it is taught that it is not hidden:

original: ji ltar de yi bdag nyid phyir //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar de yi bdag nyid phyir // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because it is of the nature of that.

original: de la mngon sum las gzhan pa'i byed pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid kho na'i rjes su 'brangs pas rang nyid gsal bar byed pa yin no zhes zer gyi /
analyzed: de la mngon sum las gzhan pa'i byed pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid kho na'i rjes su 'brangs pas rang nyid gsal bar byed pa yin no zhes zer gyi /
translated: Here, it is said that it is itself manifest, following only from the fact that it is not the object of an activity other than perception.

original: de la byed pa 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la byed pa 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it does not have any activity at all.

original: brgal zhing brtag pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: brgal zhing brtag pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is not a case of argument and investigation, because it is of that nature, having activity.

original: sgron ma la ltos nas mig la sogs pas bum pa gsal ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: sgron ma la ltos nas mig la sogs pas bum pa gsal ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: It is not the case that a pot is manifest by the eye, etc., in dependence on a lamp.

original: 'on te bum pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te bum pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Or rather, it is a pot.🔽Just as a lamp is conventionally said to manifest itself by its own activity of arising, so too is the eye, etc.

original: ji ltar sgron ma skyed par byed pa nyid gsal bar byed par tha snyad 'dogs pa de bzhin du mig la sogs pa'ang yin par bstan pa ni /🔽gsal bar byed pa yin min yang //
analyzed: ji ltar sgron ma skyed par byed pa nyid gsal bar byed par tha snyad 'dogs pa de bzhin du mig la sogs pa'ang yin par bstan pa ni / gsal bar byed pa yin min yang //
translated: This is taught by the words:

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not the case that it manifests itself.

original: gzhan dag ni shes pa'i'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni shes pa'i'o //
translated: Others are of cognition.

original: bdag nyid kyi ngo bo byed pa shes pa dang 'gal ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi ngo bo byed pa shes pa dang 'gal ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that the nature of the self is not contradictory to the knowledge of the act.🔽The verse states:

original: gang tshe de'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang tshe de'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When it is not the nature of that,

original: chad pa ni zhes bya ba ni ral gri'i so de nyid kho nas gcod pa ma yin par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: chad pa ni zhes bya ba ni ral gri'i so de nyid kho nas gcod pa ma yin par bstan pa yin no //
translated: The following verse is stated to show that the act is not done by the very same sword that cuts.🔽The verse states:

original: don de nyid ces bya ba ni de nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: don de nyid ces bya ba ni de nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of that very verse is stated in the following:

original: 'on te ji ltar zhen pas rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa dag ni tha dad pa nyid yin na skyon ci yod ces zer ba la /
analyzed: 'on te ji ltar zhen pas rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa dag ni tha dad pa nyid yin na skyon ci yod ces zer ba la /
translated: If one says, “What is the error if the object of knowledge and the knower are different because of the way they are conceived?”

original: de'i rig bya ba zhes smos te /
analyzed: de'i rig bya ba zhes smos te /
translated: The verse states:

original: rnam pa med pa'i rig pa dang / rig par bya ba yang de'i bdag nyid ma yin na mi 'thad pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa med pa'i rig pa dang / rig par bya ba yang de'i bdag nyid ma yin na mi 'thad pa ste /
translated: If the knower is without aspect and the object of knowledge is not of its nature, it is not tenable.

original: 'brel pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It would be without a connection.

original: gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa'i don ni de'i rnam pa can gyi gsal bas sam /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa'i don ni de'i rnam pa can gyi gsal bas sam /
translated: The meaning of “not the illuminator” is that the object is not illuminated by the aspect of that.

original: gzhan gyis kyang rig go zhes bya ba'i tha snyad rigs pa yin gyi /🔽gnyi ga cig car gsal na ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang rig go zhes bya ba'i tha snyad rigs pa yin gyi / gnyi ga cig car gsal na ni ma yin te /
translated: It is reasonable to say that the other person also knows it.

original: nus pa yongs su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nus pa yongs su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: But if both were to become manifest simultaneously, that would not be the case, because the potency would not be fully developed.

original: de'i tshe ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is demonstrated by the words, “At that time. . .

original: de nyid yin zhes bya ba ni gsal bar bya ba dang cig shos nyid yin no //
analyzed: de nyid yin zhes bya ba ni gsal bar bya ba dang cig shos nyid yin no //
translated: ” “That very thing” means the thing that is to be manifested and the other.

original: de ni nye ba'i khyad par gyis gzugs kyi khyad par bskyed pa nyid yin gyi gzung ba nyid ni ma yin te /🔽shes pa rjes su 'jug pa ni de lta yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ni nye ba'i khyad par gyis gzugs kyi khyad par bskyed pa nyid yin gyi gzung ba nyid ni ma yin te / shes pa rjes su 'jug pa ni de lta yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: That is to say, the particular form is produced by the particular proximity, but not by the apprehension.

original: de ltar skyes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar skyes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is how the consciousness is engaged. This is demonstrated by the words, “Thus produced. . .

original: ji ltar ma rtogs she na /
analyzed: ji ltar ma rtogs she na /
translated: ” How is it not understood?

original: tha snyad de lta bur zhes bya ba ni res pa ste /
analyzed: tha snyad de lta bur zhes bya ba ni res pa ste /
translated: “That convention” refers to the previous statement.

original: phyi rol gyi yul nyid du nges par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to//
analyzed: phyi rol gyi yul nyid du nges par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to//
translated: The meaning is that it is ascertained as an external object.

original: @125a * // phyi rol gyi yul nyid kyi nges pa nyams su myong ba dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: @125a * // phyi rol gyi yul nyid kyi nges pa nyams su myong ba dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The experience of the ascertainment of an external object is contradicted. This is demonstrated by the words, “If it were. . .🔽”

original: nyams su myong ba mthun pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba mthun pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The experience is the same.”

original: ji ste zhes bya ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ste zhes bya ba ni lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If” means “if it is not hidden.”

original: ci las she na rig par bya ba'i zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: ci las she na rig par bya ba'i zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: From what? He says, “from what is to be known.”

original: de med pa ste rtogs pa med pa na ji ltar 'gyur te rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de med pa ste rtogs pa med pa na ji ltar 'gyur te rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: If it does not exist, that is, if it is not apprehended, how can it be known?

original: de las zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pa'i rnam pa las don yang yod ces bya ba don gyi bya ba byed pa gsal bar snad ngo //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pa'i rnam pa las don yang yod ces bya ba don gyi bya ba byed pa gsal bar snad ngo //
translated: “From that” means from the form of inference. “The object exists” means that the object is manifest.

original: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni snang du rung ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni snang du rung ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: “Otherwise” means that it is not manifest.

original: gzhan gyis rtogs pa yin no zhes bya bar rtogs pa med par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis rtogs pa yin no zhes bya bar rtogs pa med par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not taught that it is known by another,

original: rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because there is no knowledge.

original: dngos po nyid gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid du rjes su dpag pa'i go bya yin par zer ba ni /
analyzed: dngos po nyid gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid du rjes su dpag pa'i go bya yin par zer ba ni /
translated: He says that the thing itself is the object inferred, which has the nature of manifestation.🔽“From the inference itself” means

original: rjes su dpag pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa nyid kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “By inference alone” means by the power of reasoning alone.

original: gsal ba nyid ni shes pa'i chos nyid yin la khyad par la mngon sum yin gyi ;
analyzed: gsal ba nyid ni shes pa'i chos nyid yin la khyad par la mngon sum yin gyi ;
translated: The clarity itself is the intrinsic nature of consciousness.

original: rjes su dpag pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that it is direct perception and not inference is:

original: rjes su dpag pa nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “It is not by inference itself.”

original: rjes su dpag pa nyid kyis rtogs pa yin pas mngon du byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa nyid kyis rtogs pa yin pas mngon du byed pa yin te /
translated: It is realized by inference itself, and so it is directly perceived,

original: mngon du mi byed pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mngon du mi byed pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: because it is incompatible with not being directly perceived. The demonstration of this is:

original: de med pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de med pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Nor is it nonexistent.”

original: rang bzhin gcig pa nyid ces bya ba ni don dam par rtogs pa tha dad pa de la brtags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig pa nyid ces bya ba ni don dam par rtogs pa tha dad pa de la brtags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “The same intrinsic nature” means that ultimately, the difference in realization is imagined.

original: de dang 'brel pas zhes bya ba ni 'o ma dang chu bzhin du don dang rtogs pa'i byed brag 'dres pas so //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pas zhes bya ba ni 'o ma dang chu bzhin du don dang rtogs pa'i byed brag 'dres pas so //
translated: “By its connection” means that the difference in the object and the realization is mixed, like milk and water.

original: khyab bya zhes bya ba ni du ba'o //
analyzed: khyab bya zhes bya ba ni du ba'o //
translated: “The pervaded” is smoke.

original: khyab byed kyis zhes bya ba lkog tu gyur pas so //
analyzed: khyab byed kyis zhes bya ba lkog tu gyur pas so //
translated: “By the pervader” is hidden.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i dus na'o //
translated: “At that time” is the time of apprehending the connection.

original: sngon dang nga ltar zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'o //
analyzed: sngon dang nga ltar zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'o //
translated: The phrase “just as before” refers to the pervasion.

original: rtog pa tsam zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus la khyad par med pas so //
analyzed: rtog pa tsam zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus la khyad par med pas so //
translated: The phrase “mere conceptualization” means that there is no difference in terms of place and time.

original: khyad par zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus kyi khyad par nyid kyis so //
analyzed: khyad par zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus kyi khyad par nyid kyis so //
translated: The phrase “difference” means that there is a difference in terms of place and time.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid khyab pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid khyab pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the pervasion that something is not produced without a cause?

original: yul dang dus dag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yul dang dus dag ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not a matter of place and time.

original: de yang gzhal bya'i du ba rtogs na lkog tu gyur pa'i me la yod pa yin pa de lta na me yang rtogs par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: de yang gzhal bya'i du ba rtogs na lkog tu gyur pa'i me la yod pa yin pa de lta na me yang rtogs par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If one understands that smoke is the effect of fire, then one understands that fire exists in a hidden way. In that case, one understands fire.
