original: gal te du ba'i rnam pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te du ba'i rnam pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase “if the form of smoke” refers to this.

original: du ba yang rtogs pa tsam ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: du ba yang rtogs pa tsam ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: It is not the case that one does not understand smoke.

original: me'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: me'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase “the effect of fire” refers to this.

original: phyi rol gyi @125b me'i 'bras bu nyid ma grub po zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi @125b me'i 'bras bu nyid ma grub po zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is not the case that the external effect of fire is not established.

original: me'i 'bras bu nyid yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: me'i 'bras bu nyid yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase “the effect of fire” refers to this.

original: mthong ba dang snang bzhin pa dag gi gcig pa nyid bar ma dang lkog tu gyur pa yod pa ma gtogs par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mthong ba dang snang bzhin pa dag gi gcig pa nyid bar ma dang lkog tu gyur pa yod pa ma gtogs par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: The reply is:

analyzed: ngo shes pa'i stobs nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is:🔽The reply is:

analyzed: bar na yod pa lkog tu gyur pa yin no zhes zer ba ni / gal te myong min don bdag ni //
translated: The reply is:🔽The reply is:🔽The reply is:🔽The reply is:🔽The reply is:🔽The reply is:🔽The reply is:🔽The reply is:

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply is:🔽The reply is:🔽The reply is:

original: lan ni lkog tu gyur par zhes bya ba'o //🔽de nyid ni zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma rtogs pa tsam mo//🔽gcig nyid du sngar mthong ngo shes pa'i yul yin gyi bar gyi ni ma yin te /🔽rjes su dpag pa'i rnam pa yang phyi rol nyid du zhen pas bag chags tsam las yin pas /
analyzed: lan ni lkog tu gyur par zhes bya ba'o // de nyid ni zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma rtogs pa tsam mo// gcig nyid du sngar mthong ngo shes pa'i yul yin gyi bar gyi ni ma yin te / rjes su dpag pa'i rnam pa yang phyi rol nyid du zhen pas bag chags tsam las yin pas /
translated: The reply is:

original: gzhan yang de'i rigs pa yin pas de ltar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang de'i rigs pa yin pas de ltar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: The reply

original: de'i phyi gsal bar snang ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyi gsal bar snang ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The external is the appearance of clarity.

original: rnam shes byas pa ni rnam shes kyis byas pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam shes byas pa ni rnam shes kyis byas pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The consciousness is the consciousness that is produced.

original: don dang bag chags dag gi ngo bo tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: don dang bag chags dag gi ngo bo tha dad pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the nature of the latent potentialities is different.

original: gsal ba snang ba bag chags tsam las byung ba yin na 'dod pa kho na 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gsal ba snang ba bag chags tsam las byung ba yin na 'dod pa kho na 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: If the appearance of clarity arises from latent potentialities alone, then the assertion is established,🔽because the assertion is independent.

original: 'dod pa ni rang dbang nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa ni rang dbang nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught:

original: phyi rol khyad par yod min yang //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol khyad par yod min yang // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even though there is no difference in the external,🔽the latent potentialities are the cause of the variety of consciousness.

original: bag chags thams cad gcig gi tshe nyid na nye bas sar pa na thams cad snang ba'i shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir nyams su myong ba ni 'gal ba'i 'bras bu'i bye brag yin no snyam du sems ba ni 'gal te bag chags zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bag chags thams cad gcig gi tshe nyid na nye bas sar pa na thams cad snang ba'i shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir nyams su myong ba ni 'gal ba'i 'bras bu'i bye brag yin no snyam du sems ba ni 'gal te bag chags zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If all latent potentialities arise at the same time, then all latent potentialities would arise in a single consciousness. Therefore, the experience of the variety of effects is contradictory.🔽This is contradictory, because the latent potentialities are the cause of the variety of consciousness.🔽Even though the external is accepted, the variety of effects is contradictory. This is taught:

original: phyi rol khas blangs kyang 'gal ba'i 'bras bu kho na yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol khas blangs kyang 'gal ba'i 'bras bu kho na yin par bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Even though the external is not near,

original: nye ba ma yin pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye ba ma yin pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the latent potentialities are near.

original: dran pa ni nye ba'i yul can ma yin pa kho nar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dran pa ni nye ba'i yul can ma yin pa kho nar bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that memory is not only the subject of a proximate object:

original: dran pa brjed par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa brjed par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “forgetting a memory”

original: log par rig pa zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus gzhan la gnas pa la /
analyzed: log par rig pa zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus gzhan la gnas pa la /
translated: “Wrong knowledge” means that, in regard to an object and time that are different,

original: de las gzhan par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: it is understood as being other than that.

original: med pa yang yul la sogs pa la nges pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: med pa yang yul la sogs pa la nges pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that non-existence is not ascertained in regard to an object and so forth:

original: gzhan dag med snang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag med snang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “others appear as non-existent”

original: du ma mthong ba dang du ma dran pa ni rnam shes nyid yin pa la yang /
analyzed: du ma mthong ba dang du ma dran pa ni rnam shes nyid yin pa la yang /
translated: In the case of the perception of many and the memory of many, even though it is consciousness itself,

original: dran pa brjed pa'i phyogs de dang 'gal ba can ma yin par bstan pa ni @126a * //
analyzed: dran pa brjed pa'i phyogs de dang 'gal ba can ma yin par bstan pa ni @126a * //
translated: it is taught that it is not contradictory to the position of “forgetting a memory”:

original: de mtshungs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de mtshungs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “similar to that”

original: bag chags thams cad gcig gi tshe kho na nye ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bag chags thams cad gcig gi tshe kho na nye ba ni ma yin te /
translated: All latent predispositions are not proximate at the same time,

original: bag chags kyi nus pa khas mi len pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bag chags kyi nus pa khas mi len pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: because the capacity of latent predispositions is not accepted.🔽It is taught:

original: de ma thag pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “immediately preceding”

original: snga ma snga ma tshes ches gsal ba'i shes pa'i bdag nyid rim gyis 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: snga ma snga ma tshes ches gsal ba'i shes pa'i bdag nyid rim gyis 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that the former, which is the nature of clear consciousness, gradually changes is:

original: snang ba ni gsal zhing zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba ni gsal zhing zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The appearance is clear…”

original: shes pa phyi ma'i nus pa yin zhing snga ma snga'i rnam shes ni phyi ma la mngon du phyogs ba ste /
analyzed: shes pa phyi ma'i nus pa yin zhing snga ma snga'i rnam shes ni phyi ma la mngon du phyogs ba ste /
translated: The potential of the later consciousness is the former consciousness, which is directed toward the later.

original: mthong ba'am gzhan yang rung ba cung zad mthong ba'i dbye ba la ltos nas med kyang 'bras bu de byed pa yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba'am gzhan yang rung ba cung zad mthong ba'i dbye ba la ltos nas med kyang 'bras bu de byed pa yin te /
translated: Even though it does not exist in the division of the slightest seeing or non-seeing, it is the cause of the effect.

original: dus tha dad pa la yang lhan cig byed pa mthong bar byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni sad byed ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: dus tha dad pa la yang lhan cig byed pa mthong bar byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni sad byed ces bya ba ste /
translated: The teaching that it is seen to be a co-originator even in different times is:🔽“The awakener…”

original: nus pa'i bag chags nyid la'am sad par byed pa'i dbye bas byas pa'i 'bras bu tha dad pa'i rim pa 'dis bstan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nus pa'i bag chags nyid la'am sad par byed pa'i dbye bas byas pa'i 'bras bu tha dad pa'i rim pa 'dis bstan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement is that the effect is made by the division of the potential’s latent impression or the awakener.

original: nus pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni de las tha mi dad pa'am /
analyzed: nus pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni de las tha mi dad pa'am /
translated: The difference in the potential is not different from that.

original: shes pa phyi ma'i bdag nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: shes pa phyi ma'i bdag nyid kyang ngo //
translated: It is also the nature of the later consciousness.

original: bag chags yod pa nyid dang zhes bya ba ni shes pa phyi ma'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: bag chags yod pa nyid dang zhes bya ba ni shes pa phyi ma'i bdag nyid do //
translated: “The existence of the latent potentialities” refers to the nature of the subsequent cognition.

original: phyi rol gyi nyams su myong ba med pa sa de'i bag chags yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi nyams su myong ba med pa sa de'i bag chags yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Since there is no external experience, it is the latent potentialities of that.

original: bag chags kyi dbye ba la rgyu ci yod ces na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bag chags kyi dbye ba la rgyu ci yod ces na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is the cause of the division of the latent potentialities?

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i ngo bo tha dad par mi snang na 'khrul par mi rigs par bstan pa ni /🔽de'i rgyu mtshan yod pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i ngo bo tha dad par mi snang na 'khrul par mi rigs par bstan pa ni / de'i rgyu mtshan yod pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If the nature of blue, etc., does not appear as different, it is not logical to say that it is an error.

original: bag chags tha dad ma med pa yin te /
analyzed: bag chags tha dad ma med pa yin te /
translated: The reason for that is that the latent potentialities are not different.

original: tha dad pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba bsal ba yin no /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba bsal ba yin no /
translated: The absence of a cause of difference is the refutation.

original: shes pa tha dad rgyu yin na //
analyzed: shes pa tha dad rgyu yin na //
translated: If the cause of the difference of consciousnesses is the latent potentialities,

original: de yi tha dad ji ltar yin //
analyzed: de yi tha dad ji ltar yin //
translated: how can there be a difference in them?

original: bag chags tha dad las she na //
analyzed: bag chags tha dad las she na //
translated: If it is from the difference of the latent potentialities,

original: phan tshun rten pa 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: phan tshun rten pa 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: they would be established as mutually dependent.

original: zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: zhes zer ba ni /
translated: This is what is said.

original: de ltar phan tshun rten pa yi //
analyzed: de ltar phan tshun rten pa yi //
translated: Thus, they are mutually dependent.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is said.

original: de nyid min zhes bya ba ni skyed byed ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nyid min zhes bya ba ni skyed byed ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: “They are not real” is connected with “the producer.”

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni skyed byed kyi shes pa'i ste /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni skyed byed kyi shes pa'i ste /
translated: The phrase “that itself” refers to the consciousness that produces the image.

original: sa bon dang myu gu lta bur zhes bya ba ni lan yin no //
analyzed: sa bon dang myu gu lta bur zhes bya ba ni lan yin no //
translated: The phrase “like a seed and a sprout” is the response.

original: rtogs pa'i ngo bo dngos su rnam par shes pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i ngo bo dngos su rnam par shes pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the nature of the understanding of an object directly a consciousness?

original: de ltar yang don gyi rnam pa nyid du tha mi dad pa ni dngos su ba'i bag chags tsam las byung ba'i phyir shes pa rnams par byed par mi byed na dang ba'i shes pa'i ngo bo las sa bon dang myu gu'i rigs pa ji ltar yin /
analyzed: de ltar yang don gyi rnam pa nyid du tha mi dad pa ni dngos su ba'i bag chags tsam las byung ba'i phyir shes pa rnams par byed par mi byed na dang ba'i shes pa'i ngo bo las sa bon dang myu gu'i rigs pa ji ltar yin /
translated: If the form of the object is not different from the consciousness, then the consciousness does not produce the form of the object, because the form of the object arises from the mere latent impressions of the consciousness. How can the form of the object be like a seed and a sprout?

original: rang las tha dad @126b pa dang / des tha dad pa dang ldan pa ma yin zhing /🔽yod pa nyid la yang tshad ma dang bag chags pa nyid kyi tshad ma dang tha dad pa la yang yod pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: rang las tha dad @126b pa dang / des tha dad pa dang ldan pa ma yin zhing / yod pa nyid la yang tshad ma dang bag chags pa nyid kyi tshad ma dang tha dad pa la yang yod pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The form of the object is not different from the consciousness, nor does it possess a difference from the consciousness.

original: gal te don gyi bye brag gi //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te don gyi bye brag gi // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it exists, then it is not different from the valid knowledge that perceives it.🔽If the form of the object is not different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not different from the valid knowledge that perceives it.🔽If the form of the object is different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.🔽If the form of the object is not different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.🔽If the form of the object is different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.🔽If the form of the object is not different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.🔽If the form of the object is different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.🔽If the form of the object is not different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.🔽If the form of the object is different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.🔽If the form of the object is not different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.🔽If the form of the object is different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.🔽If the form of the object is not different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.🔽If the form of the object is different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i bskyed bya'i 'du byed pa ni bag chags yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bskyed bya'i 'du byed pa ni bag chags yin te /
translated: If the form of the object is not different from the consciousness, then the form of the object is not an object of that consciousness.🔽If the form of the object

original: gang nyams su myong ba ches gsal ba ni dran pa'i sa bon 'jog par byed do zhes gsungs pas so //🔽de gal te 'dzin pa dang dran pa'i ngo bo'i shes pa 'byed par byed na yul gyis tha dad pa ma yin bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang nyams su myong ba ches gsal ba ni dran pa'i sa bon 'jog par byed do zhes gsungs pas so // de gal te 'dzin pa dang dran pa'i ngo bo'i shes pa 'byed par byed na yul gyis tha dad pa ma yin bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The one that is most vivid in experience plants the seed of memory.🔽If it distinguishes the consciousness that has the nature of apprehension and memory, it will not be different from the object.

original: 'dzin pa'i dbye ba byed na yang //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i dbye ba byed na yang //
translated: If it makes a distinction in apprehension,

original: gzung ba'i dbye ba su zhig byed //
analyzed: gzung ba'i dbye ba su zhig byed //
translated: who makes the distinction in the object?

original: bsams nas bskyed pa yin na ni //
analyzed: bsams nas bskyed pa yin na ni //
translated: If it is produced by reflection,

original: dran pa tsam las byed par 'gyur //🔽zhes smos so zhes theg pa ni //
analyzed: dran pa tsam las byed par 'gyur // zhes smos so zhes theg pa ni //
translated: it will be produced from mere memory.🔽Thus, the vehicle

original: de la bag chags zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la bag chags zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is called a latent impression.

original: bag chags ni dran pa'i sa bon ma yin gyi ches gsal ba'i rnam shes yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bag chags ni dran pa'i sa bon ma yin gyi ches gsal ba'i rnam shes yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: A latent impression is not the seed of memory, but it is taught to be a very vivid consciousness.

original: 'dir ni rnam shes snga ma nyid //
analyzed: 'dir ni rnam shes snga ma nyid //
translated: Here, it is the previous consciousness itself

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: that is called a latent impression.

original: de ni de lta bu'i rnam pa khyad par can skyed par byed pa ni bag chags yin te /
analyzed: de ni de lta bu'i rnam pa khyad par can skyed par byed pa ni bag chags yin te /
translated: That which produces such a special aspect is a latent impression,

original: sad pa'i shes pa bzhin du rmi lam la'o zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sad pa'i shes pa bzhin du rmi lam la'o zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: like a waking consciousness in a dream.

original: de dang de'i rnam pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dang de'i rnam pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In the aspect of that and that” means in the aspect of the object.

original: 'bras bu'i dus na de med kyang de byed pa ni bag chags yin par brjod do zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dus na de med kyang de byed pa ni bag chags yin par brjod do zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Even though it does not exist at the time of the effect, it is called a “habit energy” because it is the cause of that.

original: dper na lcags sgrog gis bcings pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na lcags sgrog gis bcings pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is illustrated by the example of “being bound by a chain.”

original: rta la sogs pa dran pa'i sa bon dang mi mthun pa'i bag chags yod pa nyid kyi tshad ma la bstan nas dbye ba la bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rta la sogs pa dran pa'i sa bon dang mi mthun pa'i bag chags yod pa nyid kyi tshad ma la bstan nas dbye ba la bstan pa ni /
translated: The division of habit energy is taught by the example of the horse, etc.

original: bag chags dbye bas zhes bya ba ste //
analyzed: bag chags dbye bas zhes bya ba ste //
translated: The verse says, “The division of habit energy.”

original: shes pa'i bdag nyid yin pas bzung ba'i rnam pa ni bag chags kyis byas pa yin yang dngos su ba kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽'di la yang phyi rol gyi shes bya ni bdag cag gi yin gyi /
analyzed: shes pa'i bdag nyid yin pas bzung ba'i rnam pa ni bag chags kyis byas pa yin yang dngos su ba kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // 'di la yang phyi rol gyi shes bya ni bdag cag gi yin gyi /
translated: The aspect of the object is produced by habit energy, but it is the direct object of consciousness.🔽Here, the opponent says, “We have external objects, but you don’t.

original: khyed la ni med pa'i phyir ji ltar shes pa tha dad pa yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: khyed la ni med pa'i phyir ji ltar shes pa tha dad pa yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: So how can you have different consciousnesses?”

original: ji ste der yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ste der yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The verse says, “Even if there are no external objects,” etc.

original: yul 'di dang 'brel pa bzhin du 'di med pa kho na yin par shes par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yul 'di dang 'brel pa bzhin du 'di med pa kho na yin par shes par bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation that this is known to be non-existent just as it is related to this object is:

original: 'dir dmigs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir dmigs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, it is called the object.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Otherwise, it is not so, is to be supplied.

original: 'o na de la zhes bya ba ni yul 'di dang 'brel pa la'o //
analyzed: 'o na de la zhes bya ba ni yul 'di dang 'brel pa la'o //
translated: Now, in that is in relation to this object.

original: rten dang cig shos ma gtogs par 'brel pa med na /
analyzed: rten dang cig shos ma gtogs par 'brel pa med na /
translated: If there is no relation except for the basis and the other,

original: log pa dang cig shos la tha dad pa med par bstan pa ni gal te @127a * //
analyzed: log pa dang cig shos la tha dad pa med par bstan pa ni gal te @127a * //
translated: the non-existence and the other are taught to be without difference. If

original: 'brel pa la'ang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa la'ang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: even in relation,

original: bag chags ni dran pa'i sa bon ma yin la /
analyzed: bag chags ni dran pa'i sa bon ma yin la /
translated: Latent impressions are not the seeds of memory.

original: shes pa dag gi 'bras bu dang rgyu'i ngo bo bsgo bya sgo byed kyi ngo bor 'gyur zhing rim gyis ma yin par skyes pa dag dang skad cig pa rnams dang / sems dang rjes su 'gro ba med par 'jigs pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: shes pa dag gi 'bras bu dang rgyu'i ngo bo bsgo bya sgo byed kyi ngo bor 'gyur zhing rim gyis ma yin par skyes pa dag dang skad cig pa rnams dang / sems dang rjes su 'gro ba med par 'jigs pa la yang ngo //
translated: The nature of the result and cause of consciousnesses becomes the nature of the expressed and the expresser. Those that arise without sequence, those that are momentary, and those that are not concomitant with the mind are also so.

original: bsgo bya sgo byed dag lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'di bag chags med pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: bsgo bya sgo byed dag lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'di bag chags med pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Since the one to be imprinted and the one that imprints are not simultaneous, this is not an imprint.

original: ji ste shes pa skad cig pa //
analyzed: ji ste shes pa skad cig pa //
translated: If consciousness is momentary,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: as you say,🔽then the past consciousness does not imprint the present consciousness, because it has already ceased, as before.

original: zhig pa ni snga ma bzhin du chos snga ma bas yang snga rol du ma skyes pa'i phyir sgo bar byed pa ma yin la /🔽skad cig ma snga ma rnams kyis ma skyes pa'i skad cig pa phyi ma ni bsgo bya ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: zhig pa ni snga ma bzhin du chos snga ma bas yang snga rol du ma skyes pa'i phyir sgo bar byed pa ma yin la / skad cig ma snga ma rnams kyis ma skyes pa'i skad cig pa phyi ma ni bsgo bya ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The future consciousness is not imprinted by the past consciousness, because it has not yet arisen, as before.🔽The present consciousness is not imprinted by the past consciousness, because they do not exist simultaneously.🔽The past consciousness does not imprint the future consciousness, because it has already ceased, as before.

original: ma skyes pa ni bsgo bar bya ba ma yin la zhes bya ba'o //🔽snga ma rnams ni zhig pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ma skyes pa ni bsgo bar bya ba ma yin la zhes bya ba'o // snga ma rnams ni zhig pa'i phyir //
translated: The future consciousness is not imprinted by the past consciousness, because it has not yet arisen, as before.🔽The present consciousness is not imprinted by the future consciousness, because they do not exist simultaneously.

original: phyi ma dag gis bsgos pa min //🔽zhes zer ba ni /🔽'das pa'i don yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyi ma dag gis bsgos pa min // zhes zer ba ni / 'das pa'i don yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The past consciousness does not imprint the present consciousness, because it has already ceased, as before.🔽The future consciousness is not imprinted by the present consciousness, because it has not yet arisen, as before.

original: sgo bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la yang yang gi sgra yin no //
analyzed: sgo bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la yang yang gi sgra yin no //
translated: The present consciousness is not imprinted by the present consciousness, because they do not exist simultaneously.

original: lhan cig skye ba dag la yang des bskyed par bya ba med pa'i phyir lhan cig pa yin kyang de dag la 'brel pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir bag chags med par zhes zer ba ni /🔽lhan cig pa dag kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skye ba dag la yang des bskyed par bya ba med pa'i phyir lhan cig pa yin kyang de dag la 'brel pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir bag chags med par zhes zer ba ni / lhan cig pa dag kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word “also” in the verse indicates that even though they are simultaneous, they are not related to each other.

original: bsgo bar bya ba dang / sgo bar byed pa ma yin na skad cig pa nyid ni bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni bzlog par sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgo bar bya ba dang / sgo bar byed pa ma yin na skad cig pa nyid ni bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni bzlog par sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If they are not the object and subject of the act of remembering, then the argument proves the opposite of the conclusion that they are momentary.

original: dran pa'i sa bon gyi ngo bo'i bag chags kyang bzung ba'i dbye bas khyad par can ma yin pa nyid kyi 'dzin pa'i dbye ba skyed par byed pa yin gyi nyams su myong ba 'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dran pa'i sa bon gyi ngo bo'i bag chags kyang bzung ba'i dbye bas khyad par can ma yin pa nyid kyi 'dzin pa'i dbye ba skyed par byed pa yin gyi nyams su myong ba 'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The word “also” in the verse indicates that even though the latent impressions that are the essence of the seed of memory are not distinguished by the distinction of the object, they produce the distinction of the subject. They are not just the experience.

original: tha mi dang par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni //🔽dran la 'dzin dbye yod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha mi dang par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni //🔽dran la 'dzin dbye yod ces bya ba'o //
translated: The word “also” in the verse indicates that if they are not distinguished by the distinction of the object, they would not be distinguished by the distinction of the subject.🔽The word “also” in the verse indicates that if they are not distinguished by the distinction of the subject, they would not be distinguished by the distinction of the object.

original: skad cig pa nyid du rim gyis 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo dang / bsgo bya sgo byed kyi ngo bo yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: skad cig pa nyid du rim gyis 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo dang / bsgo bya sgo byed kyi ngo bo yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The nature of cause and effect and the nature of the one who is to be guided and the one who guides are taught because of the gradual arising of momentariness.

original: skad cig pa'i sems ngag la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: skad cig pa'i sems ngag la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The mind and speech of the momentary one.

original: bskyed bya'i khyad par ni bsgo bya'i ming can ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bskyed bya'i khyad par ni bsgo bya'i ming can ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the word “one who is to be guided” is not a particular thing to be produced.

original: 'di rtag pa la mi srid par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'di rtag pa la mi srid par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that this is impossible for the permanent:

original: don 'thad rtag pa la ma yin //🔽zhes bya ba'o //🔽skye ba'i di ma thag tu 'jigs pa'i gzhan la byed pa med pa yin te skad cig pa yin @127b pa'i phyir ro //🔽gnyi ga la yang phan tshun byed pa med do snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: don 'thad rtag pa la ma yin // zhes bya ba'o // skye ba'i di ma thag tu 'jigs pa'i gzhan la byed pa med pa yin te skad cig pa yin @127b pa'i phyir ro // gnyi ga la yang phan tshun byed pa med do snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The meaning is not tenable for the permanent.🔽The one who is to be guided is not the one who guides because of the impossibility of the activity of the one who is to be guided.🔽The activity of the one who is to be guided is not the activity of the one who guides because of the impossibility of the activity of the one who is to be guided.

original: bsgo bya sgo byed dngos po 'di //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgo bya sgo byed dngos po 'di // zhes bya ba'o //

original: 'jig pa'i gnas skabs can ni phyi ma'i sgo byed ma yin te med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i gnas skabs can ni phyi ma'i sgo byed ma yin te med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The activity of the one who is to be guided is not the activity of the one who guides because of the impossibility of the activity of the one who is to be guided.🔽The activity of the one who is to be guided is not the activity of the one who guides because of the impossibility of the activity of the one who

original: 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dngos po yang 'jig par 'gyur ba gzhan gyis ji ltar bsgo byar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dngos po yang 'jig par 'gyur ba gzhan gyis ji ltar bsgo byar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la /
translated: How could a thing that is to be destroyed be ordered to be destroyed by another that is to be destroyed?

original: 'jig pa snga mas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa snga mas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to this is: “By the previous destruction.”

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu ma gtogs pa bsgo bya sgo byed kyi ngo bo ni brtan pa rnams nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu ma gtogs pa bsgo bya sgo byed kyi ngo bo ni brtan pa rnams nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Apart from cause and effect, the nature of the one who orders and the one who is ordered would be permanent.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: And why?🔽The response to this is: “The impression of the order is in the permanent thing.”

original: brtan pa'i dngos la bstan dngos kyi //🔽bag chags sgo bar byed pa yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: brtan pa'i dngos la bstan dngos kyi // bag chags sgo bar byed pa yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The idea is that the nature of the one who orders and the one who is ordered is permanent.

original: brtan pa'i dngos la zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: brtan pa'i dngos la zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The response to this is: “The impression of the order is in the permanent thing.”

original: phan pa byed pa ma yin pa ni sgo bar byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phan pa byed pa ma yin pa ni sgo bar byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The idea is that that which does not benefit is not the one who orders.🔽If consciousness, which is not different from itself, is the one who orders, then the transformation is the one who orders.

original: shes pa ni rang las tha mi dad pa ni rnam par 'gyur ba byed na 'du byed pa ni byed pa po nyid yin te /
analyzed: shes pa ni rang las tha mi dad pa ni rnam par 'gyur ba byed na 'du byed pa ni byed pa po nyid yin te /
translated: But if the transformation is the one who orders, then the one who orders is the agent.

original: tha dad pa skyed pa la ni de'i'o zhes 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa skyed pa la ni de'i'o zhes 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The idea is that it is not tenable that the one who orders is the agent.

original: gzhan gyi dgos pa nyid rigs pa yin no zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dgos pa nyid rigs pa yin no zhes zer ba la /
translated: The response to this is: “The impression of the order is in the permanent thing.”🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders is not the agent.🔽The idea is that the one who orders

original: brtan par gnas pa snga ma la //
analyzed: brtan par gnas pa snga ma la //
translated: The former is the basis of the latter.🔽

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and the second is the one that is stable.

original: khyed kyi blo ni skad cig na //
analyzed: khyed kyi blo ni skad cig na //
translated: Your cognition is momentary,

original: rjes su mthun nyid de yod min //
analyzed: rjes su mthun nyid de yod min //
translated: and there is no continuity of it.

original: yin la snga ma'i rjes su 'jug pa ma yin na phyi ma 'dra ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa la de dang rjes su mthun zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: yin la snga ma'i rjes su 'jug pa ma yin na phyi ma 'dra ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa la de dang rjes su mthun zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If it is not the case that the latter is similar to the former, then the latter is not a continuation of the former.

original: snga ma ni phyi ma'i rjes su 'jug pa rigs pa ma yin la /
analyzed: snga ma ni phyi ma'i rjes su 'jug pa rigs pa ma yin la /
translated: It is not logical that the latter is a continuation of the former.

original: 'dra ba nyid ni tha dad pa nyid du rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid ni tha dad pa nyid du rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Similarity is understood as identity.

original: de rtogs pa'i yul yin par nges par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de rtogs pa'i yul yin par nges par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is ascertained as the object of that understanding.

original: de ma thag tu bskyed pa ni 'bras bu nyid min la /
analyzed: de ma thag tu bskyed pa ni 'bras bu nyid min la /
translated: That which is produced immediately is not the effect.

original: de ma thag tu nges pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni rgyu nyid yin te /🔽ma skyes pa dang skyes bzhin pa dang / mthong ba rnams med pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ma thag tu nges pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni rgyu nyid yin te / ma skyes pa dang skyes bzhin pa dang / mthong ba rnams med pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is ascertained immediately is the cause.

original: sngar byung ba thams cad byed pa po nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar byung ba thams cad byed pa po nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not logical that the non-arisen, the arisen, and the seen are the cause, because it would follow that everything that occurs previously would be the agent.

original: snga ma'i shes pa ma skyes pa'i //
analyzed: snga ma'i shes pa ma skyes pa'i //
translated: The effect of the prior cognition,

original: 'bras bur 'gar yang rtsom mi byed //
analyzed: 'bras bur 'gar yang rtsom mi byed //
translated: which has not yet arisen, is not produced at all.

original: de la 'jig pa yod min zhing //
analyzed: de la 'jig pa yod min zhing //
translated: And it does not disintegrate.

original: rdzogs pa'ang skad cig gnas pa yin snyam du sems pa la //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'ang skad cig gnas pa yin snyam du sems pa la //
translated: You may think that the completion of the prior cognition is its enduring for an instant.

original: rnams shes tshad mas de tshe zhes bya ba ste rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa las byung ba'i rtogs pas rtogs pa'i rgyun gyi khongs su gtogs pa pa'i skad cig ma rgyu nyid du khas len na /
analyzed: rnams shes tshad mas de tshe zhes bya ba ste rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa las byung ba'i rtogs pas rtogs pa'i rgyun gyi khongs su gtogs pa pa'i skad cig ma rgyu nyid du khas len na /
translated: But when you accept that the instant is the cause that belongs to the continuum that is perceived by the valid cognition that perceives it,

original: snga ma tsam la ni thal ches pa ma yin no zhes @128a * //
analyzed: snga ma tsam la ni thal ches pa ma yin no zhes @128a * //
translated: then it is not the case that the mere prior instant is too remote.

original: bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement.

original: de'i phyir skyes nas 'jigs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de'i phyir skyes nas 'jigs pa'i phyir //
translated: Therefore, because it disintegrates after it has arisen,

original: skad cig ma la 'ang rtsom pa med //
analyzed: skad cig ma la 'ang rtsom pa med //
translated: it does not begin again.

original: ces bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following demonstrates that this is illogical:

original: des na skyes nas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na skyes nas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “after it has arisen.”

original: rjes su 'gro ba med par 'jig pa yin na snga ma'i ngo bo rjes su 'jug pa med pa'i phyir 'dra ba nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med par 'jig pa yin na snga ma'i ngo bo rjes su 'jug pa med pa'i phyir 'dra ba nyid ma yin te /
translated: If it disintegrated without being followed by another, then it would not be similar because the prior entity would not be followed by another.

original: rjes su 'gro ba med par zhig pa'i phyir rjes su mthun pa nyid gang las yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med par zhig pa'i phyir rjes su mthun pa nyid gang las yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Since it is destroyed without a subsequent state, how can there be a subsequent conformity?🔽Since it is destroyed without a subsequent state,

original: rjes 'gro med par zhig gyur par //
analyzed: rjes 'gro med par zhig gyur par //
translated: how can there be a subsequent conformity?

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is:

original: 'dra ba skyed par byed nyid kyis //
analyzed: 'dra ba skyed par byed nyid kyis //
translated: Because it produces a similar subsequent state,🔽it is a latent impression.

original: bag chags nyid yin nam tshan nyid mi mthun pa dag la bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa dag gi ngo bor mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni gal te ba lar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bag chags nyid yin nam tshan nyid mi mthun pa dag la bskyed par bya ba dang / skyed par byed pa dag gi ngo bor mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni gal te ba lar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that a cause that is dissimilar to its result cannot be the entity that produces it, the response is:

original: lan ni gzhan gyis bar du chod na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni gzhan gyis bar du chod na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even if something else intervenes.

original: mtshan nyid mi 'dra'i shes pa kun //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi 'dra'i shes pa kun //
translated: If all cognitions that are dissimilar

original: mtshan nyid mi 'dra nyid min na snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi 'dra nyid min na snyam du sems pa la /
translated: were not similar,

original: glang po'i shes pas snga ma'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: glang po'i shes pas snga ma'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then an elephant cognition would not produce a human cognition.

original: gang gi lta ba la yang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni 'jig pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnams kyis kun gzhi la bsgos pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi lta ba la yang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni 'jig pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnams kyis kun gzhi la bsgos pa yin la /
translated: In any view, the foundation consciousness is infused by the consciousnesses that engage objects, which have the nature of destruction.

original: de rnams bskyed pa na cig car bskyed pa'am sna tshogs pa gcig tu bskyed pa yin gyi rim gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de rnams bskyed pa na cig car bskyed pa'am sna tshogs pa gcig tu bskyed pa yin gyi rim gyis ni ma yin te /
translated: When they are generated, they are generated all at once or generated as a variety, but not gradually.

original: phyi rol gyi don med pas ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro//🔽phyi don phan 'dogs min pa'i phyir //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don med pas ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro// phyi don phan 'dogs min pa'i phyir //
translated: When they are generated, they are generated all at once, not gradually, because they are not dependent on external objects.🔽Because external objects do not benefit,

original: gzhan don gyi dbang ma byas pas //
analyzed: gzhan don gyi dbang ma byas pas //
translated: they do not perform the function of another.

original: rjes 'gro med par 'jigs gyur na //
analyzed: rjes 'gro med par 'jigs gyur na //
translated: If they are afraid of not following,

original: 'bras bu rim gyis ji ltar byed //🔽ces bya ba se /
analyzed: 'bras bu rim gyis ji ltar byed // ces bya ba se /
translated: how can they gradually produce effects?

original: gzhan gyi don gyi dbang ma byas pa ni bskyed par rang bzhin gcig pa rnams so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyi dbang ma byas pa ni bskyed par rang bzhin gcig pa rnams so //
translated: Because they do not perform the function of another, they are of the same nature when generated.

original: rgyu zhig na ni 'dod pa yi //
analyzed: rgyu zhig na ni 'dod pa yi //
translated: When the cause is destroyed,

original: 'bras bu rtsom pa gzhan du min //
analyzed: 'bras bu rtsom pa gzhan du min //
translated: the desired effect is not produced elsewhere.

original: shes pa 'di nyid du zhig na //
analyzed: shes pa 'di nyid du zhig na //
translated: When this consciousness is destroyed,

original: bag chags thams cad 'jig par 'gyur //
analyzed: bag chags thams cad 'jig par 'gyur //
translated: all traces are destroyed.

original: zhes bya ba ste brtsam par bya ba ji snyed yod pa dus gcig kho na brtsam par bya ba'o snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste brtsam par bya ba ji snyed yod pa dus gcig kho na brtsam par bya ba'o snyam du sems pa la /
translated: One thinks that all that is to be produced is produced at one time only.

original: phyi rol med kyang smon lam gyi sems kyi khyad par la sogs pa rim gyi 'byung ba ni shes pa rim gyis skye ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rgyun chad med par bstan pa ni /🔽shes pa gcig nyid zhig pa yis //
analyzed: phyi rol med kyang smon lam gyi sems kyi khyad par la sogs pa rim gyi 'byung ba ni shes pa rim gyis skye ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rgyun chad med par bstan pa ni / shes pa gcig nyid zhig pa yis //
translated: The teaching that they are uninterrupted is:

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The single consciousness itself is destroyed.

original: bsag chags rnams kyi rims kyis byed pa'i lhan cig byed pa gzhan ma yin zhing /
analyzed: bsag chags rnams kyi rims kyis byed pa'i lhan cig byed pa gzhan ma yin zhing /
translated: If the cause of the sequential arising of the aggregates is not another simultaneous cause,

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i rgyu gzhan yang ma yin na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i rgyu gzhan yang ma yin na /
translated: and if there is no other cause that is not similar to the effect,🔽by what is the effect similar to another?

original: gang gis @128b gzhan dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur zhes gsal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gis @128b gzhan dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur zhes gsal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is clear.

original: mthong yang gzhan dang gzhan pa'i gnas skabs gzhan ni shing tog pi dza pu ra'i me tog la rgya skyegs kyis bsgos pa 'bras bu'i dus su gsal bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: mthong yang gzhan dang gzhan pa'i gnas skabs gzhan ni shing tog pi dza pu ra'i me tog la rgya skyegs kyis bsgos pa 'bras bu'i dus su gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: Even though it is seen, the other state is different. The flower of the pīlup fruit is dyed with lac, and at the time of the fruit it is clear.

original: rgyu gcig la byung ba yin la /
analyzed: rgyu gcig la byung ba yin la /
translated: It arises from a single cause.

original: gnas skabs gzhan na bsgos pa mi mngon pa kho na 'bras bu'i dus su mngon par gsal bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas skabs gzhan na bsgos pa mi mngon pa kho na 'bras bu'i dus su mngon par gsal bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the latent potentialities, which are not manifest in other states, are made manifest at the time of the effect.

original: snang du rung ba lan brgya gshags na yang de'i gnas skabs nam dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang du rung ba lan brgya gshags na yang de'i gnas skabs nam dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the state in which they are manifest is perceived even when the object is broken into a hundred pieces.

original: dmigs par bya ba ma yin pa dmigs pas dmigs pa ni bag chags de nyid yin par bstan pa ni /🔽me tog zhig par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs par bya ba ma yin pa dmigs pas dmigs pa ni bag chags de nyid yin par bstan pa ni / me tog zhig par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The latent potentialities themselves are indicated as the object of the perception of the non-apprehension of the object.

original: dmigs pa ma dmigs pa ni zhig pa yin la /
analyzed: dmigs pa ma dmigs pa ni zhig pa yin la /
translated: “The flower is destroyed” means that the object is not perceived.🔽The object is not perceived because it is destroyed.

original: de'i nus pa yang bag chags yin pa'i phyir de lta bu'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i nus pa yang bag chags yin pa'i phyir de lta bu'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: And because its capacity is a latent potentiality, it is not such an effect.

original: de'i phyir 'di mi bden te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di mi bden te /
translated: Therefore, this is not correct.

original: bi dza pu ra'i sogs me tog / rgya skyegs khu bas bsgos pa gang //
analyzed: bi dza pu ra'i sogs me tog / rgya skyegs khu bas bsgos pa gang //
translated: Whatever flower, such as the jasmine, is dyed with lac juice,

original: de yi dngos la 'phos nyid yin //
analyzed: de yi dngos la 'phos nyid yin //
translated: its own entity is transferred to that.

original: bag chags 'bras bu la gsal 'gyur //
analyzed: bag chags 'bras bu la gsal 'gyur //
translated: The latent potentiality is manifest in the effect.

original: 'o ma dang chub la sogs pa bzhin du rgyud gcig pa ni 'bras bu rim gyis 'byung ba'i rim pa byed pa'i sad byed yod pa yin no zhes de'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o ma dang chub la sogs pa bzhin du rgyud gcig pa ni 'bras bu rim gyis 'byung ba'i rim pa byed pa'i sad byed yod pa yin no zhes de'i phyir /
translated: Just as milk and curd are in the same continuum, the cause of the subsequent effect is the agent that produces the sequence of effects.

original: 'di dag thams cad las zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsal ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad las zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsal ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the following is stated to clarify this:

original: de'i phyir 'di dag thams cad las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dag thams cad las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Therefore, all of these…”

original: kun gzhi zhig kyang bag chags gzhan las byung bar khas blangs pas 'jug pa'i rnam shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kun gzhi zhig kyang bag chags gzhan las byung bar khas blangs pas 'jug pa'i rnam shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though the foundation consciousness is refuted, it is accepted that the arising of the evolving consciousnesses occurs from other latent ten dencies.

original: gal te rnam shes rgyu bzhin du //
analyzed: gal te rnam shes rgyu bzhin du //
translated: If consciousness is like a cause,🔽then the cause of the latent

original: bag chags rnams kyi rgyu yang ni //🔽de'i rjes bag chags las shes pa //
analyzed: bag chags rnams kyi rgyu yang ni // de'i rjes bag chags las shes pa //
translated: tendencies🔽is consciousness that arises from the latent tendencies.

original: de las kyang ni bag chags yin //
analyzed: de las kyang ni bag chags yin //
translated: And from that, the latent tendencies.

original: zhes bya ba bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba bsal ba yin te /
translated: This is the refutation.

original: shes pa'i bskyed bya shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi nus pa'i bag chags khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa'i bskyed bya shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi nus pa'i bag chags khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because it is accepted that the latent tendencies are the potentiality that is the nature of consciousness, which is the product of consciousness.

original: bag chags ldan rnams zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bag chags ldan rnams zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is indicated by “Those who possess latent tendencies…”

original: shes pa las tha mi dad pa yin na bag chags dang shes pa dag tha dad pa'i skyon med do //
analyzed: shes pa las tha mi dad pa yin na bag chags dang shes pa dag tha dad pa'i skyon med do //
translated: If it is not different from consciousness, there is no fault of the latent potentialities and consciousness being different.🔽Sometimes they are similar to each other,

original: res 'ga' de dag phan tshun ni //
analyzed: res 'ga' de dag phan tshun ni //
translated: and sometimes they are not.🔽The statement🔽is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic

original: mtshungs pa nyid ni byed pa yin //
analyzed: mtshungs pa nyid ni byed pa yin //
translated: by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement

original: zhes bya ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba bstan pa ni /
translated: is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic🔽by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement

original: bag chags las te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bag chags las te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic

original: mtshan nyid mi 'dra'i rgyu gzhan min //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi 'dra'i rgyu gzhan min //
translated: by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement🔽is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic

original: gang gis gzhan 'dra'i 'bras bu yin //
analyzed: gang gis gzhan 'dra'i 'bras bu yin //
translated: by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bsal ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bsal ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic🔽by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement

original: pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic🔽by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement

original: de'i phyir kun rdzob bden pa 'di //
analyzed: de'i phyir kun rdzob bden pa 'di //
translated: is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic🔽by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement🔽is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic

original: brtags pa yin gyi dngos yod min //
analyzed: brtags pa yin gyi dngos yod min //
translated: by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement🔽is from the latent potentialities.

original: zhes bya ba'ang yid ldog pa la gnas pa yin gyi ngo bo la gnas pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'ang yid ldog pa la gnas pa yin gyi ngo bo la gnas pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: There is no other cause that has a different characteristic

original: de'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement🔽is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic🔽by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement

original: tha dad pa ma yin pa yang bstan pa nyid kyis byed pa po nyid yin no zhes bya ba bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa ma yin pa yang bstan pa nyid kyis byed pa po nyid yin no zhes bya ba bsal ba yin no //
translated: is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic🔽by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement🔽is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic🔽by which there is an effect that is similar to another.🔽The statement🔽is from the latent potentialities.🔽There is no other cause that has a different characteristic🔽by which there is an effect that is similar to another

original: 'di lta bu yi dngos po las //
analyzed: 'di lta bu yi dngos po las //
translated: From such things

original: la las 'bras bu skye ba mi na //
analyzed: la las 'bras bu skye ba mi na //
translated: As these, effects are not produced.

original: zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught by

original: de'i 'bras bu'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Its effect” and so on.

original: shes byed gang gi la gnas pa //
analyzed: shes byed gang gi la gnas pa //
translated: The one who is established in the knower

original: shes pa goms pas ldan par 'gyur //🔽de yi de ni bag chags brten //
analyzed: shes pa goms pas ldan par 'gyur // de yi de ni bag chags brten //
translated: Will be endowed with the knowledge through practice.🔽Its latent impressions are based on that,

original: bag chags kyang ni de nyid yin //
analyzed: bag chags kyang ni de nyid yin //
translated: And the latent impressions are just that.

original: zhes bya ba bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni //
translated: This is taught by

original: gang dag shes byed brtan pa dang // zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang dag shes byed brtan pa dang // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The one who is established in the knower” and so on.

original: de'i 'di ltar bag chags med pa la rigs pa rnams rgyal ba can yod pa yin no //🔽rigs pa med cing yod min brtags yin la //
analyzed: de'i 'di ltar bag chags med pa la rigs pa rnams rgyal ba can yod pa yin no // rigs pa med cing yod min brtags yin la //
translated: Thus, for those who have no latent impressions, the arguments are victorious.🔽The nonexistence of latent impressions is reasonable,

original: bag chags gang yin don gyis sel ba 'di //
analyzed: bag chags gang yin don gyis sel ba 'di //
translated: But the existence of latent impressions is unreasonable.🔽The existence of latent impressions is imagined.

original: zhen ldog don du sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs /
analyzed: zhen ldog don du sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs /
translated: The existence of latent impressions is taught by the buddhas🔽For the purpose of turning people away from clinging to🔽The existence of latent impressions.

original: gzhan dag de la rnam 'gar 'dzin par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan dag de la rnam 'gar 'dzin par 'gyur //
translated: Others will cling to it in some way.

original: zhes bya ba 'di la yang lan ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di la yang lan ni /
translated: The response to this is

original: rigs pas 'thad pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs pas 'thad pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The existence of latent impressions is reasonable.”

original: nyon mongs rgya mtsho phrag dog gi //
analyzed: nyon mongs rgya mtsho phrag dog gi //
translated: The ocean of afflictions is jealousy.

original: rba klong 'khyil bar 'khor ba yi //
analyzed: rba klong 'khyil bar 'khor ba yi //
translated: And in the middle of the churning waves.🔽

original: 'gro rmongs mthong las rgyal bcan //
analyzed: 'gro rmongs mthong las rgyal bcan //
translated: The world of beings is seen to revolve in the whirlpool of the waves of samsara.🔽Who, having seen this, would not strive to attain victory over the afflictions?

original: lam des su zhig grol mi 'gyur //
analyzed: lam des su zhig grol mi 'gyur //
translated: By what path will one be liberated?

original: rnam pa'i bag chags las rnams ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa'i bag chags las rnams ma yin nam /
translated: Are not actions the imprints of the aspects?🔽And is not consciousness also that? And so both are distinct.

original: shes pa'i yang de yin pa'i phyir la de lta yin dang gnyi ga yang so so ba nyid yin no zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: shes pa'i yang de yin pa'i phyir la de lta yin dang gnyi ga yang so so ba nyid yin no zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: rnam pa'i rnam dbye bas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rnam pa'i rnam dbye bas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because of the division of the aspects.

original: rnam pa'i rnam par dbye ba yin gyi shes pa ni ma yin pa de'i phyir dbye ba ni med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa'i rnam par dbye ba yin gyi shes pa ni ma yin pa de'i phyir dbye ba ni med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The division is of the aspects, not of consciousness. Therefore, there is no division. This is the meaning.

original: phyir rol gyi don nyid dang bral na rig pa'i khongs su gtogs pa tha mi dad pa'i dmigs pa can gyi shes pa dmigs pa med par brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phyir rol gyi don nyid dang bral na rig pa'i khongs su gtogs pa tha mi dad pa'i dmigs pa can gyi shes pa dmigs pa med par brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: When there is no external object, consciousness, which is included in cognition, and which has an undifferentiated object, is said to be without an object. This is shown by

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “For that very reason.”

original: rang nyid ces bya ba ni tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid ces bya ba ni tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “By itself” means because it is the definition of valid cognition.

original: tshad ma'i 'bras bu ni sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa la byung ba'o //
analyzed: tshad ma'i 'bras bu ni sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa la byung ba'o //
translated: The result of valid knowledge is the capacity to establish.

original: 'di'i phyir yang 'di'o zhes dpe ma grub pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: 'di'i phyir yang 'di'o zhes dpe ma grub pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
translated: For this reason, is it not the case that the example is not established?

original: rtsod pa'i gzhi zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gzhi zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The basis of debate is called the example.

original: pha rol la yang grub pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: pha rol la yang grub pa kho na yin no //
translated: It is established for the other party as well.

original: rmi lam gyi goms @129b pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid yin yang gzhan la yang gnod pa med pa de ci las yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: rmi lam gyi goms @129b pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid yin yang gzhan la yang gnod pa med pa de ci las yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Even though it is the continuation of the habituation of a dream, why is there no harm to others?

original: ji ltar khyab pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar khyab pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is called the pervasion.

original: goms pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid la gnod pa'i don can gyi gnod pa ni myur du nyams pa yin gyi gzhan gyi ma yin par bstan pa ni /🔽rigs gang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: goms pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid la gnod pa'i don can gyi gnod pa ni myur du nyams pa yin gyi gzhan gyi ma yin par bstan pa ni / rigs gang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The harm that is the meaning of harm to the continuation of habituation is quickly destroyed, but not that of others. The teaching of this is the type.

original: rigs gang gang las grub pa ni zhes bya ba'i rigs pa bstan pa ni gus par goms pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs gang gang las grub pa ni zhes bya ba'i rigs pa bstan pa ni gus par goms pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of the reasoning from what type is it established? is respectful habituation.

original: skad cig gis nyams pas gnod pa yin na goms pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyis rmi lam du de la dmigs pa ma yin pa rang la dmigs pa ma yin gyi shes pa nyid la ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /🔽gal te rmi lam gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skad cig gis nyams pas gnod pa yin na goms pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyis rmi lam du de la dmigs pa ma yin pa rang la dmigs pa ma yin gyi shes pa nyid la ma yin no zhes zer ba ni / gal te rmi lam gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that the dream is impaired by momentariness, then it is not the case that the object is not observed in the dream due to the mind observing itself, but rather it is due to the mind observing itself that the object is not observed.🔽If it is said that the dream is impaired by momentariness, then it is not the case that the object is not observed in the dream due to the mind observing itself, but rather it is due to the mind observing itself that the object is not observed.🔽If it is said that the dream is impaired by momentariness, then it is not the case that the object is not observed in the dream due to the mind observing itself, but rather it is due to the mind observing itself that the object is not observed.🔽If it is said that the dream is impaired by momentariness, then it is not the case that the object is not observed in the dream due to the mind observing itself, but rather it is due to the mind observing itself that the object is not observed.🔽If it is said that the dream is impaired by momentariness, then it is not the case that the object is not observed in the dream due to the mind observing itself, but rather it is due to the mind observing itself that the object is not observed.🔽If it is said that the dream is impaired by momentariness, then it is not the case that the object is not observed in the dream due to the mind observing itself, but rather it is due to the mind observing itself that the object is not observed.

original: skad cig gis nyams pa gnod par gyur pa nyid ni rmi lam yin gyi /🔽gzhan la ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /🔽rmi lam mthong ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skad cig gis nyams pa gnod par gyur pa nyid ni rmi lam yin gyi / gzhan la ma yin no zhes zer ba ni / rmi lam mthong ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that the dream is impaired by momentariness, then it is not the case that the object is not observed in the dream due to the mind observing itself, but rather it is due to the mind observing itself that the object is not observed.

original: de tshe des sam zhes bya ba ni rmi lam dang ldan pa'o //🔽gzhan gyis bya ba ni sad pa rnams kyis so //🔽gnod par byed pa ni nyams par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de tshe des sam zhes bya ba ni rmi lam dang ldan pa'o // gzhan gyis bya ba ni sad pa rnams kyis so // gnod par byed pa ni nyams par byed pa ste /
translated: If it is said that the dream is impaired by momentariness, then it is not the case that the object is not observed in the dream due to the mind observing itself, but rather it is due to the mind observing itself that the object is not observed.

original: yul med pa'i sgo nas dmigs pa med pa nyid rang la dmigs pa nyid du rtogs par byed na goms pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid du go bar byed pa yin gyi med pa nyid du ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: yul med pa'i sgo nas dmigs pa med pa nyid rang la dmigs pa nyid du rtogs par byed na goms pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid du go bar byed pa yin gyi med pa nyid du ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: If it is said that the dream is impaired by momentariness, then it is not the case that the object is not observed in the dream due to the mind observing itself, but rather it is due to the mind observing itself that the object is not observed.🔽If it is said that the dream is impaired by momentariness, then it is not the case that the object is not observed

original: gnod byed shes pas zhes bya ba'o //🔽goms pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa las yin gyi /
analyzed: gnod byed shes pas zhes bya ba'o // goms pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa las yin gyi /
translated: The cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation.

original: gnod par byed pa las ma yin par bstan pa ni /🔽gnod byed shes pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa las ma yin par bstan pa ni / gnod byed shes pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation is due to the fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation, and not due to the fact that the object to be refuted is the refutation.🔽The fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation is due to the fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation, and not due to the fact that the object to be refuted is the refutation.🔽The fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation is due to the fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation, and not due to the fact that the object to be refuted is the refutation.

original: gzhan dag gis ma mthong ba nyid gnod par byed ba ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa nyams par byed pa ma yin la de'i phyir skyes nas 'jig pa yin par mi rigs par bstan pa ni /🔽dngos po med par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis ma mthong ba nyid gnod par byed ba ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa nyams par byed pa ma yin la de'i phyir skyes nas 'jig pa yin par mi rigs par bstan pa ni / dngos po med par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation is due to the fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation, and not due to the fact that the object to be refuted is the refutation.

original: 'gal ba'i shes pa gnod par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang mi dmigs pa nyid kyis byas pa yin par bstan pa ni /🔽'gal ba med par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i shes pa gnod par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang mi dmigs pa nyid kyis byas pa yin par bstan pa ni / 'gal ba med par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation is due to the fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation, and not due to the fact that the object to be refuted is the refutation.🔽The fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation is due to the fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation, and not due to the fact that the object to be refuted is the refutation.🔽The fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation is due to the fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation, and not due to the fact that the object to be refuted is the refutation.🔽The fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation is due to the fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation, and not due to the fact that the object to be refuted is the refutation.

original: rigs pa'i 'bras bu ni stobs la ltos pa yin gyi rang dbang ba ni ma yin no//
analyzed: rigs pa'i 'bras bu ni stobs la ltos pa yin gyi rang dbang ba ni ma yin no//
translated: The fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation is due to the fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation, and not due to the fact that the object to be refuted is the refutation.

original: de'i phyir khyad par med do zhes zer ba ni des na ji ltar zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par med do zhes zer ba ni des na ji ltar zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is the refutation is due to the fact that the cognition of the object to be refuted is

original: de las kyang zhes bya ba ni rig pa la sogs pa nyid las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de las kyang zhes bya ba ni rig pa la sogs pa nyid las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Even more” means “from the awareness itself.”

original: rang dbang ni tshad ma ma yin pas khyad par du byed pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang dbang ni tshad ma ma yin pas khyad par du byed pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: “Autonomy” is not a distinguishing feature of a nonvalid cognition.

original: 'bras bus zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bus zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is shown by “the result.”

original: rig pa bzhin du 'bras bu nyid kyang @130a * //
analyzed: rig pa bzhin du 'bras bu nyid kyang @130a * //
translated: The result itself is autonomous, just like awareness.

original: rang dbang nyid yin no zhes zer ba ni /🔽rig pa med par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang dbang nyid yin no zhes zer ba ni / rig pa med par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: 'bras bu nyid ni rang dbang ma yin gyi rang rig pa ni yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid ni rang dbang ma yin gyi rang rig pa ni yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: “Without awareness” shows that the result itself is not autonomous.

original: rang rig pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “By awareness” shows that it is awareness itself that is autonomous.

original: rig pa yang de nyid kyis skyed par byed pa nyid kyis so zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rig pa yang de nyid kyis skyed par byed pa nyid kyis so zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: “By that very awareness” shows that awareness itself is the producer.

original: de nas 'bras bu bzhin du zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de nas 'bras bu bzhin du zhes pa'o //
translated: “Then, like the result” shows that the result is not the producer.

original: de ma thag pa'i khyad par gyi skyed par byed ba nyid la sogs pa dngos su ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i khyad par gyi skyed par byed ba nyid la sogs pa dngos su ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: “The object of awareness” shows that the difference in the immediately preceding condition is not the producer.

original: don rig ces bya ba'o /
analyzed: don rig ces bya ba'o /
translated: “The object of awareness” shows that the object is not the producer.

original: gang zhig gzhan gyi ngo bo 'dzin par byed pa nyid kyi rang nyid 'dzin par byed pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sad pa'i shes pa la yang mtshungs par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gang zhig gzhan gyi ngo bo 'dzin par byed pa nyid kyi rang nyid 'dzin par byed pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sad pa'i shes pa la yang mtshungs par bstan pa ni /
translated: The self-awareness that is the apprehension of the state of another is the same as the awareness of the waking state.

original: de yang shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is also called “consciousness.”

original: nyal ba zhes bya ba ni gnyid 'ongs snga rol du'o //
analyzed: nyal ba zhes bya ba ni gnyid 'ongs snga rol du'o //
translated: “Asleep” is prior to the onset of sleep.

original: langs pa zhes bya ba ni sad pa na ste de'i tshe na de dang bral ba'i sems rang nyid rig pa yin no //
analyzed: langs pa zhes bya ba ni sad pa na ste de'i tshe na de dang bral ba'i sems rang nyid rig pa yin no //
translated: “Awakened” is when one is awake, and at that time the mind that is free from that is self-awareness.

original: de ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sad pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sad pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: “In the same way” refers to the distinction between the waking state and so on.

original: rmi lam ni skad cig gis nyams pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i yin zhing /
analyzed: rmi lam ni skad cig gis nyams pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i yin zhing /
translated: Since dreams are momentary, they are different from the waking state.

original: gzhan las khyad par ma yin nam sad pa'i shin tu nges pa'i blo yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan las khyad par ma yin nam sad pa'i shin tu nges pa'i blo yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But is it not the case that they are different from the other, because the mind of the waking state is a mind of certain knowledge?

original: gnod par byed pa'i shes med na //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i shes med na //
translated: If there is no consciousness that invalidates it,

original: shes pa nges pas de dag la //
analyzed: shes pa nges pas de dag la //
translated: then those consciousnesses

original: tshad ma ltar snang nyid med pa //
analyzed: tshad ma ltar snang nyid med pa //
translated: are not nonvalid cognition.

original: de'i phyir stobs ni bstan pa yin snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir stobs ni bstan pa yin snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the power is taught.

original: der rnam par mi gnas pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: der rnam par mi gnas pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is meant by “not abiding in that.”

original: rnam pa'i rnam par dbye ba las bag chags kyi dbye ba rtogs pa 'di ni khyad par las kyang skad cig gis nyams pa la sogs pa'i skyed byed kyi khyad par ni bstan pa la sogs pa nyid du go ba yin gyi phyi rol yod pa dang med
analyzed: rnam pa'i rnam par dbye ba las bag chags kyi dbye ba rtogs pa 'di ni khyad par las kyang skad cig gis nyams pa la sogs pa'i skyed byed kyi khyad par ni bstan pa la sogs pa nyid du go ba yin gyi phyi rol yod pa dang med
translated: This understanding of the classification of latent impressions from the classification of aspects is also understood as the teaching of the distinctions that produce the distinctions of momentariness, such as deterioration.

original: pa ni ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: pa ni ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that external existence and nonexistence are not taught

original: bag chags bstan pa yin gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bag chags bstan pa yin gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is “the teaching of latent impressions.”

original: yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa mthong ba ni yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa mthong ba ni yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa dmigs pa'o //
translated: Seeing what is pleasant, etc. is the observation of what is pleasant, etc.

original: de 'di ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i yul phyi rol nyid du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de 'di ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i yul phyi rol nyid du gnas pa ste /
translated: This is the external object of direct perception, etc.

original: de dgag byas pa de yi phyir //
analyzed: de dgag byas pa de yi phyir //
translated: Because of that refutation,

original: de ltar na phyogs la gnod 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar na phyogs la gnod 'gyur //
translated: thus there is harm to the position.

original: zhes bya ba phyin ci log yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba phyin ci log yin te /
translated: This is the error.

original: gang gi phyir bag chags kyi bskyed bya'i rnam pa las rang nyid kyi rig bya'i dmigs pa gzhan ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bag chags kyi bskyed bya'i rnam pa las rang nyid kyi rig bya'i dmigs pa gzhan ma mthong ngo //
translated: Because, apart from the aspect produced by the latent impressions, it does not see any other object of cognition.

original: gal te dmigs pa med pa nyid kyi rjes su dpag pa dang / de'i rtsa ba phyogs dang / cig shos kyi shes pa rang gi cha la dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te dmigs pa med pa nyid kyi rjes su dpag pa dang / de'i rtsa ba phyogs dang / cig shos kyi shes pa rang gi cha la dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: If the nonexistence of the object of cognition is inferred, and the root of that is the cognition of the other part, it is not the object of cognition.

original: 'dod pa grub pa'i phyir @130b dmigs pa yin pas sna tshogs pa'i dmigs pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa grub pa'i phyir @130b dmigs pa yin pas sna tshogs pa'i dmigs pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Because the object of cognition is established, it is the object of cognition of the various.

original: gal te rmi lam dang rmi lam ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rmi lam dang rmi lam ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that a dream and a non-dream are different,

original: tha dad pa gang gi sgrub byed yin pa de rjes su dpag pa yin pa'am tha dad pa'i sgrub byed kyi mngon sum yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa gang gi sgrub byed yin pa de rjes su dpag pa yin pa'am tha dad pa'i sgrub byed kyi mngon sum yin te /
translated: what establishes that is either inference or direct perception that establishes the difference.

original: gzhan du na thug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na thug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, there would be an infinite regress.

original: mngon sum dmigs pa med pa yin //🔽zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: mngon sum dmigs pa med pa yin // zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Direct perception is without an object of cognition.

original: ji ste tshad ma ma yin na //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ste tshad ma ma yin na // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that it is not a valid cognition,

original: rjes su dpag pa'i phyogs la zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i phyogs la zhes zer ba ni /
translated: it is said that it is in the position of inference.

original: dmigs pa med pa nyid ji ltar grub ce na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa nyid ji ltar grub ce na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is it established that it is without an objective support?
