translated: but there is no example at all for you

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: of the identity of such a nature.”

original: bzlog pa med pa ni bzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo dbye ba med pa la'o //
analyzed: bzlog pa med pa ni bzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo dbye ba med pa la'o //
translated: “Without reversal” means that the apprehended and apprehender are not differentiated.🔽“Therefore” means that if one can reverse the clarity of the apprehended aspect, then at that time the object of your position is reversed.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gal te rang gi cha gzung ba gsal bar bzlog nus pa de'i tshe gzung ba bzlog pa'i khyed kyi phyogs dgag pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin la phyogs de ni zhes bya ba ni /🔽mngon sum la sogs pa yi yul //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gal te rang gi cha gzung ba gsal bar bzlog nus pa de'i tshe gzung ba bzlog pa'i khyed kyi phyogs dgag pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin la phyogs de ni zhes bya ba ni / mngon sum la sogs pa yi yul //
translated: “That position” means🔽the external object🔽that is the object of perception and so on

original: phyi rol nyid du gnas pa yin //
analyzed: phyi rol nyid du gnas pa yin //
translated: exists.

original: de dgag byas pa de yi phyir //
analyzed: de dgag byas pa de yi phyir //
translated: Since that is refuted,

original: de dag gi phyogs la gnod 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag gi phyogs la gnod 'gyur //
translated: your position is undermined.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus.

original: shin tu nges pas de dag la //
analyzed: shin tu nges pas de dag la //
translated: Since they are very certain,

original: gnod pa'i shes pa med pa na //🔽tshad ma ltar snang nyid yod min //
analyzed: gnod pa'i shes pa med pa na // tshad ma ltar snang nyid yod min //
translated: there is no cognition of harm🔽with respect to them.

original: de phyir stobs ni brjod pa yin //
analyzed: de phyir stobs ni brjod pa yin //
translated: Therefore, the power is stated.

original: zhes zer ba ni shin du rnam par nges pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //🔽sad pa'i blo ni ka ba'o zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: zhes zer ba ni shin du rnam par nges pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o // sad pa'i blo ni ka ba'o zhes bya ba'am /
translated: Since they are very certain,🔽the cognition of a post or a wall is very certain.

original: rtsig pa'o zhes bya bar shin tu nges pa ni ji ltar phyin ci log par 'gyur ro zhes shin tu rnam par nges pa smos pas so//
analyzed: rtsig pa'o zhes bya bar shin tu nges pa ni ji ltar phyin ci log par 'gyur ro zhes shin tu rnam par nges pa smos pas so//
translated: How could it be mistaken?

original: @136a * // dmigs pa med pa yin te shes pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: @136a * // dmigs pa med pa yin te shes pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not non-existent, because it is a cognition.

original: rjes su dpag pa 'di las snang ba dran pa dag gi dngos po'i nges pa rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sngon po la yin gyi rtogs pa ma yin pa'i bdag nyid la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa 'di las snang ba dran pa dag gi dngos po'i nges pa rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sngon po la yin gyi rtogs pa ma yin pa'i bdag nyid la ni ma yin te /
translated: From this inference, the certainty of the entity of the memory of the appearance is understood with respect to blue, but not with respect to what is not understood,

original: yul du ma byas pa la mi rigs pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: yul du ma byas pa la mi rigs pa'i phyir ro//
translated: because it is not possible for what is not an object.

original: sngon po bdag gis rig gi zhes bya ba yang las la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ci nas kyang snang ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: sngon po bdag gis rig gi zhes bya ba yang las la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ci nas kyang snang ba kho na yin no //
translated: The statement blue is cognized by me is also an appearance of the differentiation of action, etc.

original: de lta yin dang rig pa'i bdag nyid kho na yin par bstan pa ni /🔽shin tu rnam par nges pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta yin dang rig pa'i bdag nyid kho na yin par bstan pa ni / shin tu rnam par nges pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The statement it is just the nature of cognition is the teaching of the very ascertainment.

original: bzung ba tsam la gnod pa ni //🔽rang gi phyogs kyang 'grub mi 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba 'di la bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bzung ba tsam la gnod pa ni // rang gi phyogs kyang 'grub mi 'gyur // zhes bya ba 'di la bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement it is not apprehended is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.🔽The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the subject.🔽The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.🔽The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.🔽The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.🔽The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.

original: gzung med ces bya ba ste sngon po'o zhes rang rig pa las nyid 'dzin pa kho na yin gyi de nyid ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽bzung ba ni mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzung med ces bya ba ste sngon po'o zhes rang rig pa las nyid 'dzin pa kho na yin gyi de nyid ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // bzung ba ni mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'o //
translated: The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.

original: ma bzung ba ni zhes bya ba ni de'i 'dzin pa can yang dmigs pa med pa nyid yin no ;🔽; khyad par dang khyad par can dag gi chos dang chos can no //
analyzed: ma bzung ba ni zhes bya ba ni de'i 'dzin pa can yang dmigs pa med pa nyid yin no ; ; khyad par dang khyad par can dag gi chos dang chos can no //
translated: The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.🔽The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.

original: gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.🔽The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.🔽The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.🔽The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.🔽The statement there is no apprehension of the object is the teaching of the non-apprehension of the object.

original: tha dad 'dzin pa las zhes bya ba ni phyis te /
analyzed: tha dad 'dzin pa las zhes bya ba ni phyis te /
translated: “From the apprehension of difference” means later.

original: sngar ni bdag med pa rtogs pa las te phyogs snga ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: sngar ni bdag med pa rtogs pa las te phyogs snga ma bzhin du'o //
translated: Previously, it is from the realization of selflessness, as in the opponent’s view.

original: sngar de nyid las tha dad pa yin na phyis ji ltar gzhan du 'gyur zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: sngar de nyid las tha dad pa yin na phyis ji ltar gzhan du 'gyur zhes zer ba la /
translated: If it is different from that previously, how could it be different later?

original: ldog pa zhes bya ba smos te snga na yang de nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ldog pa zhes bya ba smos te snga na yang de nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “From the exclusion” means that it is not that previously.

original: ma son tam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni song pa'i rjes su 'brengs pa'o //
analyzed: ma son tam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni song pa'i rjes su 'brengs pa'o //
translated: “Not yet arrived” and so on follow the past.

original: yul de skye ba'i gnas spyi la sogs pa gang gi yin pa de'o //
analyzed: yul de skye ba'i gnas spyi la sogs pa gang gi yin pa de'o //
translated: That is the object of the arising of the cognition of that.

original: de nyid ni sngar yang sgra dang rtogs pa dag las ldog pa'i yul can nyid kyis dmigs pa med pa'i phyir gnyi ga la yang rang gi tshig gis gnod pa yin par mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid ni sngar yang sgra dang rtogs pa dag las ldog pa'i yul can nyid kyis dmigs pa med pa'i phyir gnyi ga la yang rang gi tshig gis gnod pa yin par mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since that is also the object of the exclusion of sound and cognition previously, it is not tenable that both are harmed by their own words, because of the nonapprehension of the object.

original: 'chad pho nyan pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'chad pho nyan pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The expounder and the listener” and so on.

original: ldog pa'i yul gyi rnam par rtog pa'i dbye bas chos dang chos can tha dad pa yin yang /
analyzed: ldog pa'i yul gyi rnam par rtog pa'i dbye bas chos dang chos can tha dad pa yin yang /
translated: The subject and the predicate are different, because of the difference in the conceptualization of the object of negation.

original: dam bcas don ni mdzes pa la //
analyzed: dam bcas don ni mdzes pa la //
translated: The meaning of the thesis is beautiful,

original: de phyir des par brtags pa med //
analyzed: de phyir des par brtags pa med //
translated: therefore it is not examined in detail.

original: ces bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following is taught to show that this is unreasonable:

original: yod yin pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽da migs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i //
analyzed: yod yin pa zhes bya ba'o // da migs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i //
translated: “It is existent” is the Buddhist position.🔽“It is not a non-thing” is the Buddhist position.

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa'o //
translated: “It is the object of a cognition” is the Buddhist position.

original: gal te dngos med ces bya ba ni rgyal dpog pa'i ste /
analyzed: gal te dngos med ces bya ba ni rgyal dpog pa'i ste /
translated: “It is a non-thing” is the Vaiśeṣika position.

original: blo'i yul nyid kyi dngos po nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: blo'i yul nyid kyi dngos po nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: “It is a thing that is the object of a cognition” is the Buddhist position.

original: mngon sum gyi blo'i @136b yul nyid ni rnam par rtog pa'i ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi blo'i @136b yul nyid ni rnam par rtog pa'i ma yin te /
translated: The object of a direct perception is not conceptual,🔽because a non-thing such as the past also appears.

original: dngos po ma yin pa'i 'das pa la sogs pa yang 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'di ni bshad zin to zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po ma yin pa'i 'das pa la sogs pa yang 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni 'di ni bshad zin to zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by “This has already been explained.”

original: de nyid kyi phyir te zhes bya ba ni rtog pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ram yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir te zhes bya ba ni rtog pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ram yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “For that very reason” means because it is the object of thought or because it exists.

original: yod pa'i ngo bo snang ba'i phyir rtogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yod pa'i ngo bo snang ba'i phyir rtogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation that it is not a realization because the nature of existence appears is:

original: dngos po la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “in regard to an entity.”

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rtog pa nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rtog pa nyid yin na'o //
translated: “Thus” means that it is just a conception.

original: dngos po'i ngo bo ma yin na ni mi snang pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo ma yin na ni mi snang pa yin te /
translated: If it is not the nature of an entity, it does not appear,

original: med pa bzhin du ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa bzhin du ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is non-existent, like a non-entity.

original: gzhan du na med pa zhes bya bar rjes su brjod par mi rigs so //
analyzed: gzhan du na med pa zhes bya bar rjes su brjod par mi rigs so //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be reasonable to refer to it as “non-existent.”

original: gzhan sel pa'i rjes su byed pa las de nyid med par rtogs pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: gzhan sel pa'i rjes su byed pa las de nyid med par rtogs pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la /
translated: If it is asked, “Isn’t the absence of that realized from the performance of the exclusion of other?”

original: med la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: med la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In the absence” is said.

original: gzhan sel ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro /
translated: Because there is no exclusion of other.

original: sgra'i sbyor ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa dmigs pa ma yin no zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: sgra'i sbyor ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa dmigs pa ma yin no zhes zer ba la /
translated: If it is said, “Inference is not observed because the application of a word is not observed,”

original: ji ste shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ste shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If it is a consciousness” is said.

original: dngos po la sogs pa rnams la 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: dngos po la sogs pa rnams la 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la /
translated: It would be contradictory in regard to entities and so on.

original: lan 'debs pa ni gal te rtogs pas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan 'debs pa ni gal te rtogs pas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The reply is: “If it is a realization,” and so on.

original: rang gi bdag nyid la gnas pa'i rang gi ngo bo rig pa'i byed pa ni yul gzhan la ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la gnas pa'i rang gi ngo bo rig pa'i byed pa ni yul gzhan la ma yin te /
translated: The activity of awareness of one’s own nature that abides in one’s own self is not in another object.

original: byed pa'i yul gzhan rang gi ngo bo'i yul yin pa nyid kyis phyi rol med kyang dngos po la sogs pa yod pa la 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byed pa'i yul gzhan rang gi ngo bo'i yul yin pa nyid kyis phyi rol med kyang dngos po la sogs pa yod pa la 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no contradiction in the existence of things, etc., even without external objects, since the object of activity is another object, and the object of one’s own nature is itself.

original: las la yin gyi sgro btags pa de'i ngo bos gzhan gyis dmigs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa nyid yin na ji ltar yin /
analyzed: las la yin gyi sgro btags pa de'i ngo bos gzhan gyis dmigs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa nyid yin na ji ltar yin /
translated: If the object is imputed by the word “is,” how can it be said that it is perceived by another, since it is nonexistent?

original: gal te las yin na ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te las yin na ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
translated: If it is the object, then it is established as established.

original: de bstan pa ni las yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni las yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration of that is “the object.”

original: rtogs pa med do zhes bya bas dmigs bya 'gegs pa bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa med do zhes bya bas dmigs bya 'gegs pa bkag pa yin no //
translated: “There is no awareness” refutes the negation of the object.

original: ci las she na /
analyzed: ci las she na /
translated: What is the object?

original: rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “By its own nature” means

original: tha dad pa'i 'dzin pas so //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i 'dzin pas so //
translated: by a different grasping.

original: nges zhes bya ba ni goms pa las so //
analyzed: nges zhes bya ba ni goms pa las so //
translated: “Certainly” means from practice.

original: phyi rol mngon par 'dod pa dang rang gi bdag nyid la yang mthong ngo zhes bstan pa ni nga'o snyam pa zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: phyi rol mngon par 'dod pa dang rang gi bdag nyid la yang mthong ngo zhes bstan pa ni nga'o snyam pa zhes bya ba'o//
translated: The statement “I see myself as well as external things” is the thought “I am.”

original: bde can zhes bya ba ni rang nyid rig pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: bde can zhes bya ba ni rang nyid rig pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: The statement “I am happy” is the observation of one’s own awareness.

original: de dag tsam mi dmigs pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni 'di rang dpang du 'dzin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de dag tsam mi dmigs pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni 'di rang dpang du 'dzin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement “I am not aware of anything else” is the thought “I am the only witness.”

original: dbang po la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”

original: sems pa can ma yin pa rnams ni nus pa med pa'i phyir 'di rnams @137a * //🔽kyi skul byed rjes su dpog pa yin la /
analyzed: sems pa can ma yin pa rnams ni nus pa med pa'i phyir 'di rnams @137a * // kyi skul byed rjes su dpog pa yin la /
translated: Since insentient things are incapable of activating the sense faculties, the existence of the self is inferred from the activation of the sense faculties.

original: de ni bdag nyid yin no zhes zer ba ni /🔽gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni bdag nyid yin no zhes zer ba ni / gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”🔽The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”

original: skul byed yod pa las na dbang po la sogs pa rnams las gzhan pa ni rjes su dpag pa'i shes pas rig pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: skul byed yod pa las na dbang po la sogs pa rnams las gzhan pa ni rjes su dpag pa'i shes pas rig pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement “I am the one who activates the sense faculties” is the thought “I am the one who activates the sense faculties.”

original: gzhan du rig med ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du rig med ces bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “

original: de nyid ces bstan pa gsal bar byed ba ni blo'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bstan pa gsal bar byed ba ni blo'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of the word “that” is clarified by the words “the nature of the mind.”

original: de'i 'du byed pa'am zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i 'du byed pa'am zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the words “its activity” is explained by the words

original: snga ma snga mar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma snga mar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “in the preceding moment.”

original: dbang po la sogs pa'i blo'i skyed byed rig bya yin no zhes zer ba ni /🔽bde dbang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa'i blo'i skyed byed rig bya yin no zhes zer ba ni / bde dbang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The opponent’s view is that the object of cognition is that which produces the cognition of the sense faculties, etc.

original: dbang po ni de'i rnam pa can gyi blo las gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbang po ni de'i rnam pa can gyi blo las gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The response to this is that the sense faculties are not different from the cognition that has their form.

original: blo nyid las blo gzhan rnam par dang ldan pa yin par bstan nas /
analyzed: blo nyid las blo gzhan rnam par dang ldan pa yin par bstan nas /
translated: Having shown that the object of cognition is not different from cognition,

original: rim ma yin pa la yang rig bya rig byed dag med pa yin te /
analyzed: rim ma yin pa la yang rig bya rig byed dag med pa yin te /
translated: the author now shows that the object of cognition and the cognition of it do not exist in a temporal sequence.

original: phan tshun byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /🔽dus mnyam par ni zhes bya ba'o //🔽shes pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i de ma grub pa yin te /🔽snang ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: phan tshun byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni / dus mnyam par ni zhes bya ba'o // shes pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i de ma grub pa yin te / snang ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The reason for this is that they are not mutually dependent.🔽The response to this is that the object of cognition and the cognition of it do not exist simultaneously.🔽The opponent’s view is that the object of cognition is not established as having the nature of cognition.

original: gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response to this is that it is not established as having a nature that is not light.🔽The response to this is that the object of cognition is not different from light.

original: skyes bu re re zhing shes pa tha dad pas de'i bdag nyid kyi sngon po ni nye ba dang cig shos dag la gcig gi ngo bor snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skyes bu re re zhing shes pa tha dad pas de'i bdag nyid kyi sngon po ni nye ba dang cig shos dag la gcig gi ngo bor snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since each person has a different consciousness, the blue that is of the nature of that [consciousness] does not appear as the same entity to both the one who is near and the one who is far away. This is the meaning.

original: byed pa po nyid la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: byed pa po nyid la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the agent and so on is:

original: de dag gis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Also by those, and so on.

original: sgra sha lhag tsam ni dmigs pa med pa'i shes pa yang ngo //
analyzed: sgra sha lhag tsam ni dmigs pa med pa'i shes pa yang ngo //
translated: The mere addition of the word śa is for the consciousness without an object.

original: de ltar shin tu legs par brjod pa zhes bya ba bshad pa la don ni phyi rol te /
analyzed: de ltar shin tu legs par brjod pa zhes bya ba bshad pa la don ni phyi rol te /
translated: Thus, in the explanation called Very Well Expressed, the meaning is external,

original: dmigs pa ma yin pa nyid de sgra rnams ni don la rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa'i dbye ba bkar nas mngon par 'dod pa las rjod par byed pa nyid ma nyams pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dmigs pa ma yin pa nyid de sgra rnams ni don la rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa'i dbye ba bkar nas mngon par 'dod pa las rjod par byed pa nyid ma nyams pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: not the object, because the words are not aware of the meaning. The division of the exclusion is stated by the one who wishes to make it known. The non-deficiency of the expression itself is shown:

original: ldog pa'i sgra'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i sgra'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word of the exclusion.

original: bkar ba'i ldog pa nyid bsgrub byar thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te phyi rol nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bkar ba'i ldog pa nyid bsgrub byar thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te phyi rol nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is not the case that the contrapositive of the thesis is the probandum, because the external object itself is the object that is intended.

original: sgra'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is indicated by the phrase “the domain of sound.”

original: sgrub par byed pa yang mngon par 'dod pa nyid las phyogs kyi yul nyid dmigs pa med pa nyid du 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa yang mngon par 'dod pa nyid las phyogs kyi yul nyid dmigs pa med pa nyid du 'gal ba med do //
translated: And the proof is not contradictory, because the object of the thesis is just what is intended.

original: de'i rgyu can zhes bya ba ni byed pa po la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan la'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu can zhes bya ba ni byed pa po la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan la'o //
translated: “Having that as its cause” refers to the reason, such as the agent.

original: rtogs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni byed pa po'o //
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni byed pa po'o //
translated: “That which causes understanding” is the agent.

original: des zhes bya ba ni @137b byed pa'o //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni @137b byed pa'o //
translated: “By that” is the action.

original: rtogs par bya ba zhes bya ba ni ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba zhes bya ba ni ngo bo'o //
translated: “That which is to be understood” is the entity.

original: las med na byed pa po la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa yin te /🔽sgrub pa med pa'i phyir phyogs de las 'byung ba'i skyon med do zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: las med na byed pa po la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa yin te / sgrub pa med pa'i phyir phyogs de las 'byung ba'i skyon med do zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: If there is no action, there is no reason for the agent, etc.

original: de rgyu can yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de rgyu can yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since there is no proof, there is no fault in the position that there is no arising. This is indicated by the phrase “if it has that as its cause.”

original: de'i rgyu mtshan la rjes su brjod pa med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan la rjes su brjod pa med pa ma yin te /
translated: The reason for that is not without a subsequent expression,

original: brtags pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: brtags pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: because it is the object of an investigation.

original: gang yin pa de nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang yin pa de nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement of that is “that very . . .”

original: khyed kyis zhes bya ba ni rgyal dpog pas so //
analyzed: khyed kyis zhes bya ba ni rgyal dpog pas so //
translated: “You” refers to the Vaiśeṣika.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni sangs rgyas po'i'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni sangs rgyas po'i'o //
translated: “The probandum” is the Buddhist’s.

original: 'dod pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni shes pa 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i chos can nyid kyi phyir skyon med do zhes bya ba'i don te //
analyzed: 'dod pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni shes pa 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i chos can nyid kyi phyir skyon med do zhes bya ba'i don te //
translated: “The very thing that is desired” means that there is no fault because the subject possesses the particular of being desired to be known.

original: gtan tshigs skyon can nyid du smra ba ni /
analyzed: gtan tshigs skyon can nyid du smra ba ni /
translated: The statement of the fault of the reason is

original: ma nges pa nyid dam zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ma nges pa nyid dam zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “is it not the case that it is not ascertained?”

original: khyab pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the pervasion is not established.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba dang 'brel pas sngar dris pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba dang 'brel pas sngar dris pa ni /
translated: The connection with “for that very reason” is the question asked earlier,

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “the nature of that . . .”

original: de ma grub pa nyid na shes par 'dod pa'i byed brag dang ldan pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ma grub pa nyid na shes par 'dod pa'i byed brag dang ldan pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of that is “if that is not established, it possesses the particular of being desired to be known.”

original: gzhan la yang ma grub na dpe med pa'i phyir de skyon nyid yin la de'i rjes su 'brangs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan la yang ma grub na dpe med pa'i phyir de skyon nyid yin la de'i rjes su 'brangs pa ste /
translated: If it is not established for the other, then the example does not exist, and therefore it is a fault.

original: bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'brangs pas de nyid snga na yod par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'brangs pas de nyid snga na yod par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that the probandum exists prior to the proof is the following:

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “At that time…”

original: lung la ma grub na yang tshad mas grub ma grub pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: lung la ma grub na yang tshad mas grub ma grub pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that if the scripture is not established, it is not established by a valid cognition is the following:

original: bdag gi chos zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag gi chos zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “My own doctrine…”

original: de ltar ma grub na rgyal dpog pa'i yang sgrub par byed pa cung zad kyang med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar ma grub na rgyal dpog pa'i yang sgrub par byed pa cung zad kyang med par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that if it is not established in that way, there is not the slightest proof for the Vaiśeṣika is the following:

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If it were not so…”

original: brjod bya'i dbye ba ni rjod byed la tha dad pa'i brjod bya khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod bya'i dbye ba ni rjod byed la tha dad pa'i brjod bya khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The division of the expressed is not accepted as a different expressed in the expression.

original: sgra dang don tsam la 'di ni sgra 'di ni don no sgra 'di ni don no zhes brtag par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: sgra dang don tsam la 'di ni sgra 'di ni don no sgra 'di ni don no zhes brtag par mi nus pa'o //
translated: It is not possible to investigate the mere sound and meaning, thinking, “This is the sound,” “This is the meaning,” “This is the sound,” “This is the meaning.”

original: skyi nyid ni sgra dang don dag gi'o //
analyzed: skyi nyid ni sgra dang don dag gi'o //
translated: The mere sound and meaning are the object of the investigation.

original: des ni zhes bya ba ni gang zhig ces bstan pa'o //
analyzed: des ni zhes bya ba ni gang zhig ces bstan pa'o //
translated: “By that” refers to “that which…”

original: khyad par med pa ni tha dad pa cig shes 'dzin par byed pa nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa ni tha dad pa cig shes 'dzin par byed pa nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The non-distinction is because there is no distinction in the apprehension of the difference of one.

original: sgra don tsam ni sgra'i snang ba las don gyi snang ba shes pa ste /
analyzed: sgra don tsam ni sgra'i snang ba las don gyi snang ba shes pa ste /
translated: The mere sound-meaning is the appearance of the object from the appearance of the sound.

original: de nyid ni shes pa'am gzhan yang rung ba'i phyir thams cad du cung zad dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni shes pa'am gzhan yang rung ba'i phyir thams cad du cung zad dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: That is either consciousness or something else, and therefore nothing is observed at all.

original: khyad par ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa thams cad la ji ltar yang dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa thams cad la ji ltar yang dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The non-establishment of distinction is because there is no observation of any kind in any consciousness.

original: sad pa'i zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'o //
analyzed: sad pa'i zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'o //
translated: The “awakened” is the probandum.

original: de lta yang ni dmigs pa med pa nyid de dus gzhan gyi tshe dmigs pa med pa nyid @138a * //
analyzed: de lta yang ni dmigs pa med pa nyid de dus gzhan gyi tshe dmigs pa med pa nyid @138a * //
translated: Even so, there is non-observation, because there is no observation at another time.

original: yin na'o // dus der dmigs pa can gyi blo'i 'dzin byed kyi cha yin no //
analyzed: yin na'o // dus der dmigs pa can gyi blo'i 'dzin byed kyi cha yin no //
translated: It is the part of the mind that observes at that time.

original: gang zhig gi rnam par can ni bzung ba sngon po'i rnam pa can no //
analyzed: gang zhig gi rnam par can ni bzung ba sngon po'i rnam pa can no //
translated: That which has the aspect is the aspect of the apprehended blue.

original: khas blang phyir zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i cha gnyi ga khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khas blang phyir zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i cha gnyi ga khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because of the acceptance” means because of the acceptance of both the objective and subjective aspects.

original: 'gal ba nyid bstan pa ni 'dzin pa'i cha zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba nyid bstan pa ni 'dzin pa'i cha zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration of the contradiction is “the subjective aspect.”

original: blo de ni phyi rol gyi blo ste /
analyzed: blo de ni phyi rol gyi blo ste /
translated: That cognition is an external cognition,

original: ka ba'am rtsig pa zhes bya ba'i blo 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ka ba'am rtsig pa zhes bya ba'i blo 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the cognition of a pillar or a wall arises.

original: phyir rol nyid ni phyi rol gyi shes pa'i yul yin gyi ka bal sogs pa'i shes pa'i ma yin pa'i phyir ka bal sogs pa'i ngo bos ka ba la ka ba'i shes pas 'dzin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyir rol nyid ni phyi rol gyi shes pa'i yul yin gyi ka bal sogs pa'i shes pa'i ma yin pa'i phyir ka bal sogs pa'i ngo bos ka ba la ka ba'i shes pas 'dzin pa ma yin no //
translated: External reality is the object of an external cognition, but it is not the object of the cognition of a pillar, etc., so the cognition of a pillar does not apprehend a pillar by the nature of a pillar, etc.

original: zla ba gnyis dang dbang po phrad pa med pa ci las yin zhe na /
analyzed: zla ba gnyis dang dbang po phrad pa med pa ci las yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it that two moons are not in contact with a sense faculty?

original: zla ba gcig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba gcig ces bya ba'o //
translated: “One moon” is the answer.

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni zla ba gcig tu gtogs pa'i tshe yang zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa'i dmigs pa med pa'i rgyu nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni zla ba gcig tu gtogs pa'i tshe yang zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa'i dmigs pa med pa'i rgyu nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Everywhere” means that even when the moon is in one place, it follows that there is no cause for the nonexistence of the object of the cognition of two moons.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rigs pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rigs pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Therefore” means because of the contradiction with reason.

original: skabs la sogs pa las rtogs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skabs la sogs pa las rtogs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “From context, etc., one understands”

original: khams gsum pa ni sems tsam mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: khams gsum pa ni sems tsam mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: means that the three realms are mind only, etc.

original: sems las gzhan bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems las gzhan bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the negation of anything other than mind.

original: gnas skabs la sogs pa la ma ltos pa kho nar 'on te gang gi rnam pa'i blo zhes bya ba la sogs pas brtags pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas skabs la sogs pa la ma ltos pa kho nar 'on te gang gi rnam pa'i blo zhes bya ba la sogs pas brtags pa yin no //
translated: Without depending on context, etc., it is investigated by “the cognition of what aspect,” etc.

original: de lta na yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang /
translated: Even so,

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba ma bcad nas //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba ma bcad nas //
translated: without cutting off what is to be explained,

original: yongs su rgol ba srid pa ni //
analyzed: yongs su rgol ba srid pa ni //
translated: there is the possibility of refutation

original: sangs rgyas bka' sogs 'don pa la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bka' sogs 'don pa la //
translated: in reciting the Buddha’s words, etc.

original: de 'dra'i rgol ba byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: de 'dra'i rgol ba byed par 'gyur //
translated: such a refutation will occur.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gnas skabs ma bcad pa dang cig shos nyid kyi phyogs snga ma dang cig shos la brten nas 'brel ba med pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gnas skabs ma bcad pa dang cig shos nyid kyi phyogs snga ma dang cig shos la brten nas 'brel ba med pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Here, without cutting off the context, the opponent’s position is based on the other side, and the connection is shown to be nonexistent.

original: de lta ma yin nas gra las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin nas gra las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it were not so, it would be as stated.

original: 'di ltar kho na zhes bya ba ni sems tsam du bsgrub pa'i gnas skabs las yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar kho na zhes bya ba ni sems tsam du bsgrub pa'i gnas skabs las yin la /
translated: Thus, only is in the context of establishing mind-only.

original: de gnas pa ni dbye ba dang cig shos sems pa yin no //
analyzed: de gnas pa ni dbye ba dang cig shos sems pa yin no //
translated: Its abiding is its differentiation and its being the other mind.🔽 What is unreasonable? is the inference that removes superimposition, because it is what is accepted.

original: mi rigs pa ci yod ces bya ba ni sgro 'dogs pa sel bar byed pa'i rjes su dpag pa la mngon par 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhig 'di zhes bya ba la the tshom za ba las 'di kho na'o zhes rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro zhes🔽bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi rigs pa ci yod ces bya ba ni sgro 'dogs pa sel bar byed pa'i rjes su dpag pa la mngon par 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhig 'di zhes bya ba la the tshom za ba las 'di kho na'o zhes rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of this is that it is established as only this because of doubt.

original: sgro 'dogs pa nyid bshad pa ni gal te 'ga' zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgro 'dogs pa nyid bshad pa ni gal te 'ga' zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the superimposition is if someone...

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni skyon gyi stobs @138b kyis sgro btags pa'i rnam par gzhan skra shad kyi shes pa'i go bya dang rgyu yang yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni skyon gyi stobs @138b kyis sgro btags pa'i rnam par gzhan skra shad kyi shes pa'i go bya dang rgyu yang yin no //
translated: Space is the object of the superimposition by the power of error, and is also the cause of the consciousness of falling hair.

original: go bya'i don la rnam par dpyod pa na rgyu gnas skabs pa ma yin pa dang / go bya yang rnam pa gzhan la gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: go bya'i don la rnam par dpyod pa na rgyu gnas skabs pa ma yin pa dang / go bya yang rnam pa gzhan la gzhan ma yin te /
translated: When analyzing the meaning of the object of understanding, it is not the non-abiding cause, and the object of understanding is not different from the other aspect.

original: thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The response to this is:🔽“But how?”

original: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And the response to that is:🔽“If there is a fault, it is of another kind; if there is no fault, it is of this kind.”🔽The response to that is:

original: skyon yod na rnam pa gzhan yin la med na rang gi'o zhes bya ba yang 'di la yang rnam par dbye ba'i rgyu med pa yin te /
analyzed: skyon yod na rnam pa gzhan yin la med na rang gi'o zhes bya ba yang 'di la yang rnam par dbye ba'i rgyu med pa yin te /
translated: “But here too there is no reason for the distinction.”🔽The response to that is:

original: thams cad kho nar bag chags kyi skyon yod pas phyi rol yod pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad kho nar bag chags kyi skyon yod pas phyi rol yod pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: “Because of the fault of the latent impressions, the existence of external things is not established.”🔽The response to that is:

original: 'di la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “But here too…”

original: nam mkha' las phyin ci log tu snang ba ni skra shad kyi'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' las phyin ci log tu snang ba ni skra shad kyi'o //
translated: The appearance of falling hair is a visual distortion.

original: dran pa ni skra shad kyi'o //
analyzed: dran pa ni skra shad kyi'o //
translated: The memory of it is a mental distortion.

original: nam mkhar rtogs pa yang 'khrul pa thams cad yid kyi yin pa'i phyir dran pa'i cha zhig pa dang nam mkha' yang dran bzhin ba las tha dad pa mi 'dzin pa ni brjed pa yin no //
analyzed: nam mkhar rtogs pa yang 'khrul pa thams cad yid kyi yin pa'i phyir dran pa'i cha zhig pa dang nam mkha' yang dran bzhin ba las tha dad pa mi 'dzin pa ni brjed pa yin no //
translated: Since all distortions are mental, the memory of falling hair is a mental distortion.

original: 'jig rten pa ni rang gi don byed pa yin la /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa ni rang gi don byed pa yin la /
translated: The worldly is that which performs its own function.

original: de mi byed pa de'i 'di lta bu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: de mi byed pa de'i 'di lta bu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yin no //
translated: That which does not perform its own function is supramundane.

original: sogs pa ni ming dang rgyu mtshan dang rmi lam gyi mtha'i mi ldan pa 'dzin pa tsam la stogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa ni ming dang rgyu mtshan dang rmi lam gyi mtha'i mi ldan pa 'dzin pa tsam la stogs pa'o //
translated: The “etc.” includes the mere apprehension of names, causal signs, and dream ends.

original: don byed pa la mi slu bas gnod par byed pa med pa dang cig shos kyi shes pa rnams de'i ngo bo las 'das pa na rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don byed pa la mi slu bas gnod par byed pa med pa dang cig shos kyi shes pa rnams de'i ngo bo las 'das pa na rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that because they are nondeceptive with regard to the functioning of objects, they are not harmed, and because the other cognitions are beyond their nature, they are without cause.

original: de'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni zla ba gnyis su snang ba las zla ba gcig tu snang ba dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni zla ba gnyis su snang ba las zla ba gcig tu snang ba dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they have that nature means that there is no difference between the appearance of one moon and the appearance of two moons.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ni zla ba gcig gi shes pa la ste /
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ni zla ba gcig gi shes pa la ste /
translated: “ Also in that” means in the cognition of one moon.

original: de'i rnam pa'i phyi rol snang ba ma yin pa ni gnod byed yin la rnam pa yang snang bzhin par gnyi ga la yang khyad par med do //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa'i phyi rol snang ba ma yin pa ni gnod byed yin la rnam pa yang snang bzhin par gnyi ga la yang khyad par med do //
translated: The harm is that the external appearance of that aspect does not exist, and there is no difference between the two in that the aspect appears.

original: shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi sngon po yang ser po la sogs pa yod pas mi 'byung na rjes su mthun pa'i phyi rol gyi sngon po nyid rgyu yin par rtogs par byed do snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi sngon po yang ser po la sogs pa yod pas mi 'byung na rjes su mthun pa'i phyi rol gyi sngon po nyid rgyu yin par rtogs par byed do snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Since blue, which has the nature of consciousness, does not arise from yellow, etc., it is understood that the external blue, which is similar to it, is its cause.

original: ci ltar gzugs kyi zhes te /
analyzed: ci ltar gzugs kyi zhes te /
translated: What is the use of the word “form” in the line, “just as the consciousness of form”?

original: gzhan gyi bskyed bya yang de'i rnam par can du mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽ji ltar ro'i shes bas gzugs la sogs pas stong ba'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi bskyed bya yang de'i rnam par can du mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // ji ltar ro'i shes bas gzugs la sogs pas stong ba'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The meaning is that the object produced by another is seen to have the aspect of that.🔽How is it that the proof of what is already established is like the consciousness of taste?

original: ji ltar gzugs kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is the use of the word “form” in the line, “just as the consciousness of form”?

original: gdungs pa'i dgon dung la chu'i shes pa nges par 'byung ba ni rol gzugs kyi shes pa nges par skye ba dang / mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni //
analyzed: gdungs pa'i dgon dung la chu'i shes pa nges par 'byung ba ni rol gzugs kyi shes pa nges par skye ba dang / mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni //
translated: The arising of the consciousness of water in a mirage is similar to the arising of the consciousness of form in taste.

original: @139a * // ro la sogs pa med par yang //
analyzed: @139a * // ro la sogs pa med par yang //
translated: The line, “even without taste, etc.,”

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: teaches this.

original: de'i phyir des na rjes su mthun pa'i phyi rol grub pas grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir des na rjes su mthun pa'i phyi rol grub pas grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, since the external object is established in accordance with that, it is not the case that the establishment is not established.

original: 'khrul pa'i chag gis kyang ma nges pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i chag gis kyang ma nges pa bstan pa ni /
translated: Even by the error, the non-ascertainment is shown:

original: 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is an element.

original: khyad par ni med kyang 'byung ba de'i bskyed bya ba'i'o //
analyzed: khyad par ni med kyang 'byung ba de'i bskyed bya ba'i'o //
translated: Although there is no distinction, it is that which is produced by that element.

original: dmigs pa med pa ni dgon dung gi chu'i shes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa ni dgon dung gi chu'i shes pa lta bu'o //
translated: The non-apprehension is like the consciousness of water in a mirage.

original: de lta ma yin par zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i chu'i shes pa bzhin du dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin par zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i chu'i shes pa bzhin du dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: Otherwise, like the consciousness of real water, it would have an apprehension.

original: mi snang ba'i 'od zer gyis gdungs pa'i dgon dung gi bag chags yin te /
analyzed: mi snang ba'i 'od zer gyis gdungs pa'i dgon dung gi bag chags yin te /
translated: It is the latent tendency of a mirage heated by invisible rays.

original: rmi lam la sogs pa la nus pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rmi lam la sogs pa la nus pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the power is seen in dreams and so on.

original: 'o na snang ba nyid ces bya ba ni bde pa la sogs pa'i 'dzin par byed pa las tha dad pa'i bzung ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'o na snang ba nyid ces bya ba ni bde pa la sogs pa'i 'dzin par byed pa las tha dad pa'i bzung ba nyid kyis so //
translated: Now, the appearance itself is due to the apprehension of pleasure and so on, by the apprehended object itself.

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa la yang rtogs pa med pa'i bde ba la sogs pa nang dang phyi rol yin la /
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa la yang rtogs pa med pa'i bde ba la sogs pa nang dang phyi rol yin la /
translated: In direct perception and inference, there is no realization of pleasure, etc., which are internal or external.

original: de'i phyir khyad par med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no difference.

original: shes pa bzhin du de nyid ni ma yin te ;
analyzed: shes pa bzhin du de nyid ni ma yin te ;
translated: It is not like consciousness,

original: gzung ba rnam par gnyis ma gtogs pa'i bya ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba rnam par gnyis ma gtogs pa'i bya ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other activity apart from the two kinds of objects.

original: de dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni so so kho na yin te /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni so so kho na yin te /
translated: The conceptual differentiation of the application that is associated with that is individual,

original: bde ba dang sbyor ba dag tha dad par nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba dang sbyor ba dag tha dad par nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because pleasure and application are experienced separately.

original: de bstan pa ni snang ba la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni snang ba la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration of that is “in the case of an appearance. . . . ”

original: mngon sum ni rtogs pa med pa snang ba'i don byed pas don ma min pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ma lus pa 'khrul pa med pa kho na yin gyi dbye ba med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mngon sum ni rtogs pa med pa snang ba'i don byed pas don ma min pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ma lus pa 'khrul pa med pa kho na yin gyi dbye ba med par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since direct perception is the activity of an appearance that is without conceptual differentiation, it is not reasonable that it be unreal because of the nonexistence of an object. Therefore, it is exclusively without error in its entirety. The demonstration that it is not differentiated is “in the world. . . . ”

original: 'jigs rten grags rten zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'jigs rten grags rten zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration that it is not non-existent is “it is known. . . . ”

original: khyed la yang /
analyzed: khyed la yang /
translated: For you, too,

original: tshad ma nyid dang tshad med nyid //
analyzed: tshad ma nyid dang tshad med nyid //
translated: validity and invalidity

original: dge dang sdig sogs de'i 'bras bu //
analyzed: dge dang sdig sogs de'i 'bras bu //
translated: Virtue, vice, etc. and their effects,

original: don dang stong pa'i blo rnams la //🔽'di la sogs kun mi rigs 'gyur snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: don dang stong pa'i blo rnams la // 'di la sogs kun mi rigs 'gyur snyam du sems pa la /
translated: and the ideas of object and void,🔽all this is not possible.

original: thams cad rang gi ngo bo la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: thams cad rang gi ngo bo la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: To this he says, “All this is in the nature of self-experience,”

original: snang bzhin pa la'o //
analyzed: snang bzhin pa la'o //
translated: i.e., in the nature of self-experience as it appears.

original: gzhan gyi ngo bo la zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa ma yin pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i yul la'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bo la zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa ma yin pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i yul la'o //
translated: “In the nature of other-experience” means in the nature of the object as it is not experienced as it appears.

original: thob pa med ces bya ba ni sngar rtogs pa dus phyi ma la rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thob pa med ces bya ba ni sngar rtogs pa dus phyi ma la rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “There is no attainment” means that what was previously experienced is not experienced again at a later time.

original: 'on te snang ba dang cig shos kyang de ma yin pa las log pas gcig nyid du zhen pa ni nye bar bstan pa yang yin la thob bya yang yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: 'on te snang ba dang cig shos kyang de ma yin pa las log pas gcig nyid du zhen pa ni nye bar bstan pa yang yin la thob bya yang yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: But if it is argued that the appearance and the other are the same because they are the opposite of not being that, and that they are both the demonstrated and the object of attainment,

original: smig rgyu la ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: smig rgyu la ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: he says, “In a mirage,” etc.

original: smig rgyu la chu'i shes pa la yang res 'ga' khung bu'i dang / chu bo'i chu dang phrad na de dmigs pa dang bcas @139b pa yin no //
analyzed: smig rgyu la chu'i shes pa la yang res 'ga' khung bu'i dang / chu bo'i chu dang phrad na de dmigs pa dang bcas @139b pa yin no //
translated: In the cognition of water in a mirage, sometimes it is with an object when it encounters a hole or the water of a river.

original: smig rgyu'i shes pa la ni kun tshe min na zhes bya ba thob pa ma yin zhes bya ba sbyar bas rgol ba'o //
analyzed: smig rgyu'i shes pa la ni kun tshe min na zhes bya ba thob pa ma yin zhes bya ba sbyar bas rgol ba'o //
translated: The argument is: “If the cognition of a mirage is not always a cognition of water, then it is not a cognition of water.”

original: lan ni thams cad la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni thams cad la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response is: “In all cases . . .”

original: bden pa'i chu'i shes pa la yang //
analyzed: bden pa'i chu'i shes pa la yang //
translated: Even in the case of a cognition of true water,

original: nges pa'i skad cig la 'jug pa ma yin pas nus pa yang 'bras bu mi shes na nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i skad cig la 'jug pa ma yin pas nus pa yang 'bras bu mi shes na nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is not the case that it engages its object at all times, because if the capacity is not known, then there is no ascertainment of the effect.

original: 'on te mig mi 'dzums par mthong ba nyid ni 'thob pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: 'on te mig mi 'dzums par mthong ba nyid ni 'thob pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: But if it is said that the mere seeing of the eye is the attainment,

original: ma zhig na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma zhig na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is said: “If it is not destroyed . . .”

original: zhig pa gang yin pa de yang ji ltar 'jig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni lan yin te /
analyzed: zhig pa gang yin pa de yang ji ltar 'jig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni lan yin te /
translated: The response is: “And how could that which is destroyed be destroyed?”

original: snga ma dang phyi ma'i cha dang bral ba'i snang ba nyid ni zhes pa yin la /
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma'i cha dang bral ba'i snang ba nyid ni zhes pa yin la /
translated: The appearance that is devoid of prior and subsequent parts is the eye.

original: gzhan du yang ma nyams pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du yang ma nyams pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is also undamaged in other cases.

original: sngar mthong ba ngo zhes pa ni de ma yin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par gcod pa'i yul can te /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba ngo zhes pa ni de ma yin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par gcod pa'i yul can te /
translated: The cognition of what was previously seen is the subject that excludes the effect that is not that.

original: 'gal ba can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'gal ba can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The non-contradictory teaching is:

original: ngo shes pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ngo shes pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The recognition, etc.

original: khyad par ni dmigs pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: khyad par ni dmigs pa med pa nyid do //
translated: The difference is the non-apprehension.

original: khyad par gyi khyad par ni phyi rol gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: khyad par gyi khyad par ni phyi rol gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The difference of the difference is the external nature.

original: rnam gzhag 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa la'o //
analyzed: rnam gzhag 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa la'o //
translated: The change of the arrangement is in the inference.

original: don dam par zhes bya bas sgro btags pas ni grub pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: don dam par zhes bya bas sgro btags pas ni grub pa yin pa'o //
translated: The ultimate, etc. is the proof by superimposition.

original: blo la mi gnas la ni khyad par ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir don dam par med pa sgrub par byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: blo la mi gnas la ni khyad par ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir don dam par med pa sgrub par byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur par bstan pa ni /
translated: The non-existence in the mind is not the difference, and so it is taught that it becomes the cause of the proof of non-existence in the ultimate.

original: tshad ma la tshad mas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshad ma la tshad mas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The valid cognition in regard to the valid cognition, etc.

original: snang ba dgag pa yin gyis gro btags pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba dgag pa yin gyis gro btags pa ni /
translated: The negation of the appearance is not the superimposition.

original: snang ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: snang ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The statement that it is not the appearance is:

original: yul dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yul dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The object, etc.

original: yul gzhan la sogs pa'i khyad par ni gzhan du nges par yin gyi sgro 'dogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yul gzhan la sogs pa'i khyad par ni gzhan du nges par yin gyi sgro 'dogs pa ma yin te /
translated: The difference of the other object, etc. is the determination of the other, and not the superimposition.

original: 'khrul pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The non-cause of error is taught:

original: yul la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yul la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In the object, etc.”

original: med par sgrub pa ni med pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: med par sgrub pa ni med pa'i don du'o //
translated: The non-existence is established as the meaning of non-existence.

original: 'ga' zhig las ni grangs can la sogs pa'i las so //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig las ni grangs can la sogs pa'i las so //
translated: “From some” means from the Sāṃkhya, etc.

original: gzhan las kyang zhes bya ba ni sngar mthong ba'i ngo shes pa las so //
analyzed: gzhan las kyang zhes bya ba ni sngar mthong ba'i ngo shes pa las so //
translated: “From others” means from the recognition of what was seen before.

original: yul gzhan la sogs par mthong ba yang gzhan du sgro gtags pa'i snang ba nyid kho na dgag pa ni gzhan la yang mtshungs par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yul gzhan la sogs par mthong ba yang gzhan du sgro gtags pa'i snang ba nyid kho na dgag pa ni gzhan la yang mtshungs par bstan pa ni /
translated: “The seeing of another object, etc.” is the mere appearance of superimposition on another.

original: tshad mas mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshad mas mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “By valid cognition” is the seeing.

original: rna ba las byung ba bshad pa ni res 'ga' 'khrul pa gang yin pa de zhes bya ba sa ni 'khrul pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba las byung ba bshad pa ni res 'ga' 'khrul pa gang yin pa de zhes bya ba sa ni 'khrul pa'o //
translated: “Arising from the ear” is explained as “that which is sometimes mistaken.”

original: gzhan du ni yongs pa'i yul las so //
analyzed: gzhan du ni yongs pa'i yul las so //
translated: “In another” is from the complete object.

original: gnod pa'i tshad ma ni snang ba ni dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: gnod pa'i tshad ma ni snang ba ni dmigs pa'o //
translated: “The valid cognition of harm” is the appearance that is the object.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ni de med pa'i ma dmigs pa tsam ni gnod byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ni de med pa'i ma dmigs pa tsam ni gnod byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “How?” is because the mere non-observation of that non-existence is not harmful.

original: gnod byed kyi 'khrul @140a * //
analyzed: gnod byed kyi 'khrul @140a * //
translated: The harm is the mistake.

original: pa nyid sel bar byed cing mngon par 'dod pa las gzhan pa'i gnod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni nyams pa te rgyun gcod pa'o //
analyzed: pa nyid sel bar byed cing mngon par 'dod pa las gzhan pa'i gnod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni nyams pa te rgyun gcod pa'o //
translated: “The other, which is the opposite of that, is the destroyer” is the loss, the cutting off of the continuum.

original: med pa la ni byed pa po nyid de shes byed pa ste /
analyzed: med pa la ni byed pa po nyid de shes byed pa ste /
translated: “The non-existent is the agent” is the object of the action.

original: ji ltar bsgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bsgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “How could it be established?”

original: de lta bu'i med pa ni med pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i med pa ni med pa'o //
translated: “Such a non-existent is non-existent.”

original: rgyu dang gnod byed dag gis yod pa dang med pa'i bdag nyid gcig tu byed pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la de med ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang gnod byed dag gis yod pa dang med pa'i bdag nyid gcig tu byed pa ma yin nam zhes zer ba la de med ces bya ba'o //
translated: “Are not the cause and the destroyer of the existent and the non-existent made into one?” “That is not so.”

original: yod pa'i ngo bo de kho nas yod pa ma yin du zin kyang grub pa la sgrub pa yin gyi de'i zhig pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yod pa'i ngo bo de kho nas yod pa ma yin du zin kyang grub pa la sgrub pa yin gyi de'i zhig pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: “Even though the existent is not existent by that very nature of existence, it is established in what is established, but it is not the destruction of that.”

original: gzhan gyi ngo bos zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bos zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “By another nature” is stated.

original: 'jig par 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'jig par 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “It would be destroyed” is supplied.

original: de'i ngo bos zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bos zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o //
translated: “By that nature” is not another.

original: phyis zhes bya ba ni sngar ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: phyis zhes bya ba ni sngar ma yin pa'o //
translated: “Later” is not earlier.

original: thams cad kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni res 'ga' ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni res 'ga' ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: “At all times” means not occasionally.

original: phyis kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyis kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it will also be destroyed later.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba'i de'i ngo bo de'i tshe yang rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba'i de'i ngo bo de'i tshe yang rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Just as” means that at that time, the nature of that thing is also engaged.

original: rjes su 'jug pa ma yin na 'jig pa'i don med de snga na nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rjes su 'jug pa ma yin na 'jig pa'i don med de snga na nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: If it is not engaged, then there is no point in its being destroyed, because it would not have existed previously.

original: de tshe nyid ces bya ba ste snga na nyid na'o //
analyzed: de tshe nyid ces bya ba ste snga na nyid na'o //
translated: “At that time” means previously.

original: snga ma nyid ni rgyu yod par rtog pa nyid na'o //
analyzed: snga ma nyid ni rgyu yod par rtog pa nyid na'o //
translated: “Previously” means when it is conceived that the cause exists.

original: ji ltar skyes pa ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar skyes pa ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Just as” means just as it is not arisen.

original: sgrub pa ni mi dgos phyir ngang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa ni mi dgos phyir ngang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “There is no need for proof” means that it is not reasonable.

original: 'di ji ltar skyes pa yang yin ma skyes pa yang yin pa'i 'jig pa'i phyogs 'dzin par byed pa'i tshad ma 'jug pa med pas de khas len pa rig pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar skyes pa yang yin ma skyes pa yang yin pa'i 'jig pa'i phyogs 'dzin par byed pa'i tshad ma 'jug pa med pas de khas len pa rig pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Since there is no valid cognition that engages the position that it is both arisen and not arisen, it is not reasonable to accept that.

original: tshang mas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshang mas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “This” refers to that.

original: de tshe zhes bya ba ni ma mthong ba na'o //
analyzed: de tshe zhes bya ba ni ma mthong ba na'o //
translated: “At that time” refers to when the object is not seen.

original: dngos po rtogs pa'i dus su khyad par dang bcas par ma grub pa'i phyir de'i tshe dngos po'i khyad par de ji ltar gzhan rtogs par mi nus pas ma grub pa'i khyad par la phyogs grub pa ma yin pa de kho na bzhin du 'gyur zhing /

original: khyad par gyi khyad par la yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni khyod la yang 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /🔽khyad par rab tu ma grub na //
analyzed: khyad par gyi khyad par la yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni khyod la yang 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni / khyad par rab tu ma grub na //

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //

translated: “If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.🔽“If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.🔽“If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.🔽“If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.🔽“If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.🔽“If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.🔽“If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.🔽“If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.🔽“If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.🔽“If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.🔽“If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.

analyzed: khyad par ni med pa'i ma yin nam snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: “If the distinction is not established” indicates that the distinction of the distinction is not established.🔽“If the

original: de nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: “That itself” is the same.

original: de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba @140b ni kha cig tu 'jug pa dang ldog pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid du zhes bya ba @140b ni kha cig tu 'jug pa dang ldog pas kyang ngo //
translated: “In that way” is in some cases by the engagement and disengagement.

original: dgag pa la ni don ci yod ces bya ba ni ma dmigs pa las ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: dgag pa la ni don ci yod ces bya ba ni ma dmigs pa las ma skyes pa'o //
translated: “What is the meaning of the negation?” is not arising from non-observation.

original: gzhan du na kha cig tu 'jug pa dang ldog pa med na chad mas rtogs pa la gzhan du rtogs pa ni 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du na kha cig tu 'jug pa dang ldog pa med na chad mas rtogs pa la gzhan du rtogs pa ni 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: Otherwise, if there is no engagement and disengagement in some cases, then the realization by the negation is a realization of something else, and that is an error.

original: de la yang bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de la yang bstan pa ni /
translated: And that is taught:

original: 'di ni sdar bshad zin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sdar bshad zin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Because it has already been explained.”

original: tshad mas mthong la 'khrul pa gang //
analyzed: tshad mas mthong la 'khrul pa gang //
translated: “If there is an error in seeing by valid cognition,

original: sa phyogs 'ga' zhig nyid du ste //
analyzed: sa phyogs 'ga' zhig nyid du ste //
translated: it is in some place of the earth.

original: tshad ma dag gis ldog pa na /
analyzed: tshad ma dag gis ldog pa na /
translated: When there is disengagement by valid cognitions,

original: 'khrul pa nyid du bzod dam ci //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid du bzod dam ci //
translated: why is it accepted as an error?”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir khyad par grub pa ma yin na'ang //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir khyad par grub pa ma yin na'ang //
translated: and so on. Therefore, the distinction is not established.

original: khyod kyi rtogs nus ji ltar yin //
analyzed: khyod kyi rtogs nus ji ltar yin //
translated: “How is it that you can understand?”

original: zhes bya ba'i rgol ba gzhan bsal ba'i phyir rgol ba gzhan yang smra ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rgol ba gzhan bsal ba'i phyir rgol ba gzhan yang smra ba ni /
translated: In order to clear away another objection, another opponent says:

original: gal te deng ni dran pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te deng ni dran pa yin // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is memory now,🔽it is not the memory of what was seen then.

original: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi'o //
translated: “Natural” means external.

original: ji lta bur 'gag pa med ces bya ba ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji lta bur 'gag pa med ces bya ba ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “How can it be without cessation?” means that it is contradictory.

original: rang bzhin min bzung na zhes bya ba la med pa'i khyad par ni rang bzhin ma yin na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin min bzung na zhes bya ba la med pa'i khyad par ni rang bzhin ma yin na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: If it is not grasped as natural, the distinction of non-existence is applied as “if it is not natural.”

original: 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dran pa la sogs pa phyi rol ma yin pa'i yul nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dran pa la sogs pa phyi rol ma yin pa'i yul nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: “If it is not so” and so on teaches that memory and so on do not have external objects.

original: 'jig rten rtogs dang zhes bya ba ni sad pa'i ka ba'i shes pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten rtogs dang zhes bya ba ni sad pa'i ka ba'i shes pa'i phyogs so //
translated: “Worldly understanding” is the position of the consciousness of a pillar in a dream.

original: de ni de tsam nyid ces bya ba ni rtogs pa tsam nyid do //
analyzed: de ni de tsam nyid ces bya ba ni rtogs pa tsam nyid do //
translated: “It is just that much” means it is just understanding.

original: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni phyi rol nyid du ste /
analyzed: de nyid du zhes bya ba ni phyi rol nyid du ste /
translated: “In reality” means externally.

original: 'di bshad pa ni rtogs pa tsam nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di bshad pa ni rtogs pa tsam nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of this is “it is just understanding.”

original: dpe gzhan bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dpe gzhan bstan pa ni /
translated: The other example is taught:

original: rmi lam sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rmi lam sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Like dreams and so on.”

original: de ni 'di ltar /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar /
translated: This is how it is:

original: 'on te dran dang rnam rtog las //
analyzed: 'on te dran dang rnam rtog las //
translated: If it is not from memory and conception,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnod par bya ba la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa yin yang rtogs pa'i snang ba rjes su dran nas dmigs pa nyid du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnod par bya ba la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa yin yang rtogs pa'i snang ba rjes su dran nas dmigs pa nyid du brjod pa yin no //
translated: The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.

original: rtogs pa nyid thob par bya ba yin no zhes sgro btags pa'i yul can gyi gnod byed nyid ni brtags pa pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni rtogs bzhin pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid thob par bya ba yin no zhes sgro btags pa'i yul can gyi gnod byed nyid ni brtags pa pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni rtogs bzhin pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.

original: sgro btags pa'i 'byung ba de la yang de dag 'brel pa'i rtogs bzhin pa yod pa nyid gnod par bye dpa'i yul can du bsten pan i /🔽gal te gnod byed ces bya ba ste /🔽brtags nas te bsams nas brtags pa'i yul snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽de'i dus ni brtags pa'i dus so //
analyzed: sgro btags pa'i 'byung ba de la yang de dag 'brel pa'i rtogs bzhin pa yod pa nyid gnod par bye dpa'i yul can du bsten pan i / gal te gnod byed ces bya ba ste / brtags nas te bsams nas brtags pa'i yul snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // de'i dus ni brtags pa'i dus so //
translated: The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.

analyzed: gzhan gyi dngul nya phyis kyi ngo bo'o // des zhes bya ba ni @141a * //
translated: The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.

original: shes pas so zhes bya ba ste rjes su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: shes pas so zhes bya ba ste rjes su 'gro ba'o //
translated: The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that is recalled.🔽The object of the cognition that is superimposed is the object of the cognition that

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'o //
translated: “If” indicates a reversal.

original: dmigs par zhes bya ba ni dngos po'o //
analyzed: dmigs par zhes bya ba ni dngos po'o //
translated: “Objective support” indicates an entity.

original: srid pa'i yul nyid bstan pa ni ldog gyur ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i yul nyid bstan pa ni ldog gyur ces bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of the object of existence is “if it were absent.”

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni yod pa nyid do //
translated: “Would occur” means would exist.

original: de yi rnam can shes skyes na //
analyzed: de yi rnam can shes skyes na //
translated: “When a cognition arises having its aspect,

original: de'i tshe dmigs pa nyid du 'jog //
analyzed: de'i tshe dmigs pa nyid du 'jog //
translated: at that time it is posited as the objective support.”

original: ces bya ba ni rnam pa med par smra ba po'i yang 'di kho na ltar 'jog pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnam pa med par smra ba po'i yang 'di kho na ltar 'jog pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: This shows that even for the proponents of the absence of aspects, it is posited in just this way.

original: de bzhin shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In the same way, cognition” and so on.

original: gzhan du na yul gyi nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du na yul gyi nges pa ma yin te /
translated: Otherwise, there would not be ascertainment of the object,

original: de min ngo bo mi rig phyir ro //
analyzed: de min ngo bo mi rig phyir ro //
translated: because its nature would not be cognized.

original: 'di ni lkog tu gyur pa'i skyed par byed pa brtan par byed pa'i rgyu dmigs par byed pa yin gyi /
