analyzed: 'di ni lkog tu gyur pa'i skyed par byed pa brtan par byed pa'i rgyu dmigs par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: This is the hidden cause of production, the observed object that stabilizes the mind.

original: las ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: las ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is not the object of action. This is taught by

original: sems ni yongs su zhes bya ba'o //🔽lkog gyur 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don //
analyzed: sems ni yongs su zhes bya ba'o // lkog gyur 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don //
translated: “The mind is fully” and so on.🔽The hidden object of production

original: rnam nges te rtogs pas byas par mi rigs pa de bzhin du //
analyzed: rnam nges te rtogs pas byas par mi rigs pa de bzhin du //
translated: is ascertained. It is not reasonable that it is produced by understanding.

original: de yi rnam can shes skyes na //
analyzed: de yi rnam can shes skyes na //
translated: When a consciousness arises having its aspect,🔽

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nyid do //
translated: “When a cognition having its form arises” and so on.

original: lkog tu gyur pa kho na nyid ji ste /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa kho na nyid ji ste /
translated: How can the nature of the object be hidden?

original: min zhe na zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
analyzed: min zhe na zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
translated: This is the objection.

original: ma yin te mngon sum zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: ma yin te mngon sum zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: No, it is perception. This is the reply.

original: 'brel pa ni rtags so //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni rtags so //
translated: The connection is the reason.

original: 'khor lo lta bu zhes bya ba ni dngos po yod na mngon sum dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: 'khor lo lta bu zhes bya ba ni dngos po yod na mngon sum dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin la /
translated: The wheel is like this: if the object exists, it is perceived by perception.

original: de la rtags las byung ba'i rjes su dpag pa yin zhing de las kyang dngos po yod pa nyid do ;
analyzed: de la rtags las byung ba'i rjes su dpag pa yin zhing de las kyang dngos po yod pa nyid do ;
translated: And from that, the existence of the object is inferred.

original: ; de ltar na ji ltar phyi rol yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: ; de ltar na ji ltar phyi rol yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: So how can it be external?

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa te srid pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa te srid pa'o //
translated: So it is accepted, that is, it is possible.

original: tshad mas bsal ba'i khas blangs pa yang ji ltar yin te /
analyzed: tshad mas bsal ba'i khas blangs pa yang ji ltar yin te /
translated: How can there be an accepted counterexample by a valid cognition?

original: mi shes pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mi shes pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because it is not known, it is taught:

original: tshad ma'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshad ma'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The nature of valid cognition.

original: ci'i phyir ma rig pa'i khas blangs pa yin no zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma rig pa'i khas blangs pa yin no zhes zer ba la /
translated: Why is it accepted as ignorance?

original: rang rig yod pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang rig yod pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “The existence of self-awareness” is the cognition that has the distinction of being occasional.

original: res 'ga' pa'i khyad par can gyi rnam pa'i rtogs pa de'i zhes bya ba'i khas blangs pa'i rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: res 'ga' pa'i khyad par can gyi rnam pa'i rtogs pa de'i zhes bya ba'i khas blangs pa'i rtogs pa'o //
translated: The cognition that is accepted is “that.”

original: khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba nyid phyi rol gyi dmigs pa med pa nyid na nges sam zhes bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba nyid phyi rol gyi dmigs pa med pa nyid na nges sam zhes bsdu ba yin no //
translated: The question is whether the distinction and the distinction itself are ascertained in the absence of an external object.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni bden pa nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni bden pa nyid kyi'o //
translated: The nature of that is reality.

original: rtogs pa ni shes pa yin no khyod kyis kyang rtogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni shes pa yin no khyod kyis kyang rtogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Cognition is knowledge. You should also apply the term “cognition.”

original: khas blangs pa grub pa ni ma btags pa phyin ci log pas ldog pa yin pa de'i phyir dmigs pa med pa nyid bstan pa ni / phyi nas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khas blangs pa grub pa ni ma btags pa phyin ci log pas ldog pa yin pa de'i phyir dmigs pa med pa nyid bstan pa ni / phyi nas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The establishment of the assertion is the reversal of the unreal imputation. Therefore, the teaching of the absence of an object is “later.”🔽Therefore,

original: de'i phyir / phyi rol nyid ni ma grub pas //
analyzed: de'i phyir / phyi rol nyid ni ma grub pas //
translated: since external reality is not established,

original: de'i phyir dmigs pa med pa'i blo //
analyzed: de'i phyir dmigs pa med pa'i blo //
translated: the cognition that lacks an object

original: @141b 'di ni ji ltar sgrub byed min //
analyzed: @141b 'di ni ji ltar sgrub byed min //
translated: is not established in the same way.

original: de'i tshe phyogs kyang shes pa yin //
analyzed: de'i tshe phyogs kyang shes pa yin //
translated: At that time, the position is also known.

original: zhes bya ba bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bsal ba yin no //
translated: This is the refutation.

original: khas blangs pas grub pa ni mngon sum ma yin na gang gis de bkag pa na des gnod par 'gyur de'i phyir mi rigs so //
analyzed: khas blangs pas grub pa ni mngon sum ma yin na gang gis de bkag pa na des gnod par 'gyur de'i phyir mi rigs so //
translated: If it is established by assertion, and is not direct perception, then when it is refuted by something else, it is harmed by that. Therefore, it is not reasonable.

original: mngon sum la sogs pa yi yul //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa yi yul //
translated: The objects of direct perception and so on

original: phyi rol kho nar gnas pa yin //
analyzed: phyi rol kho nar gnas pa yin //
translated: exist only externally.

original: de dgag byas pa de yi phyir //
analyzed: de dgag byas pa de yi phyir //
translated: Because they are refuted,

original: de dag gi phyogs la gnod 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag gi phyogs la gnod 'gyur //
translated: they harm the position of those who assert them.

original: zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: zhes zer ba ni /
translated: This is what is said.

original: gal te de ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te de ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is like that,

original: 'khrul pa dang cig shos dag gis gnod par bya ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa kho na yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: 'khrul pa dang cig shos dag gis gnod par bya ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa kho na yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: it is only asserted to be the nature of what is harmed by error and its opposite.

original: gal te snga phyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te snga phyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is earlier and later,

original: nya phyis la dngul gyi shes pa bzhin du dngul ma yin na ji ltar dngul gyi khyad par dgag pa yin zhes brgal zhing brtags pa'o //🔽de'i 'khrul pa nyid ga las zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
analyzed: nya phyis la dngul gyi shes pa bzhin du dngul ma yin na ji ltar dngul gyi khyad par dgag pa yin zhes brgal zhing brtags pa'o // de'i 'khrul pa nyid ga las zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
translated: it is like the consciousness of silver in a shell. If it is not silver, how is the distinction of silver refuted? This is the argument and examination.🔽From where is its error? This is another.

original: ci las she na 'khrul nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci las she na 'khrul nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: From what? The error itself.

original: don dam par na phyi rol gyi 'khrul pa med pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir khyab ches pa yin no //
analyzed: don dam par na phyi rol gyi 'khrul pa med pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir khyab ches pa yin no //
translated: because ultimately, external error does not exist in the least.

original: rgyu dang ldan pa nyid kyis 'khrul pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de rgyu dang ldan pa ni yin te /🔽de las bstan pa ni gal te rgyur bcas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang ldan pa nyid kyis 'khrul pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de rgyu dang ldan pa ni yin te / de las bstan pa ni gal te rgyur bcas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Error is not just the possession of a cause, but rather, it is the possession of a cause.

original: ma 'khrul par 'dod pa de dang rgyu dang ldan pa yin na de las brgal zhing brtags pa mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma 'khrul par 'dod pa de dang rgyu dang ldan pa yin na de las brgal zhing brtags pa mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The point is that if it is accepted that error is the possession of a cause, then the objection and analysis are the same.

original: 'khrul pa yod mod ces bya ba ni gnas skabs las so //🔽'khrul par 'dod pa de sgrub par byed pas ma 'khrul pas 'khrul pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: 'khrul pa yod mod ces bya ba ni gnas skabs las so // 'khrul par 'dod pa de sgrub par byed pas ma 'khrul pas 'khrul pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba ni /
translated: “Error exists” means in terms of the situation.🔽The point is that if error is accepted as the possession of a cause, then the error of the non-erroneous is obtained by the establishment of that.

original: gal te ma 'khrul ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te ma 'khrul ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the non-erroneous is the possession of a cause, then the error of the non-erroneous is obtained by the establishment of that.

original: phyi rol du 'khrul pa la sgrub pa'i ngo bo 'thob pa ma yin te mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol du 'khrul pa la sgrub pa'i ngo bo 'thob pa ma yin te mi mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: External error does not obtain the nature of establishment because it is not seen.

original: de'i phyir khyad par du 'khrul pa yin par nges pa nyid du bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par du 'khrul pa yin par nges pa nyid du bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, in order to demonstrate that it is definitely a mistake to make a distinction,

original: sgrub pa'i tshul du mthong ba gang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i tshul du mthong ba gang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: he says, “Whatever is seen as a means of proof.”

original: 'khrul pa nyid ni rjes su brjod par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid ni rjes su brjod par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The mistake itself is to be repeated,

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin te /🔽thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin te / thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: but it is not to be proven,🔽because it would be too much.

original: gang yin pa de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang yin pa de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is demonstrated by the words, “Whatever is seen as a means of proof.”🔽The distinction is that the cognition that has a cause is a mistake.

original: khyad par dang bcas pa'i blo gang du rgyu yin pa de 'khrul pa yin no zhes bya ba'i khyad par gyis nye bar bkod pa las yin gyi /
analyzed: khyad par dang bcas pa'i blo gang du rgyu yin pa de 'khrul pa yin no zhes bya ba'i khyad par gyis nye bar bkod pa las yin gyi /
translated: The distinction is stated by the words, “Whatever is seen as a means of proof.”

original: rgyu nges pa las ni sngar rtogs pa'i 'khrul pa nyid rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /🔽'khrul pa'i rang bzhin shes na yang //
analyzed: rgyu nges pa las ni sngar rtogs pa'i 'khrul pa nyid rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni / 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin shes na yang //
translated: The cause is not ascertained, because the mistake that is previously understood is not understood.🔽This is demonstrated by the words,

original: zhes bya ba ste /🔽khas blangs pa tsam las ni 'khrul pa nyid ma yin @142a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste / khas blangs pa tsam las ni 'khrul pa nyid ma yin @142a * //
translated: “Even if one knows the nature of a mistake.”

original: no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not a mistake, because it is merely accepted.

original: des rtogs pa yin yang mngon sum gyi nges pa ma yin pa ni 'khrul pa nges pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: des rtogs pa yin yang mngon sum gyi nges pa ma yin pa ni 'khrul pa nges pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: This shows that although it is understood, it is not ascertained by direct perception.

original: rang bzhin gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: By what nature?

original: mngon sum gyis ma nges pas rang gi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ma nges pas rang gi ngo bo ste /
translated: It is not ascertained by direct perception, because of its nature.

original: mngon sum gyi rtogs par bya bas 'khrul pa nyid 'dzin pa'i yul yang mngon sum gyis nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi rtogs par bya bas 'khrul pa nyid 'dzin pa'i yul yang mngon sum gyis nges pa ma yin te /
translated: The object that is grasped by error, which is to be understood by direct perception, is also not ascertained by direct perception,

original: 'khrul pa nyid bzhin no zhes bya ba ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid bzhin no zhes bya ba ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is like error itself. This is what is meant by “that also.”🔽If this is also like that,

original: gal te 'di yang zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa nyid 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: gal te 'di yang zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa nyid 'dzin pa'o //
translated: then the object that is grasped by error🔽is also not ascertained by direct perception.

original: de ltar yang zhes bya ba ni khas len pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang zhes bya ba ni khas len pa'o //
translated: If you accept that,

original: zad par sgrub par byed blo yang /
analyzed: zad par sgrub par byed blo yang /
translated: then the cognition that establishes the complete

original: gal te brdzun 'dod de yi phyir //🔽ji ltar 'dod pas kun pa'am //
analyzed: gal te brdzun 'dod de yi phyir // ji ltar 'dod pas kun pa'am //
translated: would also be false.🔽Therefore, how could you be liberated

original: ma tshang sogs par thar bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ma tshang sogs par thar bar 'gyur //
translated: by the incomplete, and so on, as you wish?🔽As it is said:

original: de ltar yang / de brdzun nyid du thal 'gyur na //
analyzed: de ltar yang / de brdzun nyid du thal 'gyur na //
translated: If that is also false,

original: snga ma thams cad med par 'gyur //
analyzed: snga ma thams cad med par 'gyur //
translated: then all the previous would be nonexistent.

original: zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught by:

original: dngul du rtogs par byed na ni //
analyzed: dngul du rtogs par byed na ni //
translated: If it is understood as silver,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is silver.

original: gang gi tshe nya phyis su 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe nya phyis su 'gyur zhe na /
translated: When is it a mother-of-pearl?

original: rtogs pa ldog pa yin pa ni dngul gyi'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa ldog pa yin pa ni dngul gyi'o //
translated: The reversal of the understanding is silver.

original: ldog pa'i rgyu ni gnod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i rgyu ni gnod par byed pa'o //
translated: The cause of the reversal is the impairment.

original: rtogs pa gnyis kyi yul mi dmigs pa la khyad par med pas de'i tshe ka ba sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa'i dbye ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rtogs pa gnyis kyi yul mi dmigs pa la khyad par med pas de'i tshe ka ba sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa'i dbye ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since there is no difference in the non-apprehension of the object of the two understandings, at that time it is not a division of the cognition that establishes the pillar.🔽The statement that this is accepted is:

original: gnyi ga dag kyang ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga dag kyang ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Both are also.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa ni ka ba la sogs pa'i shes pa'i yul ma yin pa'i mi dmigs pa rjes su brjod pa las khyad par du bya ba kho na yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa ni ka ba la sogs pa'i shes pa'i yul ma yin pa'i mi dmigs pa rjes su brjod pa las khyad par du bya ba kho na yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The cognition that establishes is only distinguished by the repetition of the non-apprehension that is not the object of the cognition of the pillar, etc.🔽The statement that this is said is:

original: gal te yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is also.

original: la la dag tu ni sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa la'o //
analyzed: la la dag tu ni sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa la'o //
translated: In some places, it is in the cognition that establishes.

original: de la bstan pa ni mi dmigs pa ste nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de la bstan pa ni mi dmigs pa ste nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: The teaching there is non-apprehension, the presentation.

original: gzhan la ni ka ba la sogs pa'i shes pa la'o //
analyzed: gzhan la ni ka ba la sogs pa'i shes pa la'o //
translated: In the case of others, it is the cognition of a pillar, etc.

original: gnod par byed pa'i shes pa'i dbang du byas pa'i bsgrub bya nyid ni snga ma'i ngo bo yin pa de tshad ma yin na mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i shes pa'i dbang du byas pa'i bsgrub bya nyid ni snga ma'i ngo bo yin pa de tshad ma yin na mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: The object to be invalidated is the prior nature, which is the basis of the cognition that invalidates it. If that is a valid cognition, it cannot be. This is what he thinks.

original: gnod byed rtogs pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽de las ldog pa ni gnod bya las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: gnod byed rtogs pa zhes bya ba'o // de las ldog pa ni gnod bya las bzlog pa'o //
translated: This is called “the cognition that invalidates.”🔽The opposite of that is the opposite of what is to be invalidated.

original: bzlog pa yi ni gnod par bya ba'i'o //
analyzed: bzlog pa yi ni gnod par bya ba'i'o //
translated: The opposite of that is the object to be invalidated.

original: med pa ni gnod par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: med pa ni gnod par bya ba nyid do //
translated: The opposite of that is the absence of the object to be invalidated.

original: bzlog pa dang cig shos dag kyang rig yin na snga mas ci zhig 'thob pa yin na gang gis nges pa med par 'gyur /
analyzed: bzlog pa dang cig shos dag kyang rig yin na snga mas ci zhig 'thob pa yin na gang gis nges pa med par 'gyur /
translated: If the opposite and the other are known, what is gained by the prior one, by which there would be no ascertainment?

original: gang gi phyir sngon bo ni ser po rig na med par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngon bo ni ser po rig na med par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation that the prior blue would be absent if the yellow were known is stated in the line “If the opposite is known.”

original: bzlog rig de ste de @142b ltar min //
analyzed: bzlog rig de ste de @142b ltar min //
translated: That is not so.

original: zhes bya ba ni bzlog pa rig pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bzlog pa rig pa'o //
translated: This is the cognition of the opposite.

original: gal te snga ma mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid yin na mi dmigs pa kho na med par nges pa kho na yin no zhes bstan pa ni nges pa mi dmigs pas byas nas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te snga ma mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid yin na mi dmigs pa kho na med par nges pa kho na yin no zhes bstan pa ni nges pa mi dmigs pas byas nas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If the former is the nature of non-apprehension, then non-apprehension alone is the ascertainment of non-existence.

original: ka ba'o zhes sam rtsig pa'o zhes pa'i nges pa la nges pa ma dmigs nyid gnod par byed pa yin na phyin ci log tu dmigs pas ci zhig bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ka ba'o zhes sam rtsig pa'o zhes pa'i nges pa la nges pa ma dmigs nyid gnod par byed pa yin na phyin ci log tu dmigs pas ci zhig bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement “The ascertainment is made by non-apprehension of ascertainment” is this: If the ascertainment of a pillar or a wall is undermined by the non-apprehension of ascertainment itself, then what is the use of the apprehension of the opposite?

original: bzlog pa yang rang rig pa tsam nyid du dmigs pa yod do zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: bzlog pa yang rang rig pa tsam nyid du dmigs pa yod do zhes zer ba la /
translated: The opponent says that the opposite is also apprehended as mere self-awareness.

original: gal te bzlog pa dmigs pa'i phyir //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te bzlog pa dmigs pa'i phyir // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the opposite is apprehended,

original: de zhes bya ba ni snga mi'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni snga mi'o //
translated: The word “that” refers to the former.

original: ma grub pa ni med pa'o//
analyzed: ma grub pa ni med pa'o//
translated: Non-establishment is non-existence.

original: grub par byed pa yang mi dmigs pa kho na la rjes su 'brang ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: grub par byed pa yang mi dmigs pa kho na la rjes su 'brang ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that the establishment is only the consequence of non-apprehension is

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Therefore.”

original: mi dmigs pa ni rang rig pa tsam gyi nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni rang rig pa tsam gyi nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
translated: Non-apprehension illustrates mere self-awareness.

original: de'i phyir phyi rol gyi don la dmigs pa'i blo ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyi rol gyi don la dmigs pa'i blo ni //
translated: Therefore, the cognition that perceives external objects

original: yang dag pa nyid kyi blo 'di yin te /
analyzed: yang dag pa nyid kyi blo 'di yin te /
translated: is a valid cognition,🔽because it is not undermined by any other cognition, just like the cognition that is not undermined in a dream, etc.

original: gnod byed kyi blo dang bral ba'i phyir dper na rmi lam la sogs pa'i gnod pa'i blo bzhin du'o zhes bya ba'i mi dmigs pa'i gnod pas ma grub pa yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnod byed kyi blo dang bral ba'i phyir dper na rmi lam la sogs pa'i gnod pa'i blo bzhin du'o zhes bya ba'i mi dmigs pa'i gnod pas ma grub pa yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The following verse is stated to show that this is not established by the undermining of non-apprehension:

original: yang brjod pa /
analyzed: yang brjod pa /
translated: It is said:

original: gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni //
translated: What is?

original: khyad par dang ni khyad par du //🔽bya ba dag la dbye med dang// phyogs kyang ngag gi don yin par //
analyzed: khyad par dang ni khyad par du // bya ba dag la dbye med dang// phyogs kyang ngag gi don yin par //
translated: The distinction and the distinguished🔽are not differentiated in terms of action,🔽and the position is also posited

original: rnam par gzhag pa byed pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba yang ngo //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa byed pa yin // zhes bya ba yang ngo //
translated: as the meaning of the statement.

original: ldan pa'i don med nyid ces bya ba ni dmigs pa'i 'brel pa med pa'o //🔽dngos po gzhan ni med pa gzhan //
analyzed: ldan pa'i don med nyid ces bya ba ni dmigs pa'i 'brel pa med pa'o // dngos po gzhan ni med pa gzhan //
translated: The meaning of “non-possession” is the absence of the connection of the object of apprehension.🔽There is no other thing that is another

original: 'ga' yang med de ma brtags phyir //
analyzed: 'ga' yang med de ma brtags phyir //
translated: because there is no other thing, since it is not examined.

original: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas dmigs pa dang bral ba'i rig pa nyid rang nyid rig pa'o zhes brjod pa yin na / dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas dmigs pa dang bral ba'i rig pa nyid rang nyid rig pa'o zhes brjod pa yin na / dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la //
translated: The argument is that awareness itself, which is free from the object of apprehension, is self-awareness.

original: ji ltar khyod ni rtogs par 'dod //
analyzed: ji ltar khyod ni rtogs par 'dod //
translated: How can you understand🔽nonexistent phenomena?

original: gal te rang blos rtogs na ni //
analyzed: gal te rang blos rtogs na ni //
translated: If you understand them through your own mind,

original: khyod ni klan ka tshol ba yin //
analyzed: khyod ni klan ka tshol ba yin //
translated: you are seeking an opportunity to criticize.

original: zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation is

original: dngos po med pa dang ldan par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa dang ldan par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: endowed with nonexistence.🔽What kind of conception of nonexistence

original: med pa'i rtog pa ci 'dra zhig / rtog byed dngos por thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: med pa'i rtog pa ci 'dra zhig / rtog byed dngos por thal bar 'gyur //
translated: would entail the conception being an existent thing?🔽The explanation of this is

original: zhes bya ba 'di la bstan pa ni ldog pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di la bstan pa ni ldog pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: in terms of the reverse.

original: gal te / kun rdzob la ni bden med na //
analyzed: gal te / kun rdzob la ni bden med na //
translated: If the conventional has no truth,

original: bden pa'i dbye 'di ci las yin //
analyzed: bden pa'i dbye 'di ci las yin //
translated: from what is this division of truth derived?

original: gal te bden kun rdzob 'di gang //
analyzed: gal te bden kun rdzob 'di gang //
translated: If the conventional is true,

original: gal te brdzun na ji ltar bden //
analyzed: gal te brdzun na ji ltar bden //
translated: if it is false, how can it be true?

original: zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: zhes zer ba la /
translated: The explanation is

original: bden par snang ba zhes @143a * //
analyzed: bden par snang ba zhes @143a * //
translated: the appearance of truth.

original: bya ba'o // rnam par mi dpyad pa'i rtogs pa ni kun rdzob kyang yin la bden pa yang yin te /
analyzed: bya ba'o // rnam par mi dpyad pa'i rtogs pa ni kun rdzob kyang yin la bden pa yang yin te /
translated: The cognition that does not analyze is both conventional and true,

original: de lta bu'i rtogs pa dang ldan pa la gnod par byed pa mi 'byung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rtogs pa dang ldan pa la gnod par byed pa mi 'byung ba'i phyir te /
translated: because no one can refute one who possesses such a cognition.

original: 'khrul pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to demonstrate error,

original: tshad ma la gnas pa rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir 'dir da ltar ni rnam par dpyad na zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam par dpyod pa'i khas blangs pa'i phyir de bstan pa ni med na ni dngos po ste /
analyzed: tshad ma la gnas pa rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir 'dir da ltar ni rnam par dpyad na zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam par dpyod pa'i khas blangs pa'i phyir de bstan pa ni med na ni dngos po ste /
translated: he says, “If one analyzes . . . ,” and so on. Since the root of abiding in valid cognition is the acceptance of analysis, he does not demonstrate that.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa nyid do //
translated: “ This” refers to error.

original: dngos po la yang de bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po la yang de bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba yin no //
translated: It is also the case that “that” is the object of error.🔽The cognition that cannot withstand analysis of the object and its opposite is error.

original: dngos po dang cig shos rnam par dpyad mi bzod pa'i shes pa ni 'khrul pa yin la de lta na de nyid kun rdzob yin par zer ba ni /🔽gal te de nyid mi snang 'khrul //
analyzed: dngos po dang cig shos rnam par dpyad mi bzod pa'i shes pa ni 'khrul pa yin la de lta na de nyid kun rdzob yin par zer ba ni / gal te de nyid mi snang 'khrul //
translated: If one says that just that is conventional,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then he says, “If that does not appear, it is error.”

original: de'i phyir rang dang gzhan gyi 'dod pa ma dpyad pas don mtshungs pa yin yang des 'di log pa dang kun rdzob kyi sgra dag slu ba'i don du nye bar bkod pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang dang gzhan gyi 'dod pa ma dpyad pas don mtshungs pa yin yang des 'di log pa dang kun rdzob kyi sgra dag slu ba'i don du nye bar bkod pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, although the meaning is the same, when one does not analyze the assertions of others and oneself, the terms “false” and “concealer” are applied to the object of refutation.

original: kha chu 'thung zhes brjod pa bzhin//
analyzed: kha chu 'thung zhes brjod pa bzhin//
translated: Like saying “drink your spit.”

original: zhes pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of that is:

original: des na bden ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na bden ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, “as if it were true.”

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rgyal dpog pa la sogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rgyal dpog pa la sogs pa'i'o //
translated: “Someone” refers to the Lokāyatas and so on.

original: bden pa'i min la yang zhes bya ba ni rig byed dang / phyi rol gyi don la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: bden pa'i min la yang zhes bya ba ni rig byed dang / phyi rol gyi don la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: “Not true” refers to the Vedas, external objects, and so on.

original: mi 'byor pa ni rigs pa dang 'gal bas so //
analyzed: mi 'byor pa ni rigs pa dang 'gal bas so //
translated: “Unreasonable” means that it contradicts reasoning.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni smra ba las so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni smra ba las so //
translated: “Therefore” refers to the statement.

original: ma yin par dgag pa ni phyi rol las gzhan dmigs pa yin gyi phyi rol las gzhan dmigs pa yin gyi phyi rol dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin par dgag pa ni phyi rol las gzhan dmigs pa yin gyi phyi rol las gzhan dmigs pa yin gyi phyi rol dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The negative prefix “non” in “non-external” means that the object of observation is different from external objects, but it is not that the object of observation is external objects.

original: gal te yang zhes bya ba 'di la yang grub pa la sgrub pa yin zhes bya bar rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: gal te yang zhes bya ba 'di la yang grub pa la sgrub pa yin zhes bya bar rjes su 'jug go //
translated: If you say that the word also in the verse refers to the establishment of the object,

original: shin tu tha dad pas dmigs pa med par zhes bya ba ni grub pa yin te /
analyzed: shin tu tha dad pas dmigs pa med par zhes bya ba ni grub pa yin te /
translated: then the statement that the object is not perceived is established,

original: sngon po dang de'i blo dag kun rdzob kyi dbye bar khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon po dang de'i blo dag kun rdzob kyi dbye bar khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because you accept that the blue object and the cognition of blue are different in terms of the conventional.🔽But if you say that the object is not perceived in any way, you contradict your own position.

original: rnam pa 'gas kyang tha dad pa dmigs pa ma yin no zhes khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa 'gas kyang tha dad pa dmigs pa ma yin no zhes khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: This is the point of the phrase,

original: rnam 'gas yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam 'gas yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not perceived in any way.🔽It is well established that the cognition does not perceive the blue object in the aspect of blue.

original: blo ni sngon po la sngon po'i rnam pa nyid kyis dmigs pa ma yin no zhes grub pa kho na yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: blo ni sngon po la sngon po'i rnam pa nyid kyis dmigs pa ma yin no zhes grub pa kho na yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is the point of the phrase,

original: dngos sogs rnams las kyang //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos sogs rnams las kyang // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Nor is it perceived in the aspect of something else.

original: rang nyid kyi dmigs pas lhan cig dmigs par nges pa yin pa 'di la zer ba ni /🔽'dzin las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang nyid kyi dmigs pas lhan cig dmigs par nges pa yin pa 'di la zer ba ni /🔽'dzin las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase because of the necessity of simultaneous perception means that the object is necessarily perceived simultaneously with the cognition.🔽 This is the point of the phrase, Because of the necessity of simultaneous perception.🔽The phrase because of the necessity of being apprehended by the cognition that apprehends that means that the object is necessarily apprehended by the cognition that apprehends the cognition.🔽 This is the point of the phrase, Because of the necessity of being apprehended by the cognition that apprehends that.

original: gzung ba snga ma la phyis 'byung ba'i 'dzin byed ces gcig nyid du nus pa'i @143b dbye ba 'gal ba yin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'i blo 'ba' zhig yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba snga ma la phyis 'byung ba'i 'dzin byed ces gcig nyid du nus pa'i @143b dbye ba 'gal ba yin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'i blo 'ba' zhig yin no //
translated: The contradiction of a single entity having a division of a prior apprehended object and a subsequent apprehending subject is only a non-objective awareness.

original: chos dang chos can brjod pa'i stobs kyis /
analyzed: chos dang chos can brjod pa'i stobs kyis /
translated: By the power of expressing the property and the property-possessor,

original: mo gsham las skyes bu 'di ni //
analyzed: mo gsham las skyes bu 'di ni //
translated: this man born from a barren woman

original: smig rgyu'i chu la khrus byas nas //
analyzed: smig rgyu'i chu la khrus byas nas //
translated: bathes in the water of a mirage,

original: ri bor rva yi gzhu thogs shing //
analyzed: ri bor rva yi gzhu thogs shing //
translated: takes up a bow of a mountain’s peak,

original: nam mkha'i me tog thod bcings 'gro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog thod bcings 'gro //
translated: and goes, binding a garland of sky-flowers.

original: zhes bya ba lta bu'i blo'i skye ba yin par bsgrub pa la blo'i skye ba bsgrub pa ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba lta bu'i blo'i skye ba yin par bsgrub pa la blo'i skye ba bsgrub pa ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: In proving the arising of such an awareness, the proof of the arising of an awareness is shown to be a proof of what is already established.

original: gal te dmigs pa med pa'i blo yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te dmigs pa med pa'i blo yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If even an awareness without an objective referent” and so on.

original: 'di la khyod kyi yang log pa'i don kho na yin par bstan pa ni /🔽khyed ni rnam pa ji ltar yang //
analyzed: 'di la khyod kyi yang log pa'i don kho na yin par bstan pa ni / khyed ni rnam pa ji ltar yang //
translated: Here, it is shown that even for you, the meaning is only a falsity.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In no way whatsoever” and so on.

original: sgrub byed kyis bskyed pa'i blo ni rang gi cha la mthar thug pa'i phyir ka ba la sogs pa'i blo dmigs pa nyid kyi yul ma yin zhing gnod pa can yang ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub byed kyis bskyed pa'i blo ni rang gi cha la mthar thug pa'i phyir ka ba la sogs pa'i blo dmigs pa nyid kyi yul ma yin zhing gnod pa can yang ma yin te /
translated: The cognition produced by the proof is not the object of the cognition of a pillar, etc., because it is ultimately its own part, and it is not a contradictor,

original: yul tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni nag pa la sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni nag pa la sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is a different object. This is demonstrated by “black, etc.”

original: ka ba la sogs pa'i blo gnod par bya ba ma yin pa gzung ba'i yul can ni dmigs pa can dang bcas pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ka ba la sogs pa'i blo gnod par bya ba ma yin pa gzung ba'i yul can ni dmigs pa can dang bcas pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The cognition of a pillar, etc., which is not to be contradicted, is demonstrated as having an object,

original: rang bzhin yin phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin yin phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because it is natural.

original: gzung ba'i byed pa'i phyir ro //🔽byed pa sgrub pa'i rtogs par byed pa'i sgra ni chos can gyi rjod byed yin zhing /
analyzed: gzung ba'i byed pa'i phyir ro // byed pa sgrub pa'i rtogs par byed pa'i sgra ni chos can gyi rjod byed yin zhing /
translated: Because it is the cause of apprehension.🔽The word “is” in the proof of the function is the expression of the subject.

original: rang nyid kyang chos can nyid du brjod pa la don rig pa'i ngo bo dmigs pa nyid 'gog na grub ba la sgrub pa yin te /🔽sems pa can ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang nyid kyang chos can nyid du brjod pa la don rig pa'i ngo bo dmigs pa nyid 'gog na grub ba la sgrub pa yin te / sems pa can ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: And when the mere object of the cognition of the nature of the object of apprehension is refuted, it is a proof of what is established,

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is not a sentient being. This is demonstrated by “if.”

original: blo skyed pa'i ngo bo'i dmigs pa nyid 'gog pa na mngon par 'dod pa'i dmigs pa med pa'i shes pa nyid bstan par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: blo skyed pa'i ngo bo'i dmigs pa nyid 'gog pa na mngon par 'dod pa'i dmigs pa med pa'i shes pa nyid bstan par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: When the object of the nature of the development of understanding is refuted, it is shown that the mere cognition without an object that is desired is not taught.

original: gal te blo skyed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te blo skyed ces bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said, “The development of understanding,”

original: ci las she na sgrub byed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci las she na sgrub byed ces bya ba'o //
translated: what is it? It is the probandum.

original: khyed kyi sgra ni don la rjod byed ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa ni /🔽brjod pa 'brel pa med par min //
analyzed: khyed kyi sgra ni don la rjod byed ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa ni / brjod pa 'brel pa med par min //
translated: The teaching that your word is not the expresser of the object is:

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Not without a connection with the expression.”

original: sgra dang don gyi dbye ba'i 'brel pa 'dzin pa med pa ni dmigs pa med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgra dang don gyi dbye ba'i 'brel pa 'dzin pa med pa ni dmigs pa med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the absence of an object is the absence of the apprehension of the connection of the word and the object.

original: der rten ni sgra'i don gyi rten no //
analyzed: der rten ni sgra'i don gyi rten no //
translated: The basis of that is the basis of the word and the object.

original: de nyid kyi phyir khyod la sgrub byed kyi dbye ba'i sbyor ba med do zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir khyod la sgrub byed kyi dbye ba'i sbyor ba med do zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: For that very reason, the teaching that you do not have the application of the division of the probandum is:

original: cha shas bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: cha shas bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “The one with parts.”

original: 'dri ba po rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i don rtogs par byed par 'dod pa ni phyogs dang gtan tshigs dang dpe'i tshig dzin par byed pa dmigs pa med pa nyid yin na mi 'grub po @144a * //
analyzed: 'dri ba po rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i don rtogs par byed par 'dod pa ni phyogs dang gtan tshigs dang dpe'i tshig dzin par byed pa dmigs pa med pa nyid yin na mi 'grub po @144a * //
translated: The desire to make the questioner understand what he does not understand is not accomplished by the mere statement of the words of the position, reason, and example.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yin yang khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni gal te de ldan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yin yang khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni gal te de ldan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even though it has an object, it is contradictory to what is accepted, as is shown by the words “if it has that.”

original: ma yin par dgag pa 'di la bstan pa ni shes las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma yin par dgag pa 'di la bstan pa ni shes las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching about this negation is “from the cognition.”

original: grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that it is not an establishment of what is already established is

original: sngo sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngo sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “blue, etc.”

original: de chos yod kyang zhes bya ba ni gzhal bya nyid la sogs pas sngon po la sogs pa'i chos kyang ngo //
analyzed: de chos yod kyang zhes bya ba ni gzhal bya nyid la sogs pas sngon po la sogs pa'i chos kyang ngo //
translated: “Even though it has the property” means that even though blue, etc., have the property of being the object of cognition, etc.,

original: tha mi dad pa ma yin yang 'on kyang tha dad pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa ma yin yang 'on kyang tha dad pa kho na yin te /
translated: they are not non-different, but rather are just different.

original: phyi rol gyi tshul zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi tshul zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The rest is “in the external mode.”

original: gzhal bya las ni chos can las te /
analyzed: gzhal bya las ni chos can las te /
translated: From the object of cognition, i.e., from the subject,

original: ji ltar tha dad pa de ltar dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar tha dad pa de ltar dmigs pa ste /
translated: As they are different, they are perceived.

original: de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: from that which is not of its own nature.

original: shes pa las tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan grub pa la sgrub pa ci las yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: shes pa las tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan grub pa la sgrub pa ci las yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: What is the proof that the reason is established as different from consciousness?

original: tha mi dad pa nyid gsal bar byed pa ni tha dad nyid phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa nyid gsal bar byed pa ni tha dad nyid phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The non-difference is clarified by “because of the difference.”

original: gal te yang zhes bya ba 'di la bstan pa ni shin tu zhes bya ba'i //🔽rnam 'gas zhes bya ba 'di la bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gal te yang zhes bya ba 'di la bstan pa ni shin tu zhes bya ba'i // rnam 'gas zhes bya ba 'di la bstan pa ni /
translated: If, in this regard, it is taught that it is “very much so,”🔽in what way?

original: gal te rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In this regard, it is taught: “if in some way.”

original: kun rdzob pa'i don la brten nas so //
analyzed: kun rdzob pa'i don la brten nas so //
translated: It is based on the meaning of the conventional.

original: blta bar zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang cig shos mthong ba dag cig car 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blta bar zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa dang cig shos mthong ba dag cig car 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “To see” means that seeing the difference and non-difference are mutually exclusive.

original: sngo sogs rnam pa tha dad par /
analyzed: sngo sogs rnam pa tha dad par /
translated: The statement “the aspect of blue, etc.”

original: zhes bya ba //
analyzed: zhes bya ba //
translated: is made.

original: 'dod pa blangs nas bstan pa ni //
analyzed: 'dod pa blangs nas bstan pa ni //
translated: Having accepted the assertion, it is taught:

original: shes pa'i rnam pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa'i rnam pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “by the aspect of consciousness itself.”

original: dngos sogs rnam pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: dngos sogs rnam pa las kyang ngo //
translated: Also from the aspects of entity and so on.

original: zhes 'don pa la bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes 'don pa la bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the reading is:

original: gnyi ga rtogs pa'i ngo bor ni //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga rtogs pa'i ngo bor ni // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the nature of the realization of both.

original: rtogs las zhes bya ba ni rnam pa'i'o //
analyzed: rtogs las zhes bya ba ni rnam pa'i'o //
translated: The realization from is the aspect of.

original: dbye ba la ni rang gi rig pa gnyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal bzhin du gzung ba la sogs pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: dbye ba la ni rang gi rig pa gnyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal bzhin du gzung ba la sogs pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: In the case of the division, the two of reflexive awareness are not like pleasure and pain, because the object of observation does not exist.

original: de'i dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
analyzed: de'i dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
translated: The statement that it does not exist is connected with the statement:

original: dngos po la rang la yod pa'i gzhal bya ba la sogs pa'i ngo bos 'dzin pa yin te tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po la rang la yod pa'i gzhal bya ba la sogs pa'i ngo bos 'dzin pa yin te tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The entity is the apprehension by means of the object of comprehension and so on that exists for itself, because it is not different. This is the meaning.

original: gzhal bya la sogs pa las tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba de la sel bar byed pas bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhal bya la sogs pa las tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba de la sel bar byed pas bsal ba yin no //
translated: The statement that it is not different from the object of comprehension and so on is cleared up by the refutation.

original: 'dzin las zhes bya ba de la bstan pa ni //
analyzed: 'dzin las zhes bya ba de la bstan pa ni //
translated: The explanation of the statement from the apprehension is:

original: rtogs las mi gzhan gzung 'dzin gyi //
analyzed: rtogs las mi gzhan gzung 'dzin gyi //
translated: From the realization, the division of the apprehended and the apprehender is not different.

original: dbye dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbye dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And so on is the statement.

original: nus pa'i dbye ba 'gal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nus pa'i dbye ba 'gal bar 'gyur //
translated: The division of the potency would be contradictory.

original: zhes bya ba de 'dis bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de 'dis bsal ba yin te /
translated: This is what is being refuted by this verse.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa @144b nyid kyis cig car ram rim gyis nus pa'i dbye ba yin pa rnal 'byor spyod pa pa rnams 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa @144b nyid kyis cig car ram rim gyis nus pa'i dbye ba yin pa rnal 'byor spyod pa pa rnams 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: The Yogacarins do not accept that the distinction of simultaneous or successive is due to the distinction of apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: dbye bar yang ni ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: dbye bar yang ni ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How could there be a distinction?

original: zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs pa'o //
translated: This is a hypothetical case.

original: da bye ba 'ga' yang med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: da bye ba 'ga' yang med pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not that there is no distinction at all.

original: dbye ba med pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbye ba med pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no distinction in the object.

original: de gsal bar byed pa ni dper na rtogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa ni dper na rtogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To make this clear, he gives the example, “For example, in the case of cognition. . . . ”

original: gzhan rnams kho nas 'dzin par byed pa la sogs pa brtags pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan rnams kho nas 'dzin par byed pa la sogs pa brtags pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: He shows that the other ones, such as the apprehender, are imagined:

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Therefore. . . . ”

original: sngar gyi phyogs las ni zhes bya ba ni thams cad nyid dmigs pa med pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba las so //
analyzed: sngar gyi phyogs las ni zhes bya ba ni thams cad nyid dmigs pa med pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba las so //
translated: “From the previous position” refers to the statement, “Is not everything itself nonapprehended? ”

original: de la yang skye ba dang ldan pa nyid du 'dod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de la yang skye ba dang ldan pa nyid du 'dod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: He shows that the other ones, such as the object of knowledge, are also accepted as having arising:

original: de bzhin thams cad skye ba ni //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin thams cad skye ba ni //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In the same way, all arising. . . . ”

original: sgrub byed las byung ba'i blo chos su gyur ba'i dmigs pa med nyid mi 'dzin kyang zhen par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub byed las byung ba'i blo chos su gyur ba'i dmigs pa med nyid mi 'dzin kyang zhen par byed pa yin no //
translated: Although one does not apprehend the non-existence of the object which is the mental object arisen from the proof, one is still attached to it.

original: des na nag pa la sogs shes pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ngo bo med pa'i phyir bsal ba ni /🔽blo ni dmigs dang bcas pa nyid //
analyzed: des na nag pa la sogs shes pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ngo bo med pa'i phyir bsal ba ni / blo ni dmigs dang bcas pa nyid //
translated: Therefore, the refutation of the statement “The cognition of black, etc.” is because of the absence of an entity.

original: ces bya ba'o //🔽gal te rtogs byed sgra yang ni //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o // gal te rtogs byed sgra yang ni //
translated: The statement “The cognition is indeed with an object” is the refutation.

original: zhes bya ba de la bstan pa ni /🔽rtogs pa'i sgra zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de la bstan pa ni / rtogs pa'i sgra zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The statement “If the word which is the means of understanding” is the teaching.

original: gnas skabs las gzhan pa la'o //🔽gal te blo skye nus pa ni //
analyzed: gnas skabs las gzhan pa la'o // gal te blo skye nus pa ni //
translated: The word “understanding” is in the sense of a different state.

original: zhes bya ba de la sel ba ni blo skyed pa'i nus pa ni 'gog par 'dod pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de la sel ba ni blo skyed pa'i nus pa ni 'gog par 'dod pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement “If the cognition is capable of arising” is the refutation. The statement “The capability of producing the cognition is what is to be refuted” is the proof.

original: bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ni pha rol gyi 'dod pa'i rjes su dpag pa la'o //🔽pha rol po'i sgro btags pa'i dmigs pa med pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ni pha rol gyi 'dod pa'i rjes su dpag pa la'o // pha rol po'i sgro btags pa'i dmigs pa med pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Because of the probandum, it is in regard to the inference according to the opponent’s assertion.

original: rgol ba yin la ma yin te //
analyzed: rgol ba yin la ma yin te //
translated: The statement “The non-existence of the object which is the imagined object of the opponent” is the objection.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
translated: The statement “It is not so” is the reply.

original: ji ltar mi slu ba yin zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar mi slu ba yin zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: How can it be non-deceptive? Because it engages in the possession of an objective referent.

original: med pa ji ltar yin zhe na //
analyzed: med pa ji ltar yin zhe na //
translated: How can it be non-existent?

original: dmigs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The objective referent.

original: gzhan sel ba rtogs par byed pa ni pha rol pos sgro btags pa'i med pa rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba rtogs par byed pa ni pha rol pos sgro btags pa'i med pa rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: The understanding of the exclusion of other is the understanding of the non-existence superimposed by others.

original: 'gyur ram ci zhes bya ba ni spong ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gyur ram ci zhes bya ba ni spong ba'i don to //
translated: What is the point of that? The meaning of abandonment.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni tha dad 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni tha dad 'dzin pa'o //
translated: And that, too, is the apprehension of difference.

original: phyi nas zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa rtogs pa 'bras bu'i dus so //
analyzed: phyi nas zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa rtogs pa 'bras bu'i dus so //
translated: Later is the time of the result, the understanding of the non-existence of the objective referent.

original: 'bras bu grub pa ni dmigs pa med pa nyid du rtogs pa na'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu grub pa ni dmigs pa med pa nyid du rtogs pa na'o //
translated: The result is accomplished when the non-existence of the objective referent is understood.

original: dmigs pa med pa nyid sel bar //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa nyid sel bar //
translated: The exclusion of the non-existence of the objective referent🔽is done by others, why?

original: snang ba ci'i phyir gzhan dag byed //🔽ces zer ba la /
analyzed: snang ba ci'i phyir gzhan dag byed // ces zer ba la /
translated: Because of the appearance of the objective referent.

original: 'thad bral bud med ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'thad bral bud med ces bya ba ste /
translated: The one who says this is the one who is without reason.

original: de kho na nyid rtogs pa gang la yod pa'i @145a * //
analyzed: de kho na nyid rtogs pa gang la yod pa'i @145a * //
translated: The one who has the understanding of reality

original: mkhas pa de'i ngo mtshar skyes pa yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mkhas pa de'i ngo mtshar skyes pa yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: is the wise one. The wonder of that is what is connected.

original: ci las she na de'i mdun du mi rigs pa'i phyir 'jig par 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: ci las she na de'i mdun du mi rigs pa'i phyir 'jig par 'gyur ba ni /
translated: What is the reason? Because it is unreasonable in the face of that.

original: phyir yang te phyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: phyir yang te phyis kyang ngo //
translated: “Again” means later.

original: mchog tu 'dzin pa ni rnam par dpyod pa na'o //
analyzed: mchog tu 'dzin pa ni rnam par dpyod pa na'o //
translated: “Grasping” is the analysis.

original: skyon med pa ni dus mtshungs pa ma yin pa nyid kyis 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyon med pa ni dus mtshungs pa ma yin pa nyid kyis 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Faultless” means that there is no contradiction because of the simultaneity of the time.

original: gzhan gyis rtogs pa ma yin pa nyid 'dzin pa ni dus gcig kho na la'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis rtogs pa ma yin pa nyid 'dzin pa ni dus gcig kho na la'o //
translated: “Not grasped by others” is only at one time.

original: ci'i phyir mi 'gal zhes bya ba ni ngas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi 'gal zhes bya ba ni ngas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Why is there no contradiction?” means “by me.”

original: tshig las thams cad dmigs pa med pa kho na yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshig las thams cad dmigs pa med pa kho na yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the non-apprehension of all words,

original: 'bras bu'i dus su ni phyir rgol ba la yang 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dus su ni phyir rgol ba la yang 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: at the time of the result, there is no contradiction even for the opponent. This is what is meant by “therefore.”

original: gnas skabs de la phyir rgol ba'am 'dri ba po yang rgol ba po nyid du ma yin par zer ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs de la phyir rgol ba'am 'dri ba po yang rgol ba po nyid du ma yin par zer ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In that situation, even the opponent or questioner is not a true opponent. This is what is meant by “but if.”

original: de nyid rig pa can nyid kyis dpyad bzod pa'i phyir 'dri ba po rnams kho na yin par bstan pa ni de nyid rtogs byed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid rig pa can nyid kyis dpyad bzod pa'i phyir 'dri ba po rnams kho na yin par bstan pa ni de nyid rtogs byed ces bya ba'o //
translated: The author shows that the questioners alone are the ones who can bear the analysis by means of their knowledge of reality, in the words “the knowers of reality.”

original: 'dri ba po med pas rgol ba po'i dri ba nyid yod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dri ba po med pas rgol ba po'i dri ba nyid yod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Since there are no questioners, the questioner’s objection does not exist.

original: phyogs su lhung ba'i phyir zhes zer ba ni rgol dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs su lhung ba'i phyir zhes zer ba ni rgol dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: The author states that the objection is biased, in the words “the disputants.”

original: de dag 'gal ba can ni tshad ma las byung ba dang 'gal ba can no //
analyzed: de dag 'gal ba can ni tshad ma las byung ba dang 'gal ba can no //
translated: The contradiction is with the valid cognition.

original: de zhes bya ba ni sngar khas blangs pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni sngar khas blangs pa'o //
translated: “ That” refers to the previous assertion.

original: sel ba ni 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: sel ba ni 'dor ba'o //
translated: “ Exclusion” means “rejection.”

original: gal te de zhes bya ba ni dbye ba'o //
analyzed: gal te de zhes bya ba ni dbye ba'o //
translated: “ If that” refers to the division.

original: de dag gis ni 'dri ba po rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de dag gis ni 'dri ba po rnams kyis so //
translated: “ By them” refers to the questioners.

original: rnam pa ci zhig ltar zhes bya ba ni tshad ma can ma yin pas so //
analyzed: rnam pa ci zhig ltar zhes bya ba ni tshad ma can ma yin pas so //
translated: “ In what way?” means “without valid cognition.”

original: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa'i shes pas so //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa'i shes pas so //
translated: “ By this” means “by the cognition of the proof.”

original: tshad ma'i stobs las zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i khyad par las so //
analyzed: tshad ma'i stobs las zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i khyad par las so //
translated: “ By the power of valid cognition” means “by the special non-apprehension.”

original: gang la zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: gang la zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: “What?” is a summary.

original: chos dang chos ma yin pa dang slob ma dang slob dpon dag 'dzin par byed pa dmigs pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: chos dang chos ma yin pa dang slob ma dang slob dpon dag 'dzin par byed pa dmigs pa med pa yin na /
translated: If the non-apprehension of the apprehension of Dharma and non-Dharma, of disciples and teachers,

original: slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams la sogs pa ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams la sogs pa ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba ni /
translated: then the teacher would not teach the disciples, etc.

original: chos dang chos min rtogs pa dang // zhes bya'o //
analyzed: chos dang chos min rtogs pa dang // zhes bya'o //
translated: This is the “realization of Dharma and non-Dharma” and so on.

original: dmigs pa med pa nyid kyi mdo sde las mdo sde gzhan gyi don rnam par nges pa la sogs pa de la'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa nyid kyi mdo sde las mdo sde gzhan gyi don rnam par nges pa la sogs pa de la'o //
translated: In the Sūtra on Non-apprehension, the meaning of other sūtras is ascertained, and so on.

original: rnam par rig pa las tha dad pa'i don khas blangs pa las dam bca' ba lung dang 'gal ba yin no zhes zer ba ni gsal bar des zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig pa las tha dad pa'i don khas blangs pa las dam bca' ba lung dang 'gal ba yin no zhes zer ba ni gsal bar des zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The assertion that the meaning of the sūtras is different from consciousness contradicts the scriptures. This is stated by “clearly” and so on.

original: 'jig rten la grags pa dang 'gal ba can yin no zhes zer ba ni 'jig rten kun zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten la grags pa dang 'gal ba can yin no zhes zer ba ni 'jig rten kun zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It contradicts what is known in the world. This is stated by “all the world” and so on.

original: tshul @145b gsum 'dzin par byed pa dmigs pa med pa yin na gsum mam gcig kyang rung ba ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin med par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: tshul @145b gsum 'dzin par byed pa dmigs pa med pa yin na gsum mam gcig kyang rung ba ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin med par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba ni /
translated: If the apprehension of the three modes is without an objective support, then either all three or one of them would not exist, as one wishes.

original: gal te ma lus zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te ma lus zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the statement “if it is without exception.”

original: de dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin par zer ba ni de dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin par zer ba ni de dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: If it has an objective support, then the reason is indeterminate. This is the statement “those.”

original: shes pa rnams dmigs pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: shes pa rnams dmigs pa med pa yin te /
translated: Consciousnesses are without objective supports,

original: sgrub par byed pa'i blo las gzhan nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i blo las gzhan nyid yin zhing /
translated: because they are different from the cognition that establishes them.

original: shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma nges pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni de las gzhan pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma nges pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni de las gzhan pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reason “because it is a consciousness” is not indeterminate. This is the statement “different from that.”

original: lan du smra ba na gzhan pa'i rtogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan du smra ba na gzhan pa'i rtogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is the statement “the understanding of others.”

original: dgos pa bshad pa ni phyogs sogs zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dgos pa bshad pa ni phyogs sogs zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The explanation of the purpose is the statement “position, etc.”

original: de las gzhan pa nyid ni dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs de dag gi khyad par zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa nyid ni dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs de dag gi khyad par zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “different from that” is the difference between the thesis and the reason.

original: de las gzhan pa'i 'dzin byed kyi khyad par la sogs pa'i khongs su gtogs pas dmigs pa med pa nyid na gzung ba dang de las gzhan pa nyid ma grub pas gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i 'dzin byed kyi khyad par la sogs pa'i khongs su gtogs pas dmigs pa med pa nyid na gzung ba dang de las gzhan pa nyid ma grub pas gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the other, the distinction of the apprehender, and so on, are included in that, if the object of apprehension does not exist, the object of apprehension and the other are not established. Therefore the reason is not established.

original: dmigs pa med pa nyid 'grub pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa nyid 'grub pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Thus it is said that the nonexistence of the object of apprehension is not established.

original: de ni log par grub na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni log par grub na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the case if it is established as mistaken.

original: tha dad med par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa nyid kyis gzhan du 'dzin pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i blo'i'o //
analyzed: tha dad med par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa nyid kyis gzhan du 'dzin pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i blo'i'o //
translated: The phrase “it would not be different” is from the perspective of the mind that establishes the apprehension of the other by the nonexistence of the object of apprehension.

original: dmigs pa dang bcas pa de nyid la 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin la /
analyzed: dmigs pa dang bcas pa de nyid la 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin la /
translated: The reason that engages with just that object of apprehension is indefinite.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i blo las gzhan nyid du 'dzin par byed pa de las gzhan pa nyid kyi khyad par yin na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i blo las gzhan nyid du 'dzin par byed pa de las gzhan pa nyid kyi khyad par yin na /
translated: If the apprehension of the other is the distinction of the other, the apprehension of the other, from the mind that establishes it,

original: de 'dzin pa po brdzun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ma grub na /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa po brdzun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ma grub na /
translated: then since the apprehender is false, it is not established.

original: des khyad par du byas pa ma grub pa de'i phyir dmigs pa med pa nyid ma yin no zhes zer ba ni ci srid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: des khyad par du byas pa ma grub pa de'i phyir dmigs pa med pa nyid ma yin no zhes zer ba ni ci srid ces bya ba'o //
translated: Since that is not established as a qualifier, it is not the case that there is no object.

original: de ltar de las gzhan byed pa zhes bya bar yang 'don pa yod do //
analyzed: de ltar de las gzhan byed pa zhes bya bar yang 'don pa yod do //
translated: Thus, there is also a reading of “as long as” as “other than that.”

original: phyi ma rnams ni khyad par 'dzin par byed pa rnams so //
analyzed: phyi ma rnams ni khyad par 'dzin par byed pa rnams so //
translated: The latter are those that take up the qualifiers.

original: snga ma ni dang po ste dmigs pa med pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i'o //
analyzed: snga ma ni dang po ste dmigs pa med pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i'o //
translated: The former is the first, which takes up the absence of an object.

original: phyogs thams cad la ni de las gzhan pa'i nyid kyi khyad par can gyi gtan tshigs kyi phyogs rnams la'o //
analyzed: phyogs thams cad la ni de las gzhan pa'i nyid kyi khyad par can gyi gtan tshigs kyi phyogs rnams la'o //
translated: In all cases, in the case of the positions of the reason that is qualified by other than that.

original: shes pa nyid kyi 'gal ba ma 'khrul pa nyid dam /
analyzed: shes pa nyid kyi 'gal ba ma 'khrul pa nyid dam /
translated: It is the contradiction of consciousness itself, or

original: dam bca' ba la rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba nyid yin zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: dam bca' ba la rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba nyid yin zhes zer ba ni /
translated: the contradiction of the proof with the inference.

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul can du 'ang 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul can du 'ang 'gyur //
translated: It is also the case that there is a contradiction of non-error.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said:🔽There is also the contradiction of non-error.

original: de ltar bstan pa'i bshad pa ni phyi rol don yod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar bstan pa'i bshad pa ni phyi rol don yod ces bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, the explanation of the teaching is “external objects exist.”

original: @146a * // blo ni ka ba la sogs pa'i yul can gyi rtsod pa'i yul yin no //
analyzed: @146a * // blo ni ka ba la sogs pa'i yul can gyi rtsod pa'i yul yin no //
translated: The cognition is the subject of the dispute about the object, such as the pillar.

original: gnod dang bral ba'i zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi blo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: gnod dang bral ba'i zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi blo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason is: because it is a cognition of a particular.

original: rmi lam la sogs pa'i gnod pa can gyi blo yang phyi rol gyi don la dmigs pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: rmi lam la sogs pa'i gnod pa can gyi blo yang phyi rol gyi don la dmigs pa can ma yin te /
translated: The cognition that is invalidated in dreams, etc. is not one that has an external object as its referent.🔽The reason is not pervasion because the probandum is incomplete.

original: bsgrub bya ma tshang ba'i phyir gtan tshigs khyab pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ma tshang ba'i phyir gtan tshigs khyab pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is: “That is also . . . ”

original: gnod par byed pa brdzun nying yin na gnod par bya ba rmi lam bden pa yin pa'i phyir mi bden pa'i don nyid bsgrub bya ma tshang ba'i phyir rnam pa med pa nyid kyis shes pa nyid khyab pa ma yin par yang bstan pa ni rmi sogs dag
analyzed: gnod par byed pa brdzun nying yin na gnod par bya ba rmi lam bden pa yin pa'i phyir mi bden pa'i don nyid bsgrub bya ma tshang ba'i phyir rnam pa med pa nyid kyis shes pa nyid khyab pa ma yin par yang bstan pa ni rmi sogs dag
translated: If the invalidator is false, then the dream, which is the invalidated, is true. Therefore, the meaning of the non-existence of the object is incomplete. The reason is not pervasion because it is taught that consciousness itself is not established by the absence of aspects.

original: la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is: “In dreams, etc. . . . ”

original: gal te ma lus sgrub byed blo //
analyzed: gal te ma lus sgrub byed blo //
translated: If the cognition that establishes all objects

original: zhes bya ba 'di ma grub pa nyid dang / de dag dmigs dang bcas na ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ma grub pa nyid dang / de dag dmigs dang bcas na ni //
translated: And if they are perceived,

original: zhes bya bas ma nges par nan gyis khas len du bcug cing brjod nas de khas len pa nyid kyis bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya bas ma nges par nan gyis khas len du bcug cing brjod nas de khas len pa nyid kyis bstan pa ni /
translated: then the opponent is forced to accept the reason, and the thesis is taught by his acceptance of it.

original: rnam shes yod dang zhes bya ba la tha dad pa ni /
analyzed: rnam shes yod dang zhes bya ba la tha dad pa ni /
translated: The word “existence” in the verse is a different

original: rgyu rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: rgyu rnams kyi'o //
translated: word from the word “existence” in the reason.🔽The word “existence” in the reason is a word for the cause.🔽The word “existence” in the verse is a word for the effect.

original: skad cig pa nyid ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: skad cig pa nyid ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bos so //
translated: The word “momentariness” is a word for the difference between the prior and subsequent natures.

original: phyogs la gnod pa ni khas blangs pa la gnod pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs la gnod pa ni khas blangs pa la gnod pa'o //
translated: The word “harm” is a word for the contradiction of the opponent’s thesis.🔽The word “established” is a word for the subject.🔽The word “particular” is a word for the property of the subject.

original: rab tu grub pa'i chos can rab tu grub pa'i bye brag gi khyad par can zhes bya ba 'di la chos dang chos can dag med pas med pa yin no zhes gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: rab tu grub pa'i chos can rab tu grub pa'i bye brag gi khyad par can zhes bya ba 'di la chos dang chos can dag med pas med pa yin no zhes gzhan gyi'o //
translated: The word “nonexistent” is a word for the nonexistence of the subject and property of the subject.🔽The word “liberation” is a word for the result.🔽The word “effort” is a word for the cause.🔽The word “not” is a word for the negation of the result.🔽The word “because” is a word for the reason.

original: shes pa nyid med pa las kyang de bsgoms pas byas pa'i thar pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de'i don du 'bad pa mi byed do zhes zer ba ni de'i phyir thar pa yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa nyid med pa las kyang de bsgoms pas byas pa'i thar pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de'i don du 'bad pa mi byed do zhes zer ba ni de'i phyir thar pa yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word “that” is a word for the subject.🔽The word “is” is a word for the property of the subject.🔽The word “not” is a word for the negation of the property of the subject.🔽The word “therefore” is a word for the conclusion.

original: chos dang chos min rtogs pa dang // zhes bya ba de la bstan pa ni /
analyzed: chos dang chos min rtogs pa dang // zhes bya ba de la bstan pa ni /
translated: Here, the teaching is:

original: gal te da lta la zhes bya ba ste tshu rol gyi gnas skabs la'o //
analyzed: gal te da lta la zhes bya ba ste tshu rol gyi gnas skabs la'o //
translated: If it is the present, then it is the occasion of the near side.

original: de nyid khyad par du byed pa ni 'khor ba'i zhes bya ba'o //🔽byis pa'i rtsed mo bzhin du bsnyen pa dang slob gnyen la sogs pa de'i don dang don ma yin pa'i dbye ba la sogs pa 'dod pa dang cig shos su mngon par zhen pa yang byis pa'i rtsed mo bzhin du chos la sogs pa la don du gnyer
analyzed: de nyid khyad par du byed pa ni 'khor ba'i zhes bya ba'o // byis pa'i rtsed mo bzhin du bsnyen pa dang slob gnyen la sogs pa de'i don dang don ma yin pa'i dbye ba la sogs pa 'dod pa dang cig shos su mngon par zhen pa yang byis pa'i rtsed mo bzhin du chos la sogs pa la don du gnyer
translated: The qualification of that is “of cyclic existence.”🔽Like the play of children, the pursuit of study, etc. is the desire for the distinction of what is meaningful and what is not, etc. The engagement in that is like the play of children.

original: ba bskyed pas 'jug pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ba bskyed pas 'jug pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the generation of the pursuit of Dharma, etc. is:

original: 'gro kun gang la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro kun gang la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “For all beings, whatever…”

original: de dang ni tha dad par mngon par zhen pa can gyi'o //
analyzed: de dang ni tha dad par mngon par zhen pa can gyi'o //
translated: The one who is attached to that as different is the one who is attached to that.

original: de la mngon par zhen pa can ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de la mngon par zhen pa can ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang bstan pa ste /
translated: The teaching for the yogi who is not attached to that is:

original: glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bstan pa ni /
analyzed: glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching by the elephant’s gaze is:

original: glang chen zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: glang chen zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Like an elephant…”

original: @146b de ni 'di ltar tha mi dad pa la yang tha snyad ni tha dad pa'i rig pa 'phen pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: @146b de ni 'di ltar tha mi dad pa la yang tha snyad ni tha dad pa'i rig pa 'phen pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not that a different convention is projected for the undifferentiated,

original: gzhan du yang yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du yang yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is also different.

original: de ni ma yin te de bsgrub phyir ni zhes bya ba sogs pa legs par gsungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te de bsgrub phyir ni zhes bya ba sogs pa legs par gsungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: That is not so. It is well said that “for the sake of establishing that . . . ” and so on.

original: 'dis der nan tan zhes bya ba'o //🔽mdo gzhan dag ces bya ba de la bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'dis der nan tan zhes bya ba'o // mdo gzhan dag ces bya ba de la bstan pa ni /
translated: This is the “effort” there.

original: de'i bsam pas zhes bya ba'o //🔽'jig rten kun gyi zhes bya ba de la bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i bsam pas zhes bya ba'o // 'jig rten kun gyi zhes bya ba de la bstan pa ni /
translated: “In other sūtras” is taught by “with that intention . . . ”

original: de nyid rig med ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid rig med ces bya ba ste /
translated: “In the world” is taught by “that . . . is not known . . . ”

original: de nyid rig pa po'i rab tu grags pas gnod pa yin na /
analyzed: de nyid rig pa po'i rab tu grags pas gnod pa yin na /
translated: If it is well known that “that” is the knower, it is undermined.

original: khyod kyi rig byed dpyad pa la yang gnod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyod kyi rig byed dpyad pa la yang gnod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it undermines your analysis of the Vedas.

original: de grags pas kyang gnod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir gnyis su med pa la lhag par byar med pa nyid kyi rtogs bya nyid yin pas rim pa la ltos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de grags pas kyang gnod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir gnyis su med pa la lhag par byar med pa nyid kyi rtogs bya nyid yin pas rim pa la ltos pa'i phyir /
translated: Since it is not undermined by that well-known fact, the object of knowledge is nondual and has nothing to be added. Therefore, since it depends on stages,

original: thams cad yod ces brjod par bya //🔽zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so zhes bstan pa ni de nyid rig med ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad yod ces brjod par bya // zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so zhes bstan pa ni de nyid rig med ces bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of the verse is this: The one who does not know reality is not without an object.

original: de la nye bar zhes bya ba ni phyi ma phyi ma'i de nyid kyi khyad par la 'dod ba med pa'o //
analyzed: de la nye bar zhes bya ba ni phyi ma phyi ma'i de nyid kyi khyad par la 'dod ba med pa'o //
translated: Here, “in that” means that one does not desire the particular characteristics of reality in the future.🔽If the cognition that establishes it
