original: gal te ma lus sgrub byed blo //🔽zhes bya ba de la bstan pa ni /🔽de la sgrub byed blo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gal te ma lus sgrub byed blo // zhes bya ba de la bstan pa ni / de la sgrub byed blo zhes bya'o //
translated: is not without an object,🔽then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.🔽The one who does not know that is not without an object.🔽If the cognition that establishes it is not without an object, then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.

original: de'i ste de nyid mi rig pa ni dmigs pa med pa min zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽gang tshe zhes bya ba ni de nyid shes par 'dod pa'i tshe na'o //
analyzed: de'i ste de nyid mi rig pa ni dmigs pa med pa min zhes bya bar sbyar ro // gang tshe zhes bya ba ni de nyid shes par 'dod pa'i tshe na'o //
translated: The one who does not know that is not without an object.🔽If the cognition that establishes it is not without an object, then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.🔽The one who does not know that is not without an object.🔽If the cognition that establishes it is not without an object, then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.🔽The one who does not know that is not without an object.🔽If the cognition that establishes it is not without an object, then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.🔽The one who does not know that is not without an object.🔽If the cognition that establishes it is not without an object, then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.🔽The one who does not know that is not without an object.🔽If the cognition that establishes it is not without an object, then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.🔽The one who does not know that is not without an object.🔽If the cognition that establishes it is not without an object, then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.🔽The one who does not know that is not without an object.🔽If the cognition that establishes it is not without an object, then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.🔽The one who does not know that is not without an object.🔽If the cognition that establishes it is not without an object, then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.🔽The one who does not know that is not without an object.🔽If the cognition that establishes it is not without an object, then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.🔽The one who does not know that is not without an object.

original: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi blo dag dmigs pa med pa nyid yin na bsgrub bya sgrub byed du mi 'grub bo zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi blo dag dmigs pa med pa nyid yin na bsgrub bya sgrub byed du mi 'grub bo zhes zer ba ni /
translated: If the cognition that establishes it is not without an object, then the cognition that establishes it is not without an object.

original: gal te de'i sgrub byed ni zhes bya ba ste /🔽dmigs pa'am rgyu mtshan yang rung /
analyzed: gal te de'i sgrub byed ni zhes bya ba ste /🔽dmigs pa'am rgyu mtshan yang rung /
translated: The one who does

original: shes pa gang gi yin pa de de shes pa de las gal te sgrub byed dang bsgrub bya yang ngo //
analyzed: shes pa gang gi yin pa de de shes pa de las gal te sgrub byed dang bsgrub bya yang ngo //
translated: That which is the cognition of that is the cognition of that.🔽The reply:

original: lan ni / slu ba med pa nyid de yis //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni / slu ba med pa nyid de yis // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By that very non-deceptiveness,🔽That is, by the cognition of the object of attainment,

original: des pa ji lta ba bzhin 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: des pa ji lta ba bzhin 'thob pa'o //
translated: one attains just as it is.

original: de yis zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub par byed pa'i shes pas so //
analyzed: de yis zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub par byed pa'i shes pas so //
translated: By that means that by the cognition of the object of attainment and the means of attainment.

original: yod ma yin ni ngo bo dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: yod ma yin ni ngo bo dmigs pa'o //
translated: Non-existence means the non-apprehension of an essence.

original: mngon sum ni bzung bas dben pa yin la /
analyzed: mngon sum ni bzung bas dben pa yin la /
translated: Direct perception is free from grasping.

original: lhag par zhen pa rjes su brjod pa la dmigs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni kho na bzhin yin no //
analyzed: lhag par zhen pa rjes su brjod pa la dmigs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni kho na bzhin yin no //
translated: The statement that which has an object of expression that is dependent on superimposition means just that.

original: gzhan du na de yang bdag nyid gzhan la yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du na de yang bdag nyid gzhan la yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pa yin te /
translated: Otherwise, since that would also be dependent on another, there would be an infinite regress.

original: tshad ma ma yin na yang de bsgrub pa thams cad med pa'am /
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin na yang de bsgrub pa thams cad med pa'am /
translated: Even if it is not a valid cognition, all proofs of it would be non-existent.

original: ji ltar 'dod kun med pa'am /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod kun med pa'am /
translated: Or, as desired, all would be non-existent.

original: ma tshang la sogs thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ma tshang la sogs thal bar 'gyur //
translated: The consequence of incompleteness and so on would follow.

original: de ni 'di ltar mi slu ba can @147a * //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar mi slu ba can @147a * //
translated: That is because it is non-deceptive.

original: yang zhen pa ni dngos po 'dzin pa ma yin pa nyid kyis /🔽dmigs nyid kyis ni ma yin te //
analyzed: yang zhen pa ni dngos po 'dzin pa ma yin pa nyid kyis / dmigs nyid kyis ni ma yin te //
translated: Moreover, attachment is not the grasping of a thing,🔽because it is not the object of apprehension.

original: de dag dmigs dang bcas nas ni //
analyzed: de dag dmigs dang bcas nas ni //
translated: Because it is not the object of apprehension,

original: zhes bya ba bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba bsal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: it is taught that the statement🔽“because they are associated with the object of apprehension”🔽is refuted.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ste bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi shes pa'i'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ste bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi shes pa'i'o //
translated: “That” refers to the cognition of the probandum and the probans.
